src_original: iha jambudvīpasmi abhūṣi rājā dṛḍhabalo nāma mahābalaśca /
tgt_original: 時閻浮提有二王，　　號曰大力、堅固力，

src_original: upārdhu rājyasya tadeku bhuñjate dvitīya cādhasya abhūṣi rājā // SRS_5.16 //
tgt_original: 是等二王所居土，　　一一各領半閻浮。

src_original: mahābalasyo vijitasmi buddho utpanna so devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ /
tgt_original: 佛出大力王國中，　　諸勝人天奉供養，

src_original: labhitva rājā sugatasmi śraddhām upasthihī varṣasahasra pūrṇam // SRS_5.17 //
tgt_original: 其王於佛得淨信，　　恭敬供養滿千年。

src_original: tasyānuśikṣī bahu anyasattvāḥ kurvanti satkāra tathāgatasya /
tgt_original: 國人無量學是王，　　種種供養於如來，

src_original: lokāmiṣeṇaiva hi dharmapūjayā saśrāvakasya atulo 'bhū utsadaḥ // SRS_5.18 //
tgt_original: 但以世財非法供，　　佛及聲聞悉豐足。

src_original: śruṇitva gāthāṃ tada rājapārthivo eko vicinteti rahogato nṛpaḥ /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊作是念：

src_original: na śakya gehasmi sthihitva sarve pratipadyitumuttadharmapūjā // SRS_5.21 //
tgt_original: 『我說是法令捨欲，必令彼王生厭離，　　於我法中而出家。 』彼時人尊說偈言： 　　『棄捨惡法是佛教，在家多過具諸苦，　　如法修行真供佛。 』時王聞說如是偈，　　獨趣空閑作是念： 『我今不能處家纏，　　而為最勝法供養。

src_original: upasaṃkramī tasya jinasya antikaṃ vanditva pādau purataḥ sthito 'bhūt // SRS_5.22 //
tgt_original: 即捨王位如洟唾，　　并及八萬諸眷屬， 一時俱往到佛所，　　頭面作禮住尊前。

src_original: teṣāṃ jino āśayu jānamāno deśetimaṃ śānta samādhi durdṛśam /
tgt_original: 佛知此等之樂欲，　　為說難見寂滅定，

src_original: te pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitva /
tgt_original: 既出家已於此定，　　讀誦、受持、廣分別，

src_original: anāsravaṃ ca me cittaṃ kalpakoṭyo hyacintiyāḥ /  karomi cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na ca me kāyu dṛśyate // SRS_22.17 //  yathā ca yasya bhāvehi vimuktaṃ bhoti mānasam /
tgt_original: 名色若不著，　　其心身光照。

src_original: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatim // SRS_5.24 //
tgt_original: 次第二億劫數中，　　未曾墜墮三惡道。

src_original: te tena sarve kuśalena karmaṇā adrākṣu buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是人以此諸善業，　　得見百億諸如來，

src_original: sarveṣu co teṣu jinānuśāsane te pravrajitvemu samādhi bhāvayī // SRS_5.25 //
tgt_original: 於彼佛法恒出家，　　宣說如是勝三昧。

src_original: te paścime kāli abhūṣi buddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmāna anantavīryāḥ /  kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ te paścikālesmi śikhīva nirvṛtāḥ // SRS_5.26 //
tgt_original: 是等於後得成佛，　　同號堅固大精進，

src_original: tadā bahu prāṇisahasrakoṭiyaḥ sthapetva bodhāya sa paści nirvṛtaḥ // SRS_5.27 //
tgt_original: 利益無量億眾生，　　後入涅槃猶火滅。

src_original: tatra kumāra katamat samādhiparikarma?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 云何菩薩於此三昧最初所行？

src_original: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahākaruṇāsaṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ vā pūjākarmaṇe udyukto bhavati,
tgt_original: 童子！ 若菩薩摩訶薩以大悲心為首，若佛在世、若佛滅後，常勤供養——所謂花鬘、末香、塗香、寶幢、幡蓋、音聲、歌舞、作倡伎樂、衣服、飲食、病瘦醫藥——以此善根悉以迴向如是三昧，更不志求其餘諸法而供養佛，不求妙色、不求資財、不為生天、不求眷屬，唯念是法。 是菩薩尚於法中不見有佛，況復法外而見佛也？ 是故，童子！ 是為真供養佛，而亦不見有佛可得，不取我想、不求果報。

src_original: yaduta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhistūryatālāvacarairvaijayantībhiḥ  tacca kuśalamūlaṃ samādhipratilambhāya pariṇamayati /  anayā kumāra trimaṇḍalapariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgataṃ pūjayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
tgt_original: 是菩薩三輪清淨，以花鬘、末香、塗香、寶幢、幡蓋、音聲、歌舞、作倡伎樂、飲食、衣服、病瘦醫藥供養如來，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，以此善根得不思議功德、不思議果報，得是三昧速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya etadeva samādhiparikarmanirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśamati sma -
tgt_original: 」爾時，世尊即說偈言：

src_original: kṣetrakoṭīsahasrāṇi gacchanti mama nirmitāḥ /
tgt_original: 我念過去生，　　七十阿僧祇， 此三種惡想，　　從本未曾起。 以其無漏心，　　不思議億劫， 利益眾生故，　　他不見我身。 若有以此物，　　心意得棄捨，

src_original: anantajñānasya daditva gandhān anantagandho bhavatī narāṇām /
tgt_original: 「若人香奉無邊智，　　能得無量香果報，

src_original: na kalpakoṭīya vrajanti durgatiṃ durgandhiyaṃ teṣu na jātu bhoti // SRS_6.1 //
tgt_original: 於千萬劫離惡趣，　　永無一切諸臭穢。

src_original: te kalpakoṭyaścaramāṇu cārikāṃ pūjitva buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
tgt_original: 千萬劫中行勝行，　　供養百萬億如來，

src_original: te jñānagandhena samudgatena bhavanti buddhā varaśīlagandhikāḥ // SRS_6.2 //
tgt_original: 成佛獲得勝戒香；

src_original: na jātu rūpakāyeṇa śakyaṃ prajñāpituṃ jino // SRS_22.22 //
tgt_original: 是人於彼物，　　更不共和合。 我心得解脫，　　一切種物中， 能體知其性，　　而起於智慧。 於千億佛剎，　　我於中現化， 為眾生說法，　　是故不可見。

src_original: sacet punarjānati vāsti sattvo yo gandha detī tatha yasya dīyate /
tgt_original: 施香、受香二俱無，　　若能起心如是施，

src_original: na buddhadharmeṣu janeti saṃśayāniyaṃ sa kṣāntirbhavatānulomikī // SRS_6.7 //
tgt_original: 是因緣故名為忍。 智者如法常修行，　　知諸佛法無疑惑，

src_original: evaṃ carantasya ya loki mārāste buddharūpeṇa bhaṇeyya vācā /
tgt_original: 是故得名為隨順。 　　若修行時有世魔，現作佛身說是言：

src_original: sudurlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakā na gṛhṇotī vākyu na co vivartate // SRS_6.8 //  bodheti sattvān viṣamātu dṛṣṭito na eṣa mārgo amṛtasya prāptaye /
tgt_original: 『佛道難得作聲聞。 』不肯信受名不退。

src_original: kṣamiṣyanūlomapathe sthitasya nairātmyasaṅgāya vibodhitasya /  svapnāntare 'pyasya na jātu bhoti asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ // SRS_6.10 //  (Vaidya 32)  vyāhāramātreṇa ca vyoharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi // SRS_6.12 //  yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu kṛtaṃsi nāmā ayameva nāma /
tgt_original: 非此能證甘露道，　　勸捨惡道住善趣， 是故得名為菩薩。 以無我法令開悟，　　乃至夢中不起念， 存有眾生壽命想。

src_original: na tasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhiṣyati // SRS_22.23 //
tgt_original: 彼諸魔波旬，　　不能得其便。

src_original: tathaiva nāmaṃ kṛtu bodhisattvo na cāsya nāmaṃ diśatā sulabhyate /
tgt_original: 見已寂滅行世間。 隨即為其立名字，　　諸方推名不可得， 當知此字無所來。 菩薩諸方不可求，　　乃至實際求不得，

src_original: paryeṣamāṇo ayu bodhisattvo jānāti yo eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.14 //
tgt_original: 如是知者名菩薩。

src_original: na hyatra jāto na mṛto ca kaścidutpanna sattvo manujo naro vā /  māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyā na śakyate jānitu tīrthikehi // SRS_6.16 //
tgt_original: 所謂眾生及壽命，　　諸法體空猶如幻， 非彼外道所能知。

src_original: na cāpi āhāravimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātracīvare /  na coddhatehi napi connatehi śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabodhiḥ // SRS_6.17 //
tgt_original: 於衣鉢中起愛悋、　　及其掉戲輕躁者， 是則不知佛菩提；

src_original: smṛterupasthāna iha yeṣa gocaraḥ prāmodya prīti śayanamupastṛtam /
tgt_original: 是則能知勝菩提； 喜悅而作床臥具、　　以禪為食、定為漿，

src_original: yā bodhisattvāna carī vidūnāmabhūmiranyasya janasya tatra /  pratyekabuddhāna ca śrāvakāṇa ca ko vātra vijño na janeya chandam // SRS_6.23 //
tgt_original: 非是餘人所行地，　　所謂聲聞及緣覺， 誰有智者不貪樂？

src_original: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ gambhīraṃ yasya trāso na bheṣyati /
tgt_original: 聞是深妙法，　　而不生驚怖，

src_original: sacenmamā āyu bhaveta ettakaṃ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /  ekasya romasya bhaṇeya varṇaṃ bauddhena jñānena paryantu nāsti // SRS_6.24 //  (Vaidya 34)
tgt_original: 如恒河沙無量劫，　　說佛一毛德不盡，

src_original: dvitīyā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā /  tṛtīyā kṣāntiḥ prajñātavyā /  trikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalena bhavitavyaṃ trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalena ca /
tgt_original: 是故，菩薩摩訶薩應善巧知入三法忍——謂知彼第一忍、第二忍、第三忍——於是忍中應善巧知，復於其智亦善巧知。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathāhi kumāra yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvastrikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalo bhavati trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalaśca bhavati,  tadāyaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,  kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩於忍智中善巧知者，彼菩薩摩訶薩速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 是故，童子！ 菩薩摩訶薩若欲速求阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，於此三忍法門應當受持；

src_original: māyopamān jānati sarvadharmān na cāpi so bhoti nimittagocaraḥ /
tgt_original: 知一切法猶如幻，　　即於此相不取著，

src_original: na hīyate jñānavivṛddhabhūmeḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.2 //
tgt_original: 能於智中增無減，　　是故名為初勝忍；

src_original: yāttakaṃ jñānu buddhasya rūpaprajñapti tāttikā /
tgt_original: 如所出音聲，　　佛智亦復然。 所有諸佛智，　　聲施設亦爾；

src_original: sa sarvasūtrāntanayeṣu kovidaḥ subhāṣite 'sminnadhimuktipaṇḍitaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸修多羅已修學，　　智與善說恒相應，

src_original: anantajñānī sugatāna jñāne prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.3 //
tgt_original: 於佛無量智不疑，　　是則名為初勝忍；

src_original: yaḥ kaści dharmaṃ śṛṇute subhāṣitaṃ buddhāna co bhāṣita tanna kāṅkṣati /
tgt_original: 若聞一切善說法，　　猶如佛說無有疑，

src_original: adhimucyate sarvajināna dharmatāṃ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.4 //  (Vaidya 36)
tgt_original: 能信一切諸佛法，　　是則名為初勝忍。

src_original: nītārthasūtrāntaviśeṣa jānati yathopadiṣṭā sugatena śūnyatā /
tgt_original: 於了義經常宣暢，　　如佛所說而演說，

src_original: ye asmi loke pṛthu anyatīrthā na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ /
tgt_original: 種種外道諸異見，　　菩薩於彼心無擾， 轉於彼人深悲愍，　　是名第二勝忍相； 諸陀羅尼來現前，　　於總持門無疑惑，

src_original: yāvatī rūpaprajñapti rūpavyāhāra tāttakā // SRS_23.1 //  yāvanto rūpavyāhārāḥ śīlanāmāni tāttakāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是施設事，　　聲光明亦然。 如是聲光明，　　戒名亦如是；

src_original: na cātmana uttari kiṃci paśyati prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.9 //
tgt_original: 不見更有勝己者，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: akampiyaḥ samathabalena bhoti śelopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya /
tgt_original: 奢摩他力得調伏，　　毘婆舍那山不動，

src_original: na kṣobhituṃ śakyu sa sarvasattvairdvitīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati // SRS_7.10 //
tgt_original: 一切眾生莫能欺，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: samāhitastiṣṭhati bhāṣate ca samāhitaścaṃkramate niṣīdati /
tgt_original: 所有言說常在定，　　行、住、坐、臥恒三昧，

src_original: samādhiye pāramitāgato vidu dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.11 //
tgt_original: 三摩堅固到彼岸，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: (Vaidya 37)  samāhito labhati abhijña pañca kṣetraśataṃ gacchati dharmadeśakaḥ /
tgt_original: 住於正定獲神通，　　於多佛剎往說法，

src_original: no cāpi so ṛddhibalāttu hīyate dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.12 //
tgt_original: 智者神足勢無減，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: sa tādṛśaṃ śānta samādhimeṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 若修如是寂定時，　　諸餘一切群生類， 不能知彼心分齊，　　是名第三勝忍相； 假使世界諸眾生，　　一時作佛演說法，

src_original: yastasya cittasya pramāṇu gṛhṇīyā dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.13 //
tgt_original: 是人悉能具領受，　　是名第三勝忍相； 東、西、南、北及四維、　　上、下二方亦如是， 於諸方中悉見佛，　　是名第三勝忍相； 悉能變現無量身，　　一切皆作真金色， 於無量剎往說法，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: ya jambudvīpa iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra so dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 此佛世界諸閻浮，　　一切皆覩菩薩形，

src_original: jñātaśca bhotī sasurāsure jage tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.17 //
tgt_original: 諸天及人咸識知，　　是名第三勝忍相；

src_original: buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /
tgt_original: 於諸佛法佛行處，　　導師所有諸威儀，

src_original: sarvatra so śikṣitu bhoti paṇḍitastṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.18 //
tgt_original: 智者悉能善修學，　　是名第三勝忍相。

src_original: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
tgt_original: 世界所有諸眾生，　　悉來讚歎是菩薩，

src_original: (Vaidya 38)  sace 'sya tasmin nānunīyate mano na śikṣito ucyati buddhajñāne // SRS_7.19 //
tgt_original: 菩薩於彼欣悅者，　　則於佛智未修學；

src_original: ye lokadhātuiṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
tgt_original: 世界所有諸眾生，　　罵詈、毀謗是菩薩，

src_original: sace 'sya teṣu pratihanyate mano na śikṣito 'dyāpi sa buddhajñāne // SRS_7.20 //
tgt_original: 於此若起瞋恨心，　　當知佛智未修學；

src_original: arthena labdhena na bhoti sūmano na cāpyanarthena sa bhoti durmanāḥ /
tgt_original: 若得利養心不喜、　　於違失時無憂慼，

src_original: tasyo ca taṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śruṇitvā sattvāna koṭī niyutā acintiyā /
tgt_original: 若有聞此授記莂，　　不思議數億眾生， 咸發無上菩提心：

src_original: utpādayī citta varāgrabodhaye vayaṃ pi bheṣyāma jina āryacetikāḥ // SRS_7.25 //
tgt_original: 『我要當作人中尊。 聞說如是授記音，　　即時大地六種動， 光明普照十方界，　　雨無量種勝妙花。

src_original: kṣāntyā imāstisra niruttarā yadā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
tgt_original: 若於如是三勝忍，　　其有菩薩能得者，

src_original: na cāpi so jāyati nāpi mrīyate na cāpi sa cyavati nopapadyate // SRS_7.26 //  (Vaidya 39)
tgt_original: 悉不復見有生、死，　　於彼起、滅亦復然；

src_original: yadā imā kṣānti trayo niruttarā saṃbodhisattvena bhavanti labdhāḥ /
tgt_original: 若於如是三種忍，　　菩薩其有能得者，

src_original: na paśyateḥ jāyati yaśca mrīyate sthitadharmatāṃ paśyati sarvadharmān // SRS_7.27 //

src_original: tatra punarapi bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra  atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipularaiprameyairacintyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt /  tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke  udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ  ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /  tat kiṃ manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'bhāvasamudgata ityucyate?  sa khalu punaḥ kumāra tathāgato jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya
tgt_original: 」爾時，佛告月光童子言： 「於過去廣大久遠無量無數不可思議過阿僧祇劫，爾時有佛名無所有起如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊出現於世。 云何名為無所有起如來、應、正遍知？ 童子！

src_original: tatra bhaumān devānupādāya yāvad brahmalokaṃ paraṃparayā śabdamudīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣamanuśrāvayāmāsuḥ - abhāvasamudgato batāyaṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 是佛生時，上昇虛空高七多羅樹，行於七步而作是言： 『一切諸法悉無所有，一切諸法悉無所有。 』其音遍滿三千大千世界。 是時地神展轉相告至于梵世，而作是言：

src_original: yo jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātramabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāvaśabdamudīrayati /
tgt_original: 『是世界中有佛出世，號曰無所有起如來、應、正遍知，其初生時於虛空中行於七步而作是言： 「一切諸法悉無所有。 」』童子！

src_original: iti hyabhāvasamudgato 'bhāvasamudgata iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamudapādi /

src_original: yāvanti śīlanāmāni buddhanāmāni tāttakāḥ // SRS_23.2 //  yāttakā buddhanāmāni sattvanāmāni tāttakāḥ /

src_original: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati
tgt_original: 「彼佛成正覺時，所有樹木、叢林、藥草皆出聲言： 『一切諸法悉無所有。 』童子！

src_original: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabdaprajñaptiḥ sarvato 'bhāvasamudgatavijñaptiśabdo niścarati /

src_original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato 'bhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ  samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko
tgt_original: 』「童子！ 爾時無所有起如來所說法時，有一王子名思惟大悲，形貌端正，人所愛樂，心行調柔。 童子！

src_original: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'sthāt //

src_original: atha khalu kumāra sa bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākaruṇācintino rājakumārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ samādhiṃ deśayāmāsa /  atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī rājakumāraḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prasīdati sma /
tgt_original: 「爾時，無所有起如來知彼思惟大悲王子深心所樂，即為說是一切諸法體性平等無戲論三昧。

src_original: prasannacittaśca keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito 'bhūt /

src_original: sa pravrajitaḥ sannimaṃ samādhimudgṛhītavān /  udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt /  sa tainaiva kuśalamūlena (Vaidya 42)  paśya kumāra yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya buddhajñānasya paripūraṇāya saṃvartate //  atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
tgt_original: 既出家已，於此三昧讀誦、受持、廣為他人分別顯示，以此善根於二十劫不墮惡道，一一劫中值二億佛。

src_original: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarveṣa dharmāṇa abhāvu deśayī /  tadānurūpaṃ kṛtu nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñapī // SRS_8.2 //  devāpi sarve pramumoca śabdaṃ abhāvu nāmneti jino bhaviṣyati /  yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakramannabhāvu dharmāṇa bravīti nāyakaḥ // SRS_8.3 //  buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarveṣa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /  vanditva pādau munipuṃgavasya pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtya ca gauraveṇa /
tgt_original: 過二十劫已得成佛道，號曰善思義如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，出現於世。

src_original: sa tena caivaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā ārāgayī viṃśati buddhakoṭyaḥ /  teṣāṃ ca sarveṣu jināna antikādimaṃ varaṃ śānta samādhi bhāvayī // SRS_8.10 //

src_original: gambhīradharmakṣāntikuśalena bhavitavyam /

src_original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīradharmakṣāntikuśalo bhavati?

src_original: iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā yathābhūtataḥ prajñātavyāḥ /  svapnopamā marīcyupamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā udakacandropamā nirmitopamāḥ pratibimbopamā ākāśopamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ prajñātavyāḥ /

src_original: yathāntarīkṣasmi na kiṃcidabhraṃ kṣaṇena co dṛśyati abhramaṇḍalam /

src_original: pūrvāntu jānīya kutaḥ prasūtaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.3 //

src_original: yathaiva taṃ pūrvu tathaiva paścāt tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // SRS_9.4 //
tgt_original: 如初、後亦爾，　　諸法亦復然；

src_original: yathaiva phenasya mahāntu piṇḍamoghena ucchettu naro nirīkṣate /

src_original: yanaiva so manyati alpaprajño tanmūlakaṃ duḥkha vivardhate 'sya // SRS_9.32 //

src_original: duḥkhasya mūlaṃ madu saṃnidarśitaṃ sarvajñinā lokavināyakena /

src_original: madena mattāna duḥkhaṃ pravardhate amanyamānāna dukhaṃ nirudhyate // SRS_9.33 //  kiyadbahūn dharma paryāpuṇeyyā śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrutena mattaḥ /  na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu tāyituṃ duḥśīla yena vrajamāna durgatim // SRS_9.34 //  kṣayetva so śīlaphalamaśeṣaṃ puno 'pi sa pratyanubhoti duḥkham // SRS_9.35 //

src_original: pratipattisārāśca vayaṃ bhagavan bhaviṣyāmaḥ anapekṣāḥ kāyajīvite ca bhūtvā tathāgatasyānu śikṣiṣyāmahe /

src_original: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavatastūḥṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanaṃ viditvā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ  kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakḥiṇīkṛtya bhagavato  'ntikāt prākrāmat //

src_original: atha khalu candaprabhaḥ kumārabhūto yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasamakrāmat /  praviśya ca tāmeva rātriṃ prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyamabhisaṃskārayati sma /  śatarasaṃ ca bhojanaṃ saṃpādya tasyā eva rātryā atyayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ susiktaṃ

src_original: pravarṣadbhiryena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /  candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya niveśane prakṣiptaśca bhagavatā dakṣiṇaścakraratnasamalaṃkṛtaḥ aparimitakuśalasaṃcitapādaratna indrakīle,  atha tāvadeva tasmin mahānagare anekāni āścaryādbhutāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /

src_original: sūryānanasya dvipadottamasya aṣṭādaśo varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.12 //
tgt_original: 彼日面佛無比尊，　　壽命一萬八千歲；

src_original: sūryānanasyoparatena buddho brahmānano nāma jino abhūṣi /
tgt_original: 彼佛次前復有佛，　　其佛號曰梵面親，

src_original: brahmānanasya dvipadottamasya triviṃśati varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.13 //
tgt_original: 彼梵面親兩足尊，　　壽命二萬三千歲；

src_original: brahmānanasyoparatena buddho brahmaśravo nāma jino abhūṣi /
tgt_original: 彼佛次前復有佛，　　其佛號曰梵婆藪，

src_original: brahmaśravasya dvipadottamasya aṣṭādaśo varṣasahasra āyuḥ // SRS_17.14 //
tgt_original: 彼梵婆藪天人師，　　壽命一萬八千歲。

src_original: ekasmi kalpasmi ime upannā duve śate lokavināyakānām /
tgt_original: 如是等佛同一劫，　　其數二百世導師，

src_original: śruṇohi nāmāniha kīrtayiṣye anābhibhūtān tathāgatānām // SRS_17.15 //
tgt_original: 汝聽我今說佛名，　　皆是三界世間親：

src_original: anantaghoṣaśca vighuṣṭaghoṣo vighuṣṭatejaśca vighuḥṭaśabdaḥ /
tgt_original: 無毀身佛、普音佛、　　遍威德佛、遍聲佛、

src_original: svarāvighuṣṭaśca svarārcitaśca svarāṅgaśūraśca svarāṅgaśabdaḥ // SRS_17.16 //
tgt_original: 聲供養佛、名聲佛、　　聲身勇佛、聲身淨、

src_original: brahmeśvaro brahmanarendranetre brahmasvarāṅgaḥ svarabrahmadattaḥ // SRS_17.18 //  tejobalastejavatiḥ sutejāḥ tejeśvarastejasamudrataśca /  tejovibhustejaviniścitaśca /
tgt_original: 善梵天佛、勝梵聲、　　梵音梵天梵施佛、

src_original: tejasvarendraḥ suvighuṣṭatejāḥ // SRS_17.19 //
tgt_original: 威力威主善威佛、　　威德自在起威佛、 威德眼佛、善勝佛、　　怖上怖慧善可怖、 可怖面佛、怖起佛、　　可怖怖上見實佛、 善眼月上勝導師、　　深遠音佛、無邊音、 淨音自在淨音佛、　　無量音佛、善現聲、 魔力音壞善眼佛、　　善眼淨面淨眼佛、

src_original: bhīṣmo balo bhīṣmamatiḥ subhīṣmo bhīṣmānano bhīṣmasamudrataśca /
tgt_original: 無量眼佛、普眼佛、　　善普眼佛、勝眼佛、

src_original: anantaghoṣaḥ suvimuktaghoṣo māro balo māravitrāsanaśca // SRS_17.21 //  sunetra śuddhānanu netraśuddho viśuddhanetraśca anantanetraḥ /
tgt_original: 眾因陀羅王眾佛、　　眾自在佛、映蔽眾、

src_original: samantanetraśca vighuṣṭanetro netrābhibhūrnetra aninditaśca // SRS_17.22 //  mahāgaṇendraśca gaṇendraśūro anyo puno gaṇivara pramocakaḥ // SRS_17.25 //
tgt_original: 眾勝淨智大眾主、　　眾主勇健大眾佛、

src_original: dharmadhvajaśco tatha dharmaketuḥ dharmottaro dharmasvabhāva udgataḥ /  dharmabalaścaiva sudharmaśūraḥ svabhāvadharmottaraniścitaśca // SRS_17.26 //
tgt_original: 見法法幢法起佛、　　法體性起法力佛、 法佛妙法勇健佛、　　自性法起決定佛。

src_original: svabhāvadharmottaraniścitasya aśītikoṭyaḥ sahanāmadheyāḥ /
tgt_original: 如此自性法起佛，　　合有八億皆同號，

src_original: dvitīyakalpasmi utpanna nāyakā ete mayā pūjita bodhikāraṇāt // SRS_17.27 //
tgt_original: 是佛出於第二劫，　　斯等如來我曾供。

src_original: svabhāvadharmottaraniścitasya yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute jinasya /
tgt_original: 自性法起決定佛，　　若有得聞其名者，

src_original: śrutvā ca dhāreti vighuṣṭa nāma sa kṣiprametaṃ labhate samādhim // SRS_17.28 //
tgt_original: 聞已受持淨業人，　　速能獲得是三昧。

src_original: eteṣa buddhān pareṇa anyo acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe /
tgt_original: 我今所說牟尼王，　　彼佛次後有餘佛，

src_original: narendraghoṣasya tathāgatasya ṣaṭsaptatī varṣasahasramāyuḥ /
tgt_original: 彼善勝王如來尊，　　壽命七萬六千歲。

src_original: trayaśca koṭīśata śrāvakāṇāṃ yaḥ sannipātaḥ prathamo abhūṣi // SRS_17.30 //
tgt_original: 是如來尊初會時，　　有羅漢眾三十億，

src_original: ṣaḍabhijña traividya jitendriyāṇāṃ mahānubhāvāna maharddhikānām /
tgt_original: 六通、三明、根調伏，　　具大威德、四神足，

src_original: kṣīṇāsravāṇāntimadehadhāriṇāṃ saṃghastadā āsi prabhākarasya // SRS_17.31 //
tgt_original: 住最後身諸漏盡，　　不為八法之所染。

src_original: abhijñaprāptāḥ pratibhānavanto gatigatāḥ sarvita śunyatāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 得六神通、具辯才，　　於諸法空學究竟，

src_original: ṛddhīya gacchanti te kṣetrakoṭiyo tatottare yāttika gaṅgavālukāḥ // SRS_17.33 //
tgt_original: 以神通力遊億剎，　　展轉教化過恒沙，

src_original: pṛcchitva praśnaṃ dvipadānanuttamān punenti tasyaiva jinasya antike /
tgt_original: 問諸如來所行道，　　還復住於本世界。

src_original: sūtrāntanirhāraniruktikovidā ālokabhūtā vicaranti medinīm // SRS_17.34 //
tgt_original: 博通一切修多羅，　　遊於世間作燈明，

src_original: sattvānamarthāya caranti cārikāṃ mahānubhāvāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ /
tgt_original: 是謂，佛子！ 大神力，　　為利眾生遊諸國。

src_original: na kāmahetoḥ prakaronti pāpaṃ devā pi teṣāṃ spṛha saṃjanenti // SRS_17.35 //
tgt_original: 遠離醜穢行梵行，　　不為欲故造諸惡，

src_original: anarthikā bhavagatiṣu na niśritāḥ samāhitā dhyānavihāragocarāḥ /  viniścitārthāśca viśāradāśca nirāmagandhāḥ sada brahmacāriṇaḥ // SRS_17.36 //
tgt_original: 常為諸天所憙樂，　　於諸有中無所依。 於空閑處常乞食，　　住於空寂行頭陀， 多聞巧言大福德，　　能於三界無所著。

src_original: acchedyavākyāḥ pratibhānavanto niruktinirdeśapadārthakovidāḥ /
tgt_original: 樂於禪定無所畏，　　於義決定獲辯才，

src_original: sarvatrasaṃdarśaka buddhaputrāḥ parigṛhītāḥ kuśalena karmaṇā // SRS_17.37 //  anantakalpāścariyāya udgatāḥ stutāḥ praśastāḥ sada nāyakehi /
tgt_original: 於辭句義已善學，　　佛子一問悉究竟。 攝護一切諸善業，　　於無量劫修行滿，

src_original: vimokṣatattvārthapadāna deśakāḥ asaṃkiliṣṭāḥ suviśuddhaśīlāḥ // SRS_17.38 //
tgt_original: 常為諸佛之所讚，　　演說解脫道句義。

src_original: anopaliptāḥ padumena vāriṇā vimukta traidhātukato 'pramattāḥ /  anopaliptāṣṭahi lokadharmairviśuddhakāyāḥ pariśuddhakarmāḥ // SRS_17.39 //
tgt_original: 持戒清淨無穢污，　　如花處水無所著， 於三界中常起厭，　　不為世法之所染。

src_original: alpeccha saṃtuṣṭa mahānubhāvā agṛddha te buddhaguṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 其心清淨業善淨，　　少欲知足具威德，

src_original: sarveṣa sattvāna gatiḥ parāyaṇā na ghoṣamātrapratipattisārāḥ // SRS_17.40 //  yatra sthitāstaṃ ca pareṣu deśayu sarvehi buddhehi parigṛhītāḥ /  (Vaidya 110)  vaiśvāsikāḥ kośadharā jinānāṃ te sarvi traidhātuki trastamānasāḥ // SRS_17.41 //
tgt_original: 安住當來聖德中，　　亦住三明殊勝道。 要在修行非口言，　　自安於法為他說， 為諸如來善攝受，　　委付一切佛法藏。

src_original: praśāntacittāḥ sada raṇyagocarā adhiṣṭhitā lokavināyakebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 於三界中起怖畏，　　以寂靜心常修定，

src_original: bhāṣanti sutrāntasahasrakoṭiyo yaṃ caiva bhāṣanti ta buddhavarṇitam // SRS_17.42 //
tgt_original: 常為諸佛所加護，　　說千億種修多羅。

src_original: vivarjitāḥ sarvapadebhi laukikāḥ śūnyādhimuktāḥ paramārthadeśakāḥ /  anantavarṇā guṇasāgaropamāḥ bahuśrutāḥ paṇḍita vijñavantaḥ // SRS_17.43 //
tgt_original: 若說億種修多羅，　　遠離一切世間教， 信於空寂說深義，　　無量名稱德如海。

src_original: sacet kumāro bahukalpakoṭiya adhiṣṭhihantaḥ pravadeya varṇam /  sa alpakaṃ tat parikīrtitaṃ bhaved yathā samudrādudabindurekaḥ // SRS_17.44 //
tgt_original: 童子！ 我於無量劫，　　常讚歎彼無餘間，我今但說其少分，　　猶如大海水一渧。

src_original: tasyo imaṃ śānta samādhi bhāṣataḥ prakampitā medini ṣaḍvikāram /
tgt_original: 彼佛說此寂定時，　　爾時大地六種動，

src_original: devā manuṣyā yatha gaṅgavālikā avivartikāye sthita buddhajñāne // SRS_17.46 //
tgt_original: 天、人眾數如恒沙，　　安住不退菩提道。

src_original: tatrāsi rājā manujāna īśvaraḥ śirībalo nāma mahānubhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 有王最上人中尊，　　號功德力大威神，

src_original: putrāṇa tasyo śata pañca āsannabhirūpa prāsādika darśanīyāḥ // SRS_17.47 //
tgt_original: 具足有於五百子，　　顏貌端正甚壞麗，

src_original: aśīti koṭīśata istriyāṇāmantaḥpuraṃ tasya abhūṣi rājñaḥ /
tgt_original: 有妙夫人數八億，　　悉是王宮內眷屬，

src_original: caturdaśo koṭisahasra pūrṇā duhitaro tasya abhūṣi rājñaḥ // SRS_17.48 //
tgt_original: 彼功德王所生女，　　合有一千四百億。

src_original: sa kārtikāyāṃ tada pūrṇamāsyāmaṣṭāṅgikaṃ poṣadhamādaditvā /
tgt_original: 是王八月十五日，　　方欲善受八戒齋，

src_original: (Vaidya 111)  aśītikoṭīniyutehi sārdhamupāgamallokagurusya antikam // SRS_17.49 //
tgt_original: 共於八億那由人，　　俱時往詣如來所。

src_original: vanditva pādau dvipadottamasya nyaṣīdi rājā purato jinasya /
tgt_original: 稽首無上兩足尊，　　即於佛前坐一面，

src_original: adhyāśayaṃ tasya viditva rājño imaṃ samādhiṃ dvipadendra deśayi // SRS_17.50 //
tgt_original: 如來知彼心所樂，　　即便為說勝三昧。

src_original: sa pārthivaḥ śratva samādhimetamutsṛjya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍam /
tgt_original: 是王聞斯三昧已，　　棄捨王位如涕唾，

src_original: parityajitvā priya jñātibāndhavān sa pravrajī tasya jinasya śāsane // SRS_17.51 //
tgt_original: 并捨一切所親愛，　　於彼佛所而出家。

src_original: putrāṇa pañcāśata pravrajiṃsu antaḥpuraṃ caiva tathaiva dhītaro /
tgt_original: 夫人、後宮、調順子、　　及諸女等皆出家，

src_original: anye ca tatra putrajñātibāndhavāḥ ṣaṭsaptatirnayuta trayaśca koṭyaḥ // SRS_17.52 //
tgt_original: 後宮眷屬及親眾，　　七十六萬那由他。

src_original: sa pravrajitveha saputradāraṃ sthapetva āhāranirhārabhūmim /
tgt_original: 彼王、妻、子出家者，　　安住勇猛常精進，

src_original: adhiṣṭhitaścaṃkrami aṣṭavarṣaṃ sa caṃkrame vasthitu kāla kārṣīt // SRS_17.53 //
tgt_original: 經行不住滿八年，　　於經行時便命終。

src_original: sa kālu kṛtvā tada rājakuñjaro samādhicitto susamāhitaḥ sadā /
tgt_original: 此大聖王命終已，　　還生本處王宮中，

src_original: tatraiva so rājakule upanno upapāduko garbhamalairaliptaḥ // SRS_17.54 //
tgt_original: 忽然化生無胎染，　　是時如來猶在世。

src_original: dṛḍhabalo nāma pitāsya bhūṣi mahāmatī nāma janetri āsīt /
tgt_original: 其父號曰堅固力、　　其母號曰大智慧，

src_original: sa jātamātro avacī kumāro kaccinnu so tiṣṭhati lokanāthaḥ // SRS_17.55 //
tgt_original: 其王生已白父母： 　　『勝音王佛住世不？

src_original: jānāti me āśayu lokanātho yeno mamā śānta samādhi deśitaḥ /  (Vaidya 112)
tgt_original: 時彼勝音王如來，　　曾為我說勝三昧，

src_original: apratyayā apagatapratyayā ca yo eka nirdeśu bhave gatīnām // SRS_17.56 //
tgt_original: 非是因緣、非無緣，　　於諸有中唯說一。

src_original: yā sarvadharmāṇa svabhāvamudrā yaḥ sūtrakoṭīniyutāna āgamaḥ /
tgt_original: 一切諸法體性印，　　出千萬億修多羅，

src_original: yo bodhisattvāna dhanaṃ nirūttaraṃ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.57 //
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩無上財，　　今佛猶說三昧不？

src_original: kāyasya śuddhī tatha vāca śuddhī cittasya śuddhistatha dṛṣṭiśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 身業、口業皆清淨、　　意業清淨、知見淨，

src_original: ārambaṇānāṃ samatikramo yaḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.58 //
tgt_original: 出過一切諸攀緣，　　是佛猶說三昧耶？

src_original: anutpāda sākṣātkriyayāvatāraḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.60 //
tgt_original: 證於無生寂滅忍，　　是佛猶說三昧耶？

src_original: pratisaṃvidā śāntyavatārajñānaṃ sarvākṣarāṇāṃ ca prabhedajñānam /
tgt_original: 無礙辯才入寂智，　　達解文字差別智，

src_original: vastuniveśasamatikramo yaḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.61 //
tgt_original: 能過一切取著事，　　是佛猶說三昧耶？

src_original: ghoṣaḥ parijñātha prāmodyalābhaḥ prītiśca bhotī sugatāna varṇam /
tgt_original: 知諸音聲得欣喜，　　見諸佛已起深樂，

src_original: nā jātu kuryādbhukuṭiṃ sa sūrataḥ sākhilya mādhurya smitaṃ mukhaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 不起瞋怒恒調善，　　發言美好常含笑，

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca sattvān prathamālapeti kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.63 //
tgt_original: 見諸眾生先語慰，　　佛猶說是三昧不？

src_original: anālasyatā gauravatā gurūṇāṃ śuśrūṣaṇā vandana premadarśanā /
tgt_original: 恭敬尊長無懈倦，　　禮拜供養恒瞻視，

src_original: upapatti saṃtuṣṭita śuklatā ca kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.64 //
tgt_original: 其身清淨具白法，　　法王猶說三昧不？

src_original: ājīvaśuddhistatha raṇyavāso dhūte sthitānusmṛterapramoṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 於諸白法常無厭，　　住於空閑離邪命，

src_original: skandheṣu kauśalyamathāpi dhātuṣu kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.65 //
tgt_original: 憶念諸地不忘失，　　法王猶說三昧不？

src_original: āyatanakauśalyamabhijñajñānaṃ kileśaapakarṣaṇa dāntabhūmi /
tgt_original: 於陰善巧智神通，　　遠離煩惱調伏地，

src_original: pṛthusarvamantrāṇamasāvucchedaḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.66 //
tgt_original: 能斷凡夫語言道，　　法王猶說三昧耶？

src_original: dharme ca cittaṃ śruta eṣaṇā ca kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.67 //
tgt_original: 及離一切諸親愛，　　法王猶說三昧耶？

src_original: yatra sthito 'nuśayitāṃ jahāti kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.68 //
tgt_original: 其心敬法聞總持，　　佛今猶說三昧耶？

src_original: tīkṣṇasya jñānasya varāgamo yato acāliyo śailasamo akampitaḥ /
tgt_original: 出生深利勝智慧，　　信樂不動如山王，

src_original: avivartitālakṣaṇa dhāraṇīmukhaṃ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.69 //
tgt_original: 得總持門不退轉，　　世親猶說三昧不？

src_original: śuklāna dharmāṇa sadā gaveṣaṇā pāpāna dharmāṇa sadā vivarjanā /
tgt_original: 常求一切白淨法，　　於惡法中恒遠離，

src_original: sarvāsu śikṣāsu gatiṃgato viduḥ samādhyavasthānagatiṃgataśca /
tgt_original: 諸學究竟得自在，　　於諸禪定已窮盡，

src_original: viśeṣajñānaṃ upapattijñānaṃ anantajñānaṃ susamāptajñānam /
tgt_original: 勝智增長知生智、　　無量智慧平等智、

src_original: gṛhān samutsṛjya pravrajyacittaṃ traidhātuke anabhiratī nanugrahaḥ /
tgt_original: 信心出家捨俗地，　　不著三界無所依，

src_original: cittasya saṃpragrahaṇaṃ saharṣaṇā deśeti dharmaṃ dvipadānamuttamaḥ // SRS_17.73 //
tgt_original: 制伏其心令欣喜，　　是佛說是勝菩提；

src_original: dharmeṣu co nābhiniveśa tāyi parigraho dharmavare sadā ca /  karmavipāke ca dṛḍhādhimuktiṃ deśeti dharma dvipadānamuttamaḥ // SRS_17.74 //
tgt_original: 於諸法中無執著，　　常能攝受一切法， 於諸業果信不動，　　最勝世尊說是法；

src_original: vinayasmi kauśalya vipākajñānaṃ kalahaṃ vivādāna tathopaśāntiḥ /
tgt_original: 戒律持犯果報智，　　滅於一切諸諍論，

src_original: avigrahaṃ vāpyavivādabhūmiṃ deśeti dharma dvipadānamuttamaḥ // SRS_17.75 //
tgt_original: 能說非違非諍地，　　兩足牟尼說是法；

src_original: kṣāntīsamādānamakrodhasthānaṃ viniścaye dharmi sadā ca kauśalam /
tgt_original: 受於忍辱無瞋怒，　　於諸問答能善巧，

src_original: pūrvāntajñānamaparāntajñānaṃ triyadhvasamatā sugatāna śāsane /
tgt_original: 知於過去、未來際，　　能知三世佛法性，

src_original: pariccheda uktaḥ sa trimaṇḍalasya evaṃ jino deśayi dharmasvāmī // SRS_17.77 //
tgt_original: 知於三世分段智，　　自然世尊說是法；

src_original: cittavyavasthāna ekāgratā ca kāyavyavasthāna yathāryabhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 常能係心於一處、　　常能安身於聖地，

src_original: īryāpathastho sada kāli rakṣaṇā deśeti dharmaṃ puruṣarṣabho muniḥ // SRS_17.78 //  hiriśca otrāpyu prāsādikaṃ ca yuktāṃ giraṃ bhāṣati lokajñānam /  pravṛttidharmaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca prāṇināṃ deśeti dharmaṃ varabodhiumagryām // SRS_17.79 //
tgt_original: 於諸威儀常不改，　　人中牛王說是法； 有慚有愧自莊嚴，　　知於世間應時語， 一切常舒布施手，　　無上世親說是法；

src_original: anugrahaṃ co hirimotrāpyaṃ ca cittasya cākuśalatā jugupsanā /
tgt_original: 常能攝心有慚愧，　　亦常厭離惡不善，

src_original: dhūtasyānutsargata piṇḍacaryāṃ deśeti dharmaṃ dvipadānamuttamaḥ // SRS_17.80 //  mānasya co nigraha āditaiva evaṃ jino deśayi dharmasvāmī // SRS_17.81 //
tgt_original: 隨順頭陀常分衛，　　牟尼王尊說勝法；

src_original: ajñānapakṣasya sadā vivarjanā deśeti dharmān varabuddhabodhim // SRS_17.82 //
tgt_original: 遠離無知諸障礙，　　如是勝人說是法；

src_original: cittapraveśaṃ ca rūtasya jñānaṃ niruktyavasthāna viniścitārtham /
tgt_original: 能入心智語言智，　　決定能知諸言辭，

src_original: sarveṣvanarthāna sadā vivarjanam evaṃ jino deśayi dharmasvāmī // SRS_17.83 //
tgt_original: 遠離一切無利事，　　法王如來說是法； 常得親近善知識，　　遠離一切不善者，

src_original: jine prasādaṃ sada prematāṃ ca evaṃ jino deśayi dharma śreṣṭham // SRS_17.84 //
tgt_original: 常得信佛不放逸，　　牟尼說是無上法；

src_original: saṃketaprajñaptivyāhāratāṃ ca saṃsāraduḥkhāni sadā vivarjanā /
tgt_original: 知世假名但言說，　　常厭一切世間苦，

src_original: alābhi lābhe ca asaktabhāvamevaṃ jino deśayi dharmamuttamam // SRS_17.85 //
tgt_original: 於利得失無憂喜，　　牟尼說是最勝法；

src_original: satkāru labdhvā ca na vismayeyyā asatkṛtaścāpi bhavedupekṣakaḥ /
tgt_original: 若得恭敬心不高、　　不得恭敬心放捨、

src_original: bhūte 'pi varṇaṃ na kadāci modiye iya deśanā lokahitasya īdṛśī // SRS_17.86 //
tgt_original: 得稱實歎心不喜，　　是世間師說是法；

src_original: (Vaidya 116)  ākrośanāṃ paṃsana sarvaśo sahedasaṃstavaḥ sarvagṛhīhi sārdham /
tgt_original: 常捨一切諸惡道，　　不與俗流相交通，

src_original: buddhāna co gocari supratiṣṭhito agocaraṃ sarva vivarjayitvā /
tgt_original: 勇者遠離非行處，　　於佛所行常安住，

src_original: ācārasaṃpanna sudāntacitto iya dharmanetrī sugatena deśitā // SRS_17.88 //
tgt_original: 威儀具足心善調，　　如是法母佛所說；

src_original: ye bāladharmāḥ sada tān vivarjayet kuladūṣaṇaṃ sarva vivarjayecca /
tgt_original: 常遠一切凡愚法、　　亦遠一切污家法，

src_original: ārakṣitavyaṃ sada buddhaśāsanaṃ evaṃ jino deśayi dharmasvāmī // SRS_17.89 //
tgt_original: 常護一切諸佛法，　　是法大智之所說；

src_original: alpaṃ ca bhāṣye madhuraṃ suyuktaṃ kalyāṇatāṃ mṛduvacanaṃ pareṣām /
tgt_original: 少言美妙善相應，　　於他人處能軟語，

src_original: pratyarthikānāṃ sahadharmanigraho iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.90 //
tgt_original: 如法降伏諸怨敵，　　大智慧日之教法；

src_original: pratikramet kāli na co akāle na viśvaset sarvapṛthagjaneṣu /
tgt_original: 知時節量諸飲食，　　慎勿委信凡夫法，

src_original: duḥkhena spṛṣṭo na bhaveta durmanā iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.91 //
tgt_original: 若遇苦緣心不慼，　　是為如來善勝教；

src_original: hitavastutāyāṃ sada ovadeyya iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.92 //
tgt_original: 若見貧人令得財、　　若見破戒起悲救， 以悲愍心為開曉，　　如是勝法如來教；

src_original: dharmeṇa sattvā anugṛhṇitavyā lokāmiṣatyāgu sadā ca kāryo /
tgt_original: 常以法攝諸眾生，　　及捨一切諸財物，

src_original: na saṃcayaṃ no nicayaṃ ca kuryādiyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.93 //
tgt_original: 於諸八法無貯畜，　　如來大聖所說教；

src_original: śīlapraśaṃsā ca kuśīlakutsanā aśāṭhyatā śīlavatāṃ niṣevaṇam /
tgt_original: 讚歎持戒訶破戒，　　堅持淨戒不詐偽，

src_original: sarvasvakātyāgi dhane 'pyaniśrito iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.94 //
tgt_original: 不積資財能棄捨，　　此是如來最勝教；

src_original: adhyāśayeno guruṇā nimantraṇā yathā ca bhāṣe tatha sarva kuryām /
tgt_original: 深心啟請諸師長，　　隨所言說悉能行，

src_original: abhīkṣṇa seveyya ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.95 //
tgt_original: 常能親近諸法師，　　如是如來最勝教；

src_original: sagauravaḥ prītamanāḥ sadā bhavet somyāya dṛṣṭīya sadā sthito bhavet /
tgt_original: 心常愛樂恒恭敬，　　亦恒安住於正見，

src_original: pūrvāsu caryāsu suniścitaḥ sadā iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.96 //
tgt_original: 於諸善業能決定，　　如是如來最勝教； 造諸善行為上首，　　善巧方便棄捨相， 遠離於想及事相，　　是為如來無上教；

src_original: sūtrāntanirhārapadeṣu kauśalaṃ satyāna nirdeśapadeṣu niścayaḥ /
tgt_original: 於修多羅能解知，　　實諦句義善修學，

src_original: vimuktijñānasya ca sākṣikāritā iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.98 //
tgt_original: 證解脫智常善巧，　　是為如來最勝教； 發言出於揩正語，　　心境相稱詞決定， 有所宣說無有疑，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: śūnyāśca dharmāḥ sada sevitavyā viśāradāḥ śīlabale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 常應修習諸法空，　　安住戒力無所畏，

src_original: samādhisthānena samottareyyā iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.99 //
tgt_original: 遊行一切寂定處，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: na jñātralābhaṃ pi kadāci deśayeccittasya cāpī kuhanāṃ na kuryāt /
tgt_original: 不求親愛及利養，　　其心無有諸諂曲，

src_original: dṛṣṭīkṛtāṃ sarva vivarjayecca iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.100 //
tgt_original: 遠離一切諸惡見，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: pratibhānu śreṣṭhaṃ vara dhāraṇīye jñānasya cobhāsu anantapāro /
tgt_original: 於陀羅尼得勝辯，　　智慧照明廣無邊，

src_original: adhiṣṭhānamantra pratibhānayuktiriyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.101 //
tgt_original: 說法不斷辯才淨，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: śīlasya dvāramima mārgabhāvanā pratipatti - ovādanayaśca bhadrako /  anuśāsanī atra caritva śāsanī iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.102 //
tgt_original: 於四法門久修習，　　能入於行最賢善， 於此佛教奉修行，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: anulomikī kṣānti ya buddhavarṇitā kṣāntisthito doṣa vivarjayeta /
tgt_original: 於佛所說隨順忍，　　安住彼忍離諸過，

src_original: ajñāna varjeyya sthihitva jñāne iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.103 //
tgt_original: 遠離非智住於智，　　是為如來最勝教；

src_original: jñānapratiṣṭhā tatha yogabhūmī yogeśvarī bodhayi prasthitānām /
tgt_original: 以智住於方便地，　　修習菩薩善巧行，

src_original: niṣevaṇā satpuruṣāṇa nityaṃ iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.104 //
tgt_original: 為善丈夫所修行，　　是為諸佛最勝教；

src_original: ayuktayogīna sadā vivarjanā tathāgatairbhāṣita buddhabhūmi /
tgt_original: 常離不應方便者，　　如來說此為佛地，

src_original: anumoditā sarvihi paṇḍitehi iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.105 //
tgt_original: 若與智和佛隨喜，　　是名如來最勝教；

src_original: bālaiḥ pratikṣipta ajñātakehi abhūbhiratra pṛthuśrāvakāṇām /
tgt_original: 佛地廣大非二乘，　　凡愚無智生毀謗，

src_original: parigṛhītāḥ sada bodhisattvaiḥ iyaṃ jine īdṛśa ānuśāsanī // SRS_17.106 //
tgt_original: 智者諸佛所攝受，　　是名如來最勝教。

src_original: tathāgatehi anubuddhametaṃ devehi co satkṛtu pūjitaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 如來善知此法門，　　諸天恭敬所供養、

src_original: anumoditaṃ brahmasahasrakoṭibhiḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.107 //
tgt_original: 千億梵眾恒隨喜，　　如來猶說三昧不？

src_original: nāgasahasrehi sadā susatkṛtaṃ suparṇayakṣehi ca kinnarehi /
tgt_original: 無量千龍恒禮拜、　　緊那金翅常讚歎，

src_original: yā bhāṣitā bodhivarā jinebhiḥ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.108 //
tgt_original: 菩提樹下所得者，　　如來猶說三昧不？

src_original: paryāpta yā nityu supaṇḍitehi dhanaṃ ca śriṣṭhaṃ pravaraṃ sulabdham /
tgt_original: 常為智人所求者，　　是善勝法之資財，

src_original: nirāmiṣaṃ jñāna cikitsa uttamā kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.109 //
tgt_original: 非為財施無上藥，　　如來猶說三昧不？

src_original: jñānasya koṣaḥ pratibhānamakṣayaṃ sūtrāntakoṭīna praveśa eṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 智慧腑藏辯無盡，　　能出億妙修多羅，

src_original: parijña traidhātuki bhūtajñānaṃ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.110 //
tgt_original: 善知三界如實智，　　如來猶說三昧不？

src_original: naukā iyaṃ deśita pāragāmināṃ nāvā pi co oghagatāna eṣā /
tgt_original: 說於船筏渡彼岸，　　不為四瀑之所漂，

src_original: kīrtiryaśo vardhati varṇamālā yeṣāmayaṃ śānta samādhi deśitaḥ // SRS_17.111 //
tgt_original: 令名聞鬘得增長，　　是以說此三昧定。

src_original: praśaṃsa eṣā ca tathāgatānāṃ stavaśca eṣo puruṣarṣabhāṇām /
tgt_original: 讚歎十種最勝力、　　及讚人中大牛王，

src_original: stava bodhisattvāna nayaśca akṣayo yehī ayaṃ śānta samādhi deśitaḥ // SRS_17.112 //
tgt_original: 菩薩功德勝無盡，　　正由得是三昧故；

src_original: maitrī iyaṃ doṣaśame prakāśitā upekṣiyaṃ kāruṇikāna bhūmim /  āśvāsayanteṣa mahāśayānāṃ yeṣāṃ kṛtenaiṣa samādhi bhāṣitaḥ // SRS_17.113 //
tgt_original: 說於慈心除瞋恚，　　行大悲人大喜、捨， 於大乘者得穌息，　　正由說此勝三昧；

src_original: pratipattiyaṃ deśita siṃhanādināmitu buddhajñānasya varasya āgamaḥ /
tgt_original: 為師子吼說勝行，　　此是佛智勝阿含，

src_original: sarveṣa dharmāṇa svabhāvamudrāḥ samādhyayaṃ deśitu nāyakehi // SRS_17.114 //
tgt_original: 一切諸法體性印，　　如是三昧佛所說；

src_original: sarvajñajñānasya ca āharitrimā caryā iyaṃ bodhayi prasthitānām /
tgt_original: 能招一切種智智，　　求菩提者之園苑，

src_original: vitrāsanaṃ māracamūya cāpi samādhyayaṃ śānta jinena deśitaḥ // SRS_17.115 //
tgt_original: 此能破壞魔軍眾，　　謂是佛說勝寂定；

src_original: pratyarthiṃkānāṃ sahadharmanigrahāḥ samādhyayaṃ śānta jinena deśitaḥ // SRS_17.116 //
tgt_original: 無生寂滅妙法印，　　導師所說勝三昧；

src_original: pratibhānabhūmī iya saṃprakāśitā balā vimokṣā tatha indriyāṇi /
tgt_original: 顯示無礙辯才地、　　諸力、解脫及諸根、

src_original: viśiṣṭa aṣṭādaśa buddhadharmāḥ samādhi śānteṣa niṣevamāṇāḥ // SRS_17.117 //
tgt_original: 最勝十八不共法，　　由斯三昧得是法。

src_original: daśāna paryeṣṭi balāna bhūtā pūrvanimittaṃ pi ca buddhajñāne /
tgt_original: 求十力者之實法、　　諸佛勝智之本因，

src_original: ye buddhadharmāḥ puruṣottamena prakāśitā lokahitānukampinā // SRS_17.118 //  buddhāna putrebhirayaṃ pratīhito vimokṣakāmānayu mārgu deśitaḥ /
tgt_original: 佛大丈夫所說法，　　憐愍救護世間故。 最勝佛子所攝受、　　求解脫者所欲樂，

src_original: prītiśca tasmin sugatātmajānāṃ śruṇitvimaṃ śānta samādhi durdṛśam // SRS_17.119 //
tgt_original: 聞是寂靜難見定，　　為諸佛子之所愛。

src_original: yā buddhajñānasya ca pāripūritā yābheṣate paṇḍitu bodhisattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸佛滿足智慧處，　　智慧菩薩起求心，

src_original: viśuddhacittaśca śucirniraṅgaṇo imaṃ niṣeveta samādhi śāntam // SRS_17.120 //
tgt_original: 其心清淨無煩惱，　　應修如是寂滅定；

src_original: pariśuddha kāyo 'sya yathā jināna vimokṣajñānaṃ ca vimuktidarśanam /
tgt_original: 身業清淨、口亦淨，　　如來為示解脫門，

src_original: asaṃkiliṣṭaḥ sada rāgabandhanaiḥ imaṃ niṣeveta samādhi bhadrakam // SRS_17.121 //
tgt_original: 無有雜穢愛欲縛，　　應當勤修是三昧；

src_original: vimuktisārāṇiya tṛpti bhāṣitā dhyāyīnayaṃ śānta samādhi deśitaḥ /  cakṣuśca buddhānamaninditānāmimaṃ niṣeveta samādhi śāntam // SRS_17.123 //
tgt_original: 離譏毀譽如來眼，　　應當修習是三昧；

src_original: abhijña eṣā bahukṣetre darśitā ṛddhiśca buddhāna ananta darśitā /
tgt_original: 遊行通力多佛剎，　　神足能見諸佛德，

src_original: yā dhāraṇī sāpi tato na durlabhā niṣevamāṇasya samādhimetam // SRS_17.124 //  (Vaidya 121)
tgt_original: 陀羅尼門得不難，　　應修如是勝寂定；

src_original: śāntendriyasyo iha sthānu bodhaye idamadhiṣṭhānamanantadarśitam /  sūkṣmaṃ ca jñānaṃ vipulaṃ viśuddhaṃ niṣevamāṇasya imaṃ samādhim // SRS_17.125 //
tgt_original: 加持念根得菩提，　　亦能加持見多佛， 以微細智說無生，　　修是三昧得不難。 不應法者難覺悟，　　遠離一切文字故，

src_original: su budhyate naiṣa ayuktayogairvivartanaṃ sarvasu akṣarāṇām /  na śakyu ghoṣeṇa vijānanāya yeno ayaṃ śānta samādhi na śrutaḥ // SRS_17.126 //
tgt_original: 不以音聲能了解，　　曾不聞定故不知。

src_original: jñātaṃ tu vijñairayu bodhisattvairyathā va yaṃ deśitu dharmasvāminā /
tgt_original: 智慧菩薩已解了，　　如法王說而能知，

src_original: ārabdhavīryehi samudgṛhītamupasthitaṃ ca sāpi sadā sudhāritam /
tgt_original: 勇猛精進能善持，　　堅固護念恒不失，

src_original: duḥkhakṣayo jātinirodhajñānamimaṃ samādhiṃ pratiṣevamāṇaiḥ // SRS_17.128 //
tgt_original: 盡苦智慧及滅智，　　佛猶說是三昧不？

src_original: sarveṣa dharmāṇamajāti bhāṣitā evaṃ ca sarvāsu bhavaggatīṣu /
tgt_original: 演說一切法無生、　　亦說一切諸有生，

src_original: jñānāgru buddhāna mahāśayānāṃ kaccijjino bhāṣati taṃ samādhim // SRS_17.129 //
tgt_original: 諸佛如來妙智最，　　佛猶說是三昧不？

src_original: artho ayaṃ vuccati kāyasaṃvaro arthaśca śabdena na śakyu deśitum /

src_original: yo jānatī īdṛśu dharmanetrīṃ sa saṃvare 'smin bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_38.7 //

src_original: arthe prayuktāna mayārthu deśito ye arthanetrīparatā vicakṣaṇāḥ /

src_original: anarthu varjenti ya arthayuktā te saṃvare 'smin satataṃ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_38.8 //
tgt_original: 遠離非義應真義，　　斯則常名住身戒；

src_original: artho ya ukto hi jināna śāsane kathaṃ sa artho bhavatī vijānato /

src_original: yo arthanetrīya svabhāvu jānati pratiṣṭhitaḥ socyati kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.9 //
tgt_original: 若能知於相應義，　　是即名為住身戒。

src_original: yenānimittaṃ bhavatī vijānitaṃ nairātmyataḥ śūnyatu tucchato vā /

src_original: na tasya jātū bhavati nasaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.10 //
tgt_original: 彼人不名無戒者，　　是人修學實際故。

src_original: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /  sa ānimittaṃ spṛśatī samādhim // SRS_38.11 //

src_original: vijñāta yeneha nirātmadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ prakṛtiprabhāsvarāḥ /

src_original: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvarastathāhi so śikṣitu bhūtaniścaye // SRS_38.12 //
tgt_original: 是人不名無戒者，　　已覺決定真實故；

src_original: na tasya jātu bhavatī asaṃvaro yat karma kāyena samācareta // SRS_38.13 //

src_original: rūpeṣu āsvādagatasya jantunaḥ prakupyate rāga asaṃvṛtasya // SRS_38.14 //

src_original: ye bhūtakoṭīya bhavanti śikṣitā gatiṃgatāḥ sūrata śūnyatāyām /

src_original: na teṣa rāgaḥ puna jātu kupyate asaṃvaro yena vrajeta durgatim // SRS_38.15 //
tgt_original: 彼不更起於愛欲，　　不為無戒墮惡道。

src_original: na śakyu kampetu yathā sumeru acāliyaḥ sarvapipīlikairmahān /

src_original: tathā vidū bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito rūpehi divyairapi so na kampate // SRS_38.16 //
tgt_original: 若有善學實法者，　　諸天妙色不能動；

src_original: śakyeta raṅgairgaganaṃ vicitrituṃ śakyeta cākāśa gṛhītu pāṇinā /
tgt_original: 彩色可以畫虛空、　　亦可手執於太虛，

src_original: na tveva śakyaṃ sa vicālanāya rāgeṇa doṣeṇa na ca mārakoṭibhiḥ // SRS_38.17 //
tgt_original: 一切諸魔愛、欲等，　　無有能得動搖者；

src_original: pratiśrukā śakyu gṛhītu kenacicchilā plavedapyudakasya madhye /
tgt_original: 呼響音聲猶可捉、　　大石沈水亦可浮，

src_original: draṣṭuṃ na śakyaṃ tviha tasya āśayā yaḥ śikṣito īdṛśi kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.18 //
tgt_original: 如是學於身戒者，　　無有能知彼心念；

src_original: yāvanta śabdāḥ pṛthu sarvaloke gṛhṇitva peḍāgata śakya kartum /
tgt_original: 所有一切諸音聲，　　悉皆盛內於篋中，

src_original: na tasya śakyaṃ sthitirasthitirvā vijānituṃ yaḥ sthitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.19 //
tgt_original: 若住如是身戒者，　　無有能知彼住所；

src_original: śakyaṃ prabhā gṛhṇitu sūryamaṇḍalāt pragarjato meghatu vidyuto vā /

src_original: na tasya kāyasya svabhāva jñātuṃ yaḥ śikṣitaḥ syādiha kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.20 //
tgt_original: 若有住於身戒者，　　無能知彼身自性；

src_original: jālena pāśena ca śakyu bandhituṃ caturdiśaṃ vāyati vātamaṇḍalī /
tgt_original: 四方所有諸風輪，　　羅網、鈎羂可繫縛，

src_original: na śakyamājānitu tasya kāyaḥ pratiṣṭhito yo iha kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.21 //
tgt_original: 若有住於身戒者，　　無有能知彼身量。

src_original: agocaro 'sāviha sarvaprāṇināṃ yatra sthito yo vidu cittasaṃyame /

src_original: yatra sthito gocari kāyasaṃvare na lipyate khamiva sa lokadharmaiḥ // SRS_38.22 //
tgt_original: 能善修習身戒者，　　猶如虛空無能染。

src_original: śakyaṃ padaṃ paśyitu sarvaprāṇināṃ name carantāna pṛthak caturdiśam /

src_original: na tasya kāyasya na cittagocaro pramāṇu jñātumiha śakya kenacit // SRS_38.23 //

src_original: evaṃ sthitasyo iha kāyasaṃvare sarve na bhonti vividhāḥ kileśāḥ /
tgt_original: 若住如是身戒者，　　彼無一切諸過惡，

src_original: prahīṇa tasyeha upakileśāstathā hyasau śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.24 //

src_original: na tasya agniḥ kramate na śastraṃ tathāpi agrāhyu sa tasya kāyaḥ /
tgt_original: 住於清淨寂滅定，　　不為刀、火之所害，

src_original: śantapraśānte sthitu so samādhau tathā hyasau śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.25 //
tgt_original: 彼身無能執捉者，　　由常修學身戒故；

src_original: evaṃ sthitasyo na bhayaṃ na trāso na kṣobhu cittasyu na cerṣyu jāyate /
tgt_original: 如是住者無怖畏，　　心無紛動、無嫉妬，

src_original: muktaḥ sa sarvebhirupadravebhiryaḥ śikṣito tādṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.26 //
tgt_original: 遠離一切諸厄難，　　修學如是身戒故；

src_original: viṣasya śastrasya na jātu bhāyati na cāgnimadhye na jalasya madhye /
tgt_original: 不畏刀杖及毒藥，　　亦不怖畏水、火災，

src_original: sarvehi muktaḥ sa upadravehi ya śikṣito īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.27 //
tgt_original: 遠離一切諸厄難，　　修學如是身戒故。

src_original: caurāṇa dhūrtāna ca pāpakāriṇāmāśīviṣāmadhyagato na bhāyate /

src_original: tathā hi tasyo vigatātmasaṃjñā saṃjñāvimuktasya bhayaṃ na bhoti // SRS_38.28 //

src_original: bhayairvimuktasya na trāsu jāyate asaṃtrasantasya na bhoti iñjanā /
tgt_original: 遠離怖畏及恐懼，　　以無怖畏心不動，

src_original: (Vaidya 284)  aniñjamānasya kuto 'sti trāso na mārakoṭībhi sa śakyu kampitum // SRS_38.29 //

src_original: ācakṣito deśitu saṃprakāśito yo bodhisattvasya hitāya saṃvaraḥ /

src_original: dvātriṃśa co lakṣaṇa cittaśuddhā na durlabhā bhonti sthitasya saṃvare // SRS_38.31 //

src_original: ya icchate budhyitu buddhadharmān acintiyān yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
tgt_original: 若有欲知是佛法，　　不可思議寂滅眾，

src_original: sa śikṣitu īdṛśuḥ kāyasaṃvare bhaviṣyate cetiyu sarvaloke // SRS_38.32 //
tgt_original: 若學如是身戒者，　　其行堅固速成佛； 若有欲得大仙法，　　不可思議佛十力， 若學如是身戒者，　　修習佛力得不難； 十八最勝不共法，　　諸佛、如來所安住，

src_original: te cāpi tasyo na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.34 //
tgt_original: 若有修學是身戒，　　彼得此法不為難；

src_original: ye sapta bodhyaṅga mahāmaharṣiṇāṃ pratisaṃvidaśco tatha ṛddhipādāḥ /
tgt_original: 若於七覺支寶所，　　及與神足、辯才等，

src_original: te cāpi tasyo na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.35 //
tgt_original: 若有修學身戒者，　　獲彼妙果不為難；

src_original: brahmāvihārāścaturaśca dhyānā vimokṣadvārāstraya saṃprakāśitāḥ /
tgt_original: 於其梵住及四禪，　　及以三種解脫門、

src_original: kṣemā vitarkā atha prāvivekyā na durlabhā bhonti sthitasya saṃvare // SRS_38.36 //  karuṇāvihārī tathupekṣalābhī tatha īryacaryāmiha maitrivarām /  hitacittu bhoti ca sa sarvajage yaḥ kāyasaṃvari sthito bhavati // SRS_38.37 //
tgt_original: 安隱覺觀及寂滅，　　住身戒者得不難；

src_original: smṛtī upasthāna prahāṇa samyak pañcendriyāḥ pañca balā maharṣiṇām /
tgt_original: 四念處等及正勤，　　大仙五根及五力，

src_original: āścarya aṣṭāṅgiku mārgaśreṣṭho na durlabho śikṣitu kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.38 //
tgt_original: 亦於聖寶八正道，　　住身戒者得不難；

src_original: ye cāpi anye vara buddhadharmā acintiyā yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
tgt_original: 於餘諸佛所有法，　　不可思議無限量，

src_original: te tasya sarve na bhavanti durlabhā yaḥ śikṣate īdṛśa kāyasaṃvare // SRS_38.39 //
tgt_original: 彼得此法悉不難，　　以學如是身戒故。 得聞如是身戒已，　　是王獲得最勝利， 歡喜踊躍而愛樂，　　於彼佛法便出家。 出家已經十億歲，　　修行最勝淨梵行，

src_original: bhāvetva brāhmān caturo vihārānarthāya lokasya sadevakasya // SRS_38.41 //
tgt_original: 恒常修行四梵住，　　利益世間諸天人。

src_original: subhāvitā brahmavihāra kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna aśītikoṭiyaḥ /  tatottare yāttika gaṅgavālikā idaṃ caraṃ so vara brahmacaryam // SRS_38.42 //
tgt_original: 善修清淨梵住已，　　便得如是勝身戒， 復見十方億千佛，　　修行如是菩提行。

src_original: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā acārṣi śuddhaṃ vara brahmacaryam /
tgt_original: 於彼勝法出家已，　　修行最勝淨梵行，

src_original: bhikṣu abhūṣī vara dharmabhāṇako bahuśrutaśco pratibhānavāṃśca // SRS_38.43 //
tgt_original: 具足多聞妙辯才，　　是名聰慧大法師。

src_original: akhaṇḍaśīlaśca acchidraśīlo viśuddhaśīlo akalmāṣaśīlaḥ /  ārye ca śīle sa anāsrave sthitaḥ /  prajānamāno imu kāyasaṃvaram // SRS_38.44 //  siyā kumārā tava anya sāsīd viśeṣacintī tada rājakuñjaraḥ /
tgt_original: 堅持禁戒無缺漏，　　戒身清淨無瑕穢， 所謂聖戒無漏戒，　　當知聖戒是常住。 童子！

src_original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 是故，菩薩當修行清淨身業。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: pariśuddhakāyasamācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayebhyo bibheti /  na śastrato na siṃhebhyo na vyāghrebhyo na ṛkṣebhyo na hastibhyo narṣabhebhyo na manuṣyebhyo bibheti /
tgt_original: 修行淨業菩薩摩訶薩，不畏墮於地獄、畜生、餓鬼、閻魔羅等，亦不畏八難、五趣苦厄，又不畏水、火、五兵、毒藥、王賊、師子、虎、豹、豺狼、犀、象、熊、羆一切惡獸、毒蟲食肉之屬，亦復不畏人非人難。

src_original: pariśuddhakāyasamācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imamapi trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ  lokadhātuṃ karatale kṛtvā tālamātraṃ dvitālamātraṃ tritālamātraṃ catustālamātraṃ  yāvantaṃ vā punarākāṅkṣettāvantamevotkṣipet //
tgt_original: 「童子！ 修行清淨身行菩薩摩訶薩，欲以手掌舉此三千大千世界，若高一多羅乃至十多羅，隨其所欲悉能舉之。

src_original: punaraparaṃ pariśuddhakāyasamācāraḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ṛddhiprātihārye paramapāramiprāpto bhavati /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 淨身行菩薩摩訶薩能達究竟神通彼岸。

src_original: sa ṛddhipādavipākaviśuddhaḥ puṇyaparigṛhīto vivekaviviktaḥ sarvatrānugata etatsamādhipratilabdhaḥ  anāsravapuṇyapariniṣpannaḥ sarvalokadhātāvapratihatacakṣuḥ evaṃrūpaiḥ ṛddhipratihāryaiḥ  samanvāgato bhavati /  tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraḥ tiraḥparvatamapyasajjamāno gacchati /
tgt_original: 彼以報得神足福德力故，攝取遠離隨順無染寂滅之定，悉皆能入； 依是定故，無漏成就得一切世間無礙之眼。

src_original: udake 'pyabhidyamāno gacchati tadyathāpi nāma pṛthivyām /  dhūmāyatyapi prajvalatyapi tadyathāpi nāma mahānagniskandhaḥ /  imāvapi candrasūryāvevaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmahaujaskau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārjati /  ākāṅkṣamāṇo yāvad brahmalokādapi sattvān kāyena vaśe vartayati //
tgt_original: 住神足菩薩摩訶薩能為種種神變之事，所謂一能為多、多能為一，隱顯自在，石壁諸山徹過無礙如風行空，在於空中加趺而坐猶如飛鳥，履水如地，出沒地中如水無異，身出煙焰如大火聚，日月有大威德而能捫摸，欲為大身自在無礙乃至梵天。

src_original: (Vaidya 287)  atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
tgt_original: 」爾時，世尊即說偈言：

src_original: pṛthivīya unmajja nimajja gacchatī abhidyamāno udake 'pi gacchati /
tgt_original: 「神通自在遊十方，　　於諸石壁及諸山， 隨意徹過無有礙； 　　猶如飛鳥順風行，履於大地猶如水，　　出沒自在無所礙； 遊行於水不沈沒，　　猶若履於堅䩕地； 一身能現於千身，　　無量多身能為一，

src_original: pakṣī yathā gaganatalena gacchatī dhūmāyate prajvalate ca ṛddhiyā // SRS_38.47 //  yathāntarīkṣasmi na vāyu sajjate gacchanti cāsmiṃ bahavo 'bhrakūṭāḥ /
tgt_original: 隨意能現種種色，　　智者為渡眾生故； 遊行空中如飛鳥，　　身出煙焰如火聚，

src_original: āsanna so jānati brahmalokaṃ brahmāṇa koṭīna sa dharma deśayī // SRS_38.49 //  ākāṅkṣamāṇo bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu deśeti dharma bahusattvakoṭinām // SRS_38.50 //
tgt_original: 若其意欲說法時，　　便能震動大千界， 又令無量億佛剎，　　微妙音聲悉充滿。

src_original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 是故，菩薩應當修學清淨身行。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā atikrāntamānuṣakeṇa śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakāṃśca /  nairayikānāmapi tiryagyonigatānāmapi yāmalaukikānāmapi /  ye dūre antike vā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vā dūrāvacarāṇāṃ vā antikāvacarāṇāṃ vā //
tgt_original: 修行清淨身行菩薩摩訶薩，天耳界清淨過人聞於音聲——若地獄、畜生、閻魔羅處，天上、人中，若近、若遠——是名天耳通。

src_original: tasmāttarhi kumāra pariśuddhakāyasamudācāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 菩薩復應修學清淨身行。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?

src_original: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate 'sya bhāṣitaṃ dhūtādhimuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.82 //
tgt_original: 所言人信受，　　是樂頭陀利。

src_original: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /  dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /  jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /  pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ (Vaidya 171)  pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 菩薩摩訶薩住如是等功德利益，在於空閑得見佛藏、得於法藏、得彼智藏，得過去、未來、現在智慧之藏。

src_original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 云何得於佛藏？ 童子！

src_original: imāḥ kumāra vivekacārī bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩樂遠離行、住於空閑，獲五神通。 何等為五？ 一者、天眼，二者、天耳，三者、能知他心，四者、善知宿命，五者、神通境界。

src_original: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩以天眼界清淨過人，見於東方無量無數諸佛、世尊；

src_original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /  so 'virahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /
tgt_original: 如是，南、西、北方亦復如是； 四維、上、下亦見無量無數諸佛，常得覩矚未曾捨離。

src_original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 童子！ 是為菩薩得見佛藏。

src_original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 云何菩薩摩訶薩得於法藏？ 童子！

src_original: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,  taṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā sarvaṃ śṛṇoti /  so 'virahito bhavati dharmaśravaṇena /
tgt_original: 是佛、如來有所說法，彼菩薩以天耳界清淨過人悉皆得聞，是菩薩常得聞法而不遠離。

src_original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 童子！ 是為菩薩得於法藏。

src_original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 云何菩薩得於智藏？ 童子！

src_original: yena jñānena sarvadharmānārādhayati /  ārādhayitvā avipramuṣitasmṛtiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /  tasya ca yo 'rthaḥ sa prajānāti /
tgt_original: 以是智慧能持諸法，於一切眾生大悲為首，以不癡心而為說法、知彼法義。

src_original: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 童子！ 是為菩薩摩訶薩得於智藏。

src_original: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 云何菩薩摩訶薩得過去、未來、現在智藏？ 童子！

src_original: so 'bhijñayā atītānāgatapratyutpannasattvacittacaritajñānamavatarati /  evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /  saṃkṣiptena kumāra evaṃguṇadharmapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmān pratilabhate yatrābhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām,  kaḥ punarvādaḥ sarvaparapravādinām //
tgt_original: 是菩薩如實知一切眾生心行惟自心行次第所起，觀自心法以無亂想，修習方便如自心行； 類他亦爾，隨所見色、聞聲，有愛、無愛心皆如實知。

src_original: tatredamucyate -  buddhanidhānaṃ ca dharmanidhānaṃ jñānanidhānaṃ ca pūrvāntanidhānam /
tgt_original: 童子！ 是名菩薩得過去、未來、現在智藏。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmetamevārthamudbhāvayaṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ pūrvayogakathāparivartaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊而說偈言：

src_original: smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /
tgt_original: 「我念過去無量劫，　　有佛、如來大名稱，

src_original: naradevanāgagaṇapūjaniyo nāmena tejaguṇi rāja jino // SRS_29.1 //
tgt_original: 號曰威德眾王佛，　　為諸人天所供養。

src_original: daśa bhikṣukoṭi ṣaḍabhijñaruhāḥ pratisaṃvidāna vaśipāragatāḥ /
tgt_original: 比丘十億具神通，　　達到辯才自在岸，

src_original: dhūtavṛtta saṃlekhita śāntamanāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ // SRS_29.2 //
tgt_original: 住頭陀行心調伏，　　彼佛具足爾所眾。

src_original: ratanāna saptana viśiṣṭavarā iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt // SRS_29.3 //
tgt_original: 有城七億六千萬，　　其城廣長二千里， 彼時世界閻浮提，　　最勝七寶之所成。

src_original: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitā bahu udyānaśataiḥ /
tgt_original: 其城殊妙甚奇麗，　　百園勝家而莊嚴，

src_original: udyāna sarvi ghanameghanibhāḥ phalapuṣpamaṇḍita tarunicitāḥ // SRS_29.4 //  phalavṛkṣajāti vividhā rucirāḥ lakucāmrajambupanasairnicitāḥ /
tgt_original: 其園苑林如密雲，　　常有種種諸花果，

src_original: karṇikāracampakapunnāgaśataiḥ pratimaṇḍitāsta udyānavarāḥ // SRS_29.5 //
tgt_original: 所生異種諸林樹，　　菴羅、閻浮芭蕉等。

src_original: nyagrodha sarvi dvijasaṃgharutāḥ kalaviṅkakokilamayūraśataiḥ /
tgt_original: 迦尼、瞻波、畢落叉、　　尼拘畢鉢眾鳥集，

src_original: śukajīvaṃjīvakakuṇālarutā bahupakṣisaṃgharuta kāli tadā // SRS_29.6 //
tgt_original: 頻伽、拘翅、孔雀等，　　鵞王舍利甚歡樂。 種種異類眾鳥音，　　臻湊遊戲百園裏，

src_original: dhṛtarāṣṭrarājahaṃsopanibhā bhṛṅgakuṇālā varaghoṣarutāḥ /
tgt_original: 如提頭賴勝鵡王、　　那羅、拘蜂、鶴鳥聲，

src_original: citrāṅgaraktamahāvarṇaprabhāḥ sumanojñaśabda madhurā muditāḥ // SRS_29.7 //  iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅkamayūravihaṅgarutaiḥ /  parapuṣṭa śārika vicitra dvijā bahupakṣighoṣaruta nānavidhāḥ // SRS_29.8 //
tgt_original: 其身種種毛羽色，　　處在蓮花出妙音。 所有卵生諸異類，　　出和雅音生人樂，

src_original: tehi niṣevita udyānaśatā mucilindavārṣika aśokaśataiḥ /
tgt_original: 遊行園苑自娛樂，　　歡樂遞相命呼聲。

src_original: atimuktakātha javapuṣpapatraiḥ padmotpalaiḥ kumudapuṇḍarikaiḥ // SRS_29.9 //
tgt_original: 目多婆師、輸迦花、　　波利耶多、拘羅婆， 娑呵迦樹如雲布，　　鉢頭、芬陀、拘牟頭，

src_original: padumaiḥ sahasraśatapatracitā imi puṣpa puṣkariṇiśobhakarāḥ /  pratimaṇḍitāḥ surabhigandhavarāḥ śobhanti puṣkariṇiyo rucirāḥ // SRS_29.10 //
tgt_original: 水中種種眾異花，　　莊嚴其池甚端妙。 諸雜香花共嚴飾，　　時彼園林殊可樂。

src_original: tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
tgt_original: 時閻浮提有一王，　　號堅固德為人主，

src_original: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ // SRS_29.11 //
tgt_original: 彼王具足五百子，　　調柔端正學伎能。

src_original: tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
tgt_original: 其國豐熟甚安隱，　　無有諸過常勝樂，

src_original: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam // SRS_29.12 //  (Vaidya 174)
tgt_original: 地皆布散諸香花，　　與彼天宮無差別。

src_original: svapnopamā bhavagatī sakalā na va kaści jāyati na co mriyate // SRS_29.13 //  na sattva labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
tgt_original: 說： 『諸有道猶如夢，　　無有初生及終沒，眾生、壽人不可得，　　一切諸法悉虛妄。

src_original: māyopamā gaganavidyusamā dakacandrasaṃnibha marīcisamāḥ // SRS_29.14 //
tgt_original: 譬如虛空電幻化，　　又如野馬、水中月，

src_original: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloki saṃkramati gacchati vā /
tgt_original: 無有此世生滅法，　　亦無趣向他世者。

src_original: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalameti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato // SRS_29.15 //
tgt_original: 曾所作業不失壞，　　三界黑白報不亡，

src_original: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca ucchedu puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
tgt_original: 無有斷常諸行等，　　不集於業不住有，

src_original: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punaraspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate // SRS_29.16 //
tgt_original: 非自作業還自受，　　亦非自作他人受。

src_original: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
tgt_original: 無有去者亦無來，　　眾生非有亦非無，

src_original: na ca dṛṣṭisthānu gatiśuddhiriho na ca sattvacaru na praśāntagatī // SRS_29.17 //
tgt_original: 無見取等惡見聚，　　亦無眾生及淨行。

src_original: anupādu śāntu animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ /
tgt_original: 無生寂滅無相句，　　如來功德佛境界，

src_original: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā // SRS_29.18 //
tgt_original: 是陀羅尼十力才，　　是佛、如來勝行處。

src_original: varaśukladharma guṇasaṃnicayo guṇajñānadhāraṇibalaṃ paramam /
tgt_original: 純白淨法功德聚，　　智德總持力最勝，

src_original: ṛddhivikurvaṇāvidhiḥ paramā varapañcābhijñā pratilābhanayaḥ // SRS_29.19 //
tgt_original: 神足變現勢無邊，　　六通辯才由斯起。

src_original: na ca dharmadhātu vrajatīha kvaci evaṃ gatī agati dharmagatī // SRS_29.20 //
tgt_original: 是法界中無所去，　　是行非行真法行。

src_original: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu svabhāvagatī gatiyo svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ /
tgt_original: 非音聲性入自性，　　於趣自性無所住，

src_original: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam // SRS_29.21 //  śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
tgt_original: 無住無依自性行，　　遠塵寂滅佛境界。 定行勝定最勝定，　　非行自性有所住，

src_original: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satataṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśu padaṃ acalam // SRS_29.22 //
tgt_original: 於有自性常隨順，　　微細難見不動句。

src_original: na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /  na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī // SRS_29.23 //
tgt_original: 彼常安住而不動，　　住無所住住法性， 不可得說住自性，　　是行不動住於法。

src_original: ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
tgt_original: 以音聲說非聲道，　　音聲體道是法道，

src_original: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī // SRS_29.24 //
tgt_original: 無別聲聚有所在，　　如是性行是法行。 所說行音非生行，　　其法體性真義行，

src_original: gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /  ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ // SRS_29.25 //  na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /  jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā // SRS_29.26 //  virajaṃ viśuddhi paramārthapadaṃ śānta praśānta arajaṃ virajam /  (Vaidya 176)
tgt_original: 以音聲說眾生行，　　音聲眾生行俱無。

src_original: na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
tgt_original: 於中文字無所入，　　智慧廣大義亦然，

src_original: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī // SRS_29.28 //
tgt_original: 是道佛讚而修行，　　光明法理微細行。

src_original: dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /
tgt_original: 廣離塵垢智慧藏，　　若有能住無等等，

src_original: deśenti dharmaratanaṃ virajaṃ paramārthaśūnya nipuṇārthagatī // SRS_29.29 //
tgt_original: 常霔勝妙法施雨，　　謂第一空真義道。 遠塵清淨第一句，　　寂滅勝寂離垢染， 無分別取及戲論，　　是佛所說寂滅句。 非初、非中、非後住，　　非有、非無、非方所， 已知如是自性行，　　是無等法佛所說。

src_original: aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipadendra bhāṣati samādhimimam /
tgt_original: 堅固德王爾時聞，　　兩足世尊說是定，

src_original: so 'śītikoṭinayutehi tadā upasaṃkramī tada jinu kāruṇikam // SRS_29.30 //
tgt_original: 與八十億那由眾，　　歡喜信敬詣佛所。

src_original: balavantu gauravu janetva jine vanditva pādu manujādhipatiḥ /
tgt_original: 時王頂禮人中雄，　　以大信心恭敬佛，

src_original: tasyo viditva pariśuddha carīṃ jina indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ /
tgt_original: 佛知彼王淳淨行，　　根識自在到彼岸，

src_original: adhumuktikovidu naraḥ pravaro imu tasya deśayi samādhivaram // SRS_29.32 //
tgt_original: 世尊應其心樂欲，　　為說如是勝三昧。

src_original: yada tena rājña paramārtha śruto utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā /
tgt_original: 是王聞說第一義，　　廣發歡喜聖信樂，

src_original: ujjhitva dvīpa sakalāṃścaturo vijahitva kāma abhiniṣkrami so // SRS_29.33 //
tgt_original: 棄捨一切四天下，　　離五欲樂而出家。

src_original: yada rāja pravraji jahitva mahīṃ bodhāya arthiku bhaviṣyajinaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼王因是出家已，　　於佛決定深愛樂，

src_original: sarve manuṣya iha jambudhvaje vijahitva kāmaratī pravrajitā // SRS_29.34 //
tgt_original: 時閻浮提一切人，　　咸皆捨欲而出家。

src_original: vipulo gaṇo daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayuktamanāḥ /  (Vaidya 177)
tgt_original: 比丘及尼樂習定，　　如來徒眾廣無量，

src_original: akṛṣṭā anupta tada oṣadhayo prādurbhūtā marutparicarāḥ // SRS_29.35 //
tgt_original: 粳糧自然從地出，　　諸天悉來而給侍，

src_original: kāṣāya tricīvara prādurbhūtā samacchinna susīvita te 'nupamāḥ /
tgt_original: 袈裟法服從樹生，　　無垢清淨甚可愛，

src_original: amalā virajāśca suvarṇacittā buddhasya guṇocita puṇyabalāḥ // SRS_29.36 //
tgt_original: 割截縫治依量法，　　彼佛功德威力故。

src_original: paśyo kumāra sa hi rājavaro vijahitva sarva mahi pravrajitaḥ /
tgt_original: 童子！ 汝當觀彼王，　　捨家出家棄天下，觀彼三界如機關，　　為求廣大菩提樂。

src_original: bheṣyanti sattva kṣayakāli bahu aparīttabhogā na tyajanti gṛhān // SRS_29.37 //
tgt_original: 當於來世法末時，　　不能捨彼貧賤家，

src_original: tāḍana bandhana kudaṇḍa bahu ākrośa tarjanamaniṣṭadukham /
tgt_original: 杻械、枷鎖困苦者，　　於此勝法不生信。 雖被枷繫杖策罰，　　罵詈、毀辱百千種，

src_original: sahiṣyanti rājakula pīḍa bahu suparīttabhoga na ca bhaktu gṛhe // SRS_29.38 //
tgt_original: 王力多迫悉能忍，　　困苦貧極不捨家。

src_original: aparītta āyu na ca asti dhanaṃ sumahān pramādu na ca puṇyabalam /  na ca śilpasthānakuśalā abudhā dāridriyaṃ ca na ca vittu gṛhe // SRS_29.39 //
tgt_original: 資財乏少壽短促，　　徒勞辛苦無福報， 愚癡不學諸伎能，　　是人常居凡俗地；

src_original: paradāragṛddha aviśuddhamanā īrṣyālukāḥ paramasāhasikāḥ /
tgt_original: 迫愶無義頑暴惡，　　貪惜自富奪人財，

src_original: utkocavañcanaka sāhasikā ahamāḍhyu dharma dhanadāsmi jage /
tgt_original: 愛他人妻奪資產，　　慳嫉狡猾多縱逸，

src_original: upaghātakāḥ kuhaka naikṛtikā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyāma vayam // SRS_29.41 //
tgt_original: 離悲愍心趣惡道，　　亦自稱言： 『我作佛。

src_original: vadhabandhupadravi parasya ratāḥ duḥśīla dāruṇa praduṣṭamanāḥ /
tgt_original: 見他苦惱生欣悅，　　破戒暴虐懷惡心，

src_original: akṛtajña bhedaka vihiṃsasthitā vakṣyanti haṃ te bhaṇa bodhicarim // SRS_29.42 //
tgt_original: 不念恩報破壞他： 　　『大德！ 為我說法行。 聞他說彼菩提行，　　反於其人生瞋恚，

src_original: śrutvā ca budhaṃ skhalitamekapadaṃ tasyaiva bhāṣati avarṇaśatān // SRS_29.43 //
tgt_original: 若見法師少過失，　　增長加說百千種。

src_original: tadimāṃ kumāra mama śrutva giraṃ mā tehi saṃstavu karohi tadā /  supināntare 'pi aviśvasta siyā yadi icchase spṛśitu bodhicarīm // SRS_29.44 //
tgt_original: 童子！ 汝今聞我說： 　　於此人輩勿親近，若欲求證菩提道，　　乃至夢中莫往返。

src_original: dhūtavṛtta saṃlikhita naikaguṇān parikīrtayantu bahukalpaśatān /
tgt_original: 頭陀行中無量德，　　於無邊劫而演說，

src_original: bhaṇatī guṇānna ca guṇeṣu sthito na sa budhyate paramabodhigirām // SRS_29.45 //
tgt_original: 於如是德不安住，　　終不能得勝菩提。

src_original: bhavathā sadāpi akhilā madhurā sada śuddhaśīla suprasannamanāḥ /
tgt_original: 其心清淨恒善語，　　戒淨心柔言美妙，

src_original: pariśuddhaśīla bhavathā satataṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.46 //
tgt_original: 諸尊長所常淨心，　　不久便得是三昧；

src_original: na karotha māna na janetha khilaṃ pariśuddhamānasa sadā bhavathā /
tgt_original: 不從我慢生穢惡，　　其心清淨恒成就，

src_original: mada māna mrakṣa vijahitva tataḥ pratilapsyathā imu samādhivaram // SRS_29.47 //
tgt_original: 棄捨憍恣及瞋怒，　　能得如是勝三昧；

src_original: guṇato anusmari jinaṃ satataṃ varakāñcanacchaviprabhāsakaram /
tgt_original: 常念諸佛功德聚，　　皮膚金色無量德，

src_original: gaganaṃ ca rātriya nakṣatrasphuṭaṃ tatha kāyu lakṣaṇasphuṭo munino // SRS_29.48 //
tgt_original: 佛身諸相自莊嚴，　　如秋夜靜眾星列，

src_original: dhvajacchatravitānapatākavarāṃ cūrṇānulepanaṃ gṛhītva bahūn /
tgt_original: 勝蓋、幢幡及帳幕、　　塗香、末香并花鬘，

src_original: pūjāṃ karotha sugatasya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.49 //
tgt_original: 眾勝供養無等像，　　不久能得此三昧；

src_original: jinastūpi pūja prakarotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.50 //
tgt_original: 持供恒沙佛塔廟，　　不久便得是三昧；

src_original: kāretha buddhapratimāṃ rucirāṃ ratanāmayīṃ suparikarmakṛtām /
tgt_original: 琵琶、箜篌、鼓妙音，　　簫、笛、鐃吹及讚歎， 種種美音百千萬，　　供養離惡最勝尊， 造作無量佛形像，　　眾寶善巧而彫飾，

src_original: prāsādikāṃ paramasudarśanīyāṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.52 //
tgt_original: 姝妙端正最勝上，　　不久便得是三昧；

src_original: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
tgt_original: 常處林藪樂寂靜，　　棄捨聚落離著心，

src_original: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.53 //
tgt_original: 樂獨無二猶如劍，　　不久便得是三昧。

src_original: ahu dharmasvāmi mama yūyu sutā anuśikṣathā mama samādhicarim /
tgt_original: 我作法王汝為子，　　隨順學我三昧行，

src_original: ahu so abhūṣi diśatā suviśruto dṛḍhadattu nāma manujādhipatiḥ // SRS_29.54 //
tgt_original: 我昔得彼大名稱，　　其名號曰堅固王。

src_original: maya buddha pūjita ananta pure maya śīlu rakṣitu viśuddhamanāḥ /
tgt_original: 我本供養無量佛，　　恒願護持清淨戒，

src_original: maya gauravaṃ daśabaleṣu kṛtaṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.55 //
tgt_original: 於十力所起恭敬，　　為求如是勝定故；

src_original: maya putra dāra parityakta pure śirahastapādanayanāgravarāḥ /
tgt_original: 我於本昔棄妻子，　　捨頭、手、足、及眼、耳，

src_original: na ca līnacittata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.56 //
tgt_original: 未曾起彼下劣心，　　為求勝寂三昧故；

src_original: dhanadhānya dāsa bahudāsiśatā ratanā prabhūta parityakta mayā /
tgt_original: 奴婢、財穀過百數，　　種種衣服及飲食，

src_original: saṃtarpitā pi bahuyācanakā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.57 //
tgt_original: 充滿一切來求者，　　為求如是勝定故；

src_original: maṇi śuddharūpiya pravāla ghanā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.58 //
tgt_original: 所有一切悉能捨，　　為求如是勝定故；

src_original: maya tyakta ābharaṇa nānavidhā varamuktahāra tatha sīhanukāḥ /
tgt_original: 我捨珍寶嚴身具，　　瓔珞臂印、師子絛、

src_original: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.59 //
tgt_original: 天冠、寶網過百種，　　為求如是勝定故；

src_original: maya vastrakoṭya paramā sukhumāḥ pariśuddha kāśikadukūlavarāḥ /  bahuhemacitra parityakta pare imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.60 //  maya hasti aśva ratha nānavidhāḥ parityakta svapriyasuto mahilāḥ /
tgt_original: 微妙上勝多百億，　　我時歡喜而施與， 劫貝、鉢咄、獨拘羅，　　為求如是勝三昧；

src_original: na ca daurmanasyata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.61 //  maya dṛṣṭva pūrvi sudaridra narāḥ paryeṣṭiduḥkhita ca kṛcchragatāḥ /
tgt_original: 昔見貧窮及繫閉，　　多役力求不獲苦，

src_original: hastī rathāśvarathakā nayutāḥ pracchannaratanamaṇijālacitāḥ /
tgt_original: 象、馬、牛、羊、白屋宇、　　園苑、車乘、寶莊嚴，

src_original: grāmātha rāṣṭranagarā nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
tgt_original: 王都、城邑及聚落，　　種種土地悉皆捨，

src_original: datvā ca prītimanubhomi sadā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.65 //
tgt_original: 施已能生增上喜，　　為求如是勝藏故；

src_original: ratanāna rāśaya sumerusamāstatha cīvarābharaṇakāśca bahu /
tgt_original: 一一寶聚如須彌，　　嚴身上服亦如是，

src_original: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.66 //
tgt_original: 我悉施與貧乞者，　　為求如是勝定故；

src_original: sudaridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchraprāpta paritrāta bahu /
tgt_original: 富足無量諸貧窮，　　歸趣我者為救護，

src_original: bahuduḥkhapadruta sukhī mi kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.67 //
tgt_original: 苦惱眾生令得樂，　　為求如是勝定故。

src_original: yada āsi īścaru mahīya ahaṃ dukhitāṃ ca paśyami bahuṃ janatām /
tgt_original: 昔於大地我最富，　　見諸世間極苦惱，

src_original: utsṛṣṭa teṣu maya rājyamabhūt kṛpa saṃjanetva sukhito ca yathā // SRS_29.68 //
tgt_original: 棄捨王位諸所有，　　悲心盡願與彼樂。

src_original: ye me kumāra kṛta āścariyā kṛta duṣkarāṇi bahu kalpaśatā /  na ca te maya kṣapaṇa śakya siyā kalpāna koṭinayutā bhaṇataḥ // SRS_29.69 //
tgt_original: 童子！ 我昔為希事，　　無量劫中所為難，言說所陳無能盡，　　億劫我說尚難窮。

src_original: unmattacittabhūmi gacchi narā /  aśraddadhanta sugatasya carim /
tgt_original: 我若所說眾迷惑，　　於佛所行無能信，

src_original: kṛta ye mi duṣkara tadāścariyā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.70 //
tgt_original: 備經無量諸苦事，　　為求如是三昧故。

src_original: ārocayāmi ca kumāra idaṃ śraddadhanta me avitathaṃ vacanam /
tgt_original: 我今勸進汝童子，　　汝於我言生重信，

src_original: na hi vāca bhāṣati mṛṣāṃ sugataḥ sada satyavādi jinu kāruṇikaḥ // SRS_29.71 //
tgt_original: 善逝終無不實說，　　大悲實語佛最勝，

src_original: (Vaidya 182)  anye ime 'pi ca prakāra bahū caratā śodhita ya kalpaśatāḥ /
tgt_original: 其餘苦事百千種，　　我昔具受乾竭身。

src_original: kathamahaṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ moceya sattvaniyutāṃ dukhitām // SRS_29.72 //  yasmin kṣaṇe ayu samādhi mayā pratilabdha bhūta mahājñānapathaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何能得是三昧？ 　　若得脫人百千苦，於剎那中證此定，　　便獲真實智慧道。

src_original: so 'haṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ paśyāmi buddhanayutān subahūn // SRS_29.73 //
tgt_original: 我時見佛那由他，　　過於十方恒沙數，

src_original: ṛddhī ananta pratilabdha mayā sa vikurvamāṇu vraji kṣetraśatān /
tgt_original: 獲致如意勝神足，　　能往百千諸佛剎。

src_original: gatvā ca pṛcchi ahu kāruṇikān praśnāna koṭiniyutāna bahum // SRS_29.74 //
tgt_original: 詣彼請問最勝尊，　　論難莊嚴百千種，

src_original: yaścaiva bhāṣi mama te sugatā praśnāna koṭiniyutāna tadā /
tgt_original: 時佛為我所宣說，　　酬答如向所問難。

src_original: gṛhṇitva sarvamahu dhārayamī na ca bhraśyate ekapadaṃ pi mamā // SRS_29.75 //
tgt_original: 我悉能具領納受，　　乃至不忘一字句；

src_original: taṃ co śruṇitva ahu bhūtanayaṃ praśnāna koṭinayutāna bahum /
tgt_original: 既得聞是真實法，　　廣設無量百種難， 敷演遠塵寂靜句，　　安無量眾智慧道。

src_original: asmin samādhiya sthihitva mayā śikṣitva bhūtanaya kalpaśatān /
tgt_original: 我住如是勝三昧，　　於無量劫學此法，

src_original: bahusattvakoṭinayutāni purā ye sthāpitā viraji mārgavare // SRS_29.77 //
tgt_original: 昔日無量諸眾生，　　亦置無上最勝道。

src_original: yehī na dṛṣṭa purimā sugatā bhāṣantakā imu nayaṃ virajam /
tgt_original: 若人本來不見佛，　　於此勝法未曾聞，

src_original: tehī na śakyamiha śraddadhituṃ paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaram // SRS_29.78 //
tgt_original: 彼終不能生信樂，　　第一義空真實定；

src_original: ye śrāddha paṇḍita vidhijña narā gambhīrabhūtanayalabdhanayāḥ /
tgt_original: 其有智人能解了，　　得於甚深真實德，

src_original: te nā trasanti na ca saṃtrasiṣū śrutvā ca bhonti sada āttamanāḥ // SRS_29.79 //
tgt_original: 聞第一義不驚怖，　　聞已生上歡喜心。

src_original: te te dharenti varabodhi samā te te hi putra anujāta mamā /
tgt_original: 彼彼能持我菩提，　　即是如來真佛子，

src_original: na pi tasya asti vinipātabhayaṃ aṣṭākṣaṇā vigata tasya sadā /
tgt_original: 彼人不畏墮惡道，　　常得遠離於八難，

src_original: drakṣyanti buddhanayutān subahūn imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.81 //
tgt_original: 當見無量那由佛，　　亦能信是勝三昧。

src_original: yatha maitrako jinu anantayaśāḥ sattvāna bheṣyi bahu arthakaraḥ /
tgt_original: 如彼彌勒獨無侶，　　於眾生所得淨智，

src_original: tatha vyākaromyahamanantamatiṃ hastasmi yasya susamādhivaram // SRS_29.82 //
tgt_original: 是三昧經在彼手，　　我為授記如彌勒。

src_original: smṛtimān sa bhoti matimān jñānodgataḥ śrutidharo bhavati /
tgt_original: 是人成就念智慧，　　聞持究竟道增上，

src_original: devānāṃ ca sa bhavati pūjaniyo marutāṃ ca sada namasyanīyaḥ /  abhirakṣitaḥ satata devagaṇaiḥ imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayati // SRS_29.84 //
tgt_original: 是人常得天供養，　　又為眾人所禮敬， 恒為鬼神所護衛，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: na ca so 'gnimadhye mriyate na jale na ca tasya śastra kramate na viṣam /  na ca vairiṇāṃ gamaniyo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.85 //
tgt_original: 不為火、毒之所傷，　　一切刀杖莫能害， 入大水中不漂溺，　　斯由持是三昧故；

src_original: vanakandare vasatu tasya sadā marutā karonti vara pāricarim /
tgt_original: 是人恒住山林中，　　為諸天等所給侍，

src_original: upasthāyakāśca bahu yakṣaśatā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.86 //
tgt_original: 夜叉無量來供養，　　受持如是三昧故；

src_original: (Vaidya 184)  jñānena sāgarasamo bhavatī na sajjate guṇa bhaṇantu muneḥ /
tgt_original: 智慧廣大如巨海，　　說佛功德無障礙，

src_original: bhūtāṃśca buddhaguṇa kīrtayate imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.87 //
tgt_original: 演暢諸佛真實德，　　以持如是勝定故；

src_original: nānto na cāsya paryantu śrute na pramāṇu labhyati yathā gagane /
tgt_original: 是人所聞無窮盡，　　猶如虛空無有邊，

src_original: jñānolkadhāri timiraṃ harati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.88 //
tgt_original: 執智慧炬除闇冥，　　是人持是三昧故；

src_original: snigdhaṃ suyukta sada muñca girāṃ parṣatsu bhāṣati supremaṇiyām /  siṃho yathā sa vinadaṃ bhaṇatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.89 //
tgt_original: 柔軟美妙應義語，　　處眾演說智者愛， 說如泉河澍無竭，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: vaidyo bhiṣaku samu so bhavatī gati lenu trāṇa śaraṇaṃ bahūnām /
tgt_original: 猶如醫王施良藥，　　又與眾生作歸舍，

src_original: ālokabhūtu jagi so bhavati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.90 //
tgt_original: 能為世間作光明，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: na ca tasya maithuni mano ramate śamathe rataḥ spṛśati dhyānasukham /
tgt_original: 是人不為愛欲心，　　樂於寂滅得禪樂，

src_original: śāntāṃ sa bhāṣati praśānta giram imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.91 //
tgt_original: 說於寂靜美妙言，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: na ca tasya mānasu nimittarataṃ sarve vibhāvita nimitta pṛthu /
tgt_original: 是人離相意不染，　　於一切相悉簡擇，

src_original: satataṃ samāhitu vidū bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.92 //
tgt_original: 心常寂靜而經行，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: cakṣuśca so labhati aprākṛtakaṃ yeno sa paśyati anantajinān /
tgt_original: 彼得無垢離垢眼，　　能見無量諸如來，

src_original: so 'nantacakṣurbhavati vṛṣabho imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.93 //
tgt_original: 得丈夫眼廣無邊，　　由持如是三昧故；

src_original: krauñcasvaro madhurayuktagiro kalaviṅkadundubhisvaro bhavatī /
tgt_original: 孔雀美音應寂靜，　　迦陵頻伽悅意聲，

src_original: saṃgītiyuktasvaru mañjugiro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.94 //
tgt_original: 合和諸樂出妙響，　　由持如是三昧故；

src_original: meghābhigarjitasvaro bhavatī haṃsasvaro ravati mañjugiraḥ /
tgt_original: 成就雷霆聲遠震，　　眾鵝鍾鼓美妙音，

src_original: pañcasvarāṅgaśatayuktasvaro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.95 //
tgt_original: 美合百種勝伎樂，　　以持如是三昧故；

src_original: bahukalpakoṭinayutā vividhā madhurasvarāṅgasuprayuktasvarāḥ /
tgt_original: 無量無數僧祇劫，　　成就如是和雅音，

src_original: acintiyā sa gira niścaratī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.96 //
tgt_original: 所說語言如甘露，　　斯由持是勝三昧；

src_original: na ca bhojane bhavati gṛdhnumanā na pātracīvararato bhavatī /
tgt_original: 餚饌飲食不貪嗜，　　於衣鉢中不生著，

src_original: alpecchu saṃtuṣṭa susaṃlikhito imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.97 //
tgt_original: 少欲知足善調柔，　　由持如是三昧故；

src_original: na ca ātma utkarṣaku so bhavatī na parasya bhāṣati avarṇu kvacit /
tgt_original: 能於自身不高舉，　　於他人所不輕毀，

src_original: dhyāne rataḥ sukhumacittu sadā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.98 //
tgt_original: 心常柔軟樂禪定，　　由持如是三昧故；

src_original: ātmānuprekṣī satataṃ bhavatī na parasya skhalitemeṣati ca /
tgt_original: 常自觀察己所行，　　不見他人所闕失，

src_original: akiliṣṭacittu pariśuddhacarī aśaṭho avañcaku sadā bhavatī /
tgt_original: 悲心恩潤清淨慧，　　離邪正直無諂曲，

src_original: sadamārdavaḥ sada vimokṣarato imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.100 //
tgt_original: 意恒柔軟樂解脫，　　由持如是三昧故；
