tgt_original: 若覩佛色身，　　說已見如來，

src_original: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit // SRS_24.7 //
tgt_original: 我身非色像，　　無有能見者。

src_original: jñātaḥ svabhāvo rūpasya yādṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
tgt_original: 知於色自性，　　是色相如是，

src_original: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam /
tgt_original: 如是諸五陰，　　我已知相貌，

src_original: jñātvā svabhāvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmakāye pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_24.9 //
tgt_original: 達法自體性，　　安住於法身。

src_original: deśemi dharma sattvānāṃ dharmakāye 'pyaniḥsṛtaḥ /
tgt_original: 安住法身已，　　為眾生說法，

src_original: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum // SRS_24.10 //
tgt_original: 如來微妙法，　　不可以言宣。

src_original: vicitramukuṭābharaṇā vibhūṣitā yatha devaputrāstridaśendra yānti // SRS_35.84 //
tgt_original: 種種寶冠自莊嚴，　　行如忉利諸天子。

src_original: duhitṝṇa tasmin śata pañca mahyaṃ maṇipādukārūḍha sudarśanīyāḥ /
tgt_original: 於彼子中五百子，　　悉著妙寶摩尼履，

src_original: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā /
tgt_original: 無有異空說，　　別有色自性。

src_original: ābaddhamukuṭābharaṇā vibhūṣitāste hemajālai rathu te vahanti // SRS_35.85 //
tgt_original: 寶冠、瓔珞自嚴飾，　　金網彌覆於車上。

src_original: strīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi aśīti mahyaṃ prāsādikāḥ sarva sudarśanīyāḥ /  (Vaidya 248)
tgt_original: 婇女、眷屬有八萬，　　一切端妙悉嚴麗，

src_original: rathādhirūḍhāḥ samudīkṣya bhikṣuṃ prāsādikaṃ merumivodgataśriyam // SRS_35.86 //
tgt_original: 昇於寶輿見比丘，　　端正猶如須彌山。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca tāsāṃ pitṛsaṃjña jātā utpāditaṃ citta varāgrabodhaye /
tgt_original: 彼見悉皆如父想，　　各發無上菩提心，

src_original: samādayitvā tada brahmacaryaṃ kṣipiṃsu tānābharaṇān manoramān // SRS_35.87 //
tgt_original: 從彼受於淨梵行，　　脫勝瓔珞散比丘。

src_original: īrṣyā mamotpanna abhūṣi tatkṣaṇaṃ vyāpādadoṣaśca khilaṃ cā dāruṇam /
tgt_original: 我尋起上嫉妬意，　　便生瞋怒穢濁心，

src_original: aiśvaryamattaśca vadāmi putrān ghāteya bhikṣuṃ sthitu yaḥ purastāt // SRS_35.88 //
tgt_original: 豪富惑亂勅子言： 　　『可殺我前立比丘。 』諸子聞父教勅已，　　深懷憂惱白父曰：

src_original: na tveva bhikṣuṃ vaya hiṃsayema tathāhi bodhāya utpannu cittam // SRS_35.90 //
tgt_original: 『願王勿作如是語，　　我終不能殺此人。 若有割截我身分，　　經於恒沙多億劫， 終不能殺是法師，　　以從彼發道心故。 於彼尊所發是心，　　願我得佛人中勝， 趣菩提者不為惡，　　我等悉是佛日子。

src_original: śrutvātha rājā tada putravāsyaṃ bhṛtyaṃ bhaṇī roṣitu vadhyaghātakam /
tgt_original: 』王聞諸子如是語，　　即勅奴言喚旃陀：

src_original: ānetha śīghraṃ imu bhikṣu ghātayī sthitu yaḥ purastāpi antaḥpurasya // SRS_35.91 //
tgt_original: 『速呼魁膾殺比丘，　　在我宮人前立者。

src_original: athāgamī paści sa vadhyaghātako sa raudracitto va su nandināmā /
tgt_original: 尋時將於殺者來，　　號曰難提極暴惡，

src_original: asiṃ gṛhītvāna sa tailapāyitaṃ yeno kṛto bhikṣuṇa aṣṭakhaṇḍaḥ // SRS_35.92 //
tgt_original: 手執利刀而鑒治，　　截此比丘為八分。 比丘被斬身無血，　　割處流出千種光， 亦有功德吉祥輪，　　是文肉裏炳然現。

src_original: kṛtvā tvakarmeti sughorarūpaṃ niryātu udyānu gatā kṣaṇena /  (Vaidya 249)
tgt_original: 作斯尤重惡業已，　　我時為戲詣園林，

src_original: na tasya krīḍā na ratī ca jāyate smaritva bhikṣuṃ tada puṣpacandram // SRS_35.93 //
tgt_original: 一切歌舞都不樂，　　思念花月法師故。

src_original: sa śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpaḥ tataḥ praviṣṭaḥ svaku rājadhānīm /
tgt_original: 于時怱速出彼園，　　還來歸入珍寶城，

src_original: rathābhirūḍho gatu taṃ pradeśaṃ yasmin kṛto bhikṣu sa aṣṭakhaṇḍam // SRS_35.94 //
tgt_original: 於是乘車詣其所，　　到彼割截比丘處。

src_original: aśrauṣi so ghoṣamathāntarīkṣād bahūn devānayutāna krandatām /
tgt_original: 即時空中聞惡聲，　　無量那由天號叫， 咸言：

src_original: kalirāja pāpaṃ subahu tvayā kṛtaṃ cyuto gamiṣyasyasukhaṃ avīcim // SRS_35.95 //
tgt_original: 『惡王造重業，　　死墮阿鼻受極苦。

src_original: śrutvāna rājā marutāna ghoṣaṃ suduḥkhito durmanu trastacittaḥ /
tgt_original: 』王時聞彼諸天音，　　心懷憂惱大怖畏：

src_original: bahū mayā dāruṇa pāpakaṃ kṛtaṃ yeno mayā ghātitu puṣpacandraḥ // SRS_35.96 //
tgt_original: 『我為無量重罪過，　　以殺善花比丘故。

src_original: guptendriyaḥ sūratu śāntamānasaḥ so 'pī mayā ghātitu kāmakāraṇāt // SRS_35.97 //
tgt_original: 諸根調柔心寂滅，　　我為愛欲故殺彼；

src_original: yo dharmu dhāreti tathāgatānāṃ saddharmakośaṃ kṣayi vartamāne /
tgt_original: 若有能持如來法，　　於正法藏滅壞時，

src_original: jñānapradīpaṃ kari sarvaloke kaṣṭaṃ sa me ghātitu kāmakāraṇāt // SRS_35.98 //
tgt_original: 能於世間然智燈，　　我為欲故殺是人；

src_original: yo bodhimaṇḍasya varasya deśakaḥ so 'yaṃ mayā ghātitu kāmakāraṇāt // SRS_35.99 //
tgt_original: 復以甘露令轉下，　　為愛欲故而殺彼；

src_original: yo dharmakośaṃdharu nāyakānāmandhasya lokasya pradīpabhūtaḥ /  (Vaidya 250)
tgt_original: 受持導師勝法藏，　　黑闇眾生為燈明，

src_original: yo dhāraṇī dhārayi sūtrarājaṃ sa kiṃ mayā ghātitu kāmakāraṇāt // SRS_35.100 //
tgt_original: 持陀羅尼法王者，　　我為欲故而殺彼；

src_original: asaṃkiliṣṭaḥ suviśuddhajñānī śāntaḥ praśāntaḥ satataṃ samāhitaḥ /
tgt_original: 其智清淨無穢雜，　　凝靜寂滅恒在定，

src_original: kāmāndhabhūtena mayādya ghātito yenātikaṣṭaṃ nirayaṃ gamiṣye // SRS_35.101 //
tgt_original: 為愛所盲遂便殺，　　欲是苦因應棄捨。

src_original: ye 'tīta buddhāpyatha ye anāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /
tgt_original: 過去、未來所有佛，　　及今現在人中尊，

src_original: anantavarṇān guṇasāgaropamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // SRS_35.102 //
tgt_original: 功德無量如大海，　　一切合掌歸命彼。

src_original: ghorān gamiṣye nirayāṃścyutasya trātā na tatra pratividyate mama /
tgt_original: 此死趣惡阿鼻獄，　　於彼無有能救者， 不愛果業既自造，　　正由殺害勝法師。 咄哉！ 惡心造苦業。

src_original: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām // SRS_24.13 //  yaḥ śūnyatāṃ prajānāti īdṛśaṃ rūpalakṣaṇam /
tgt_original: 若能知色者，　　是則能知空； 若能悟空者，　　是則知寂滅。 若人能知色，　　是色相如是，

src_original: ekaḥ prayāsyāmi vihāya sarvaṃ sāraṃ na me kiṃcidito gṛhītam // SRS_35.104 //
tgt_original: 咄哉！ 王位自傲慢。 此處究竟無堅實，　　當捨一切而獨去。

src_original: viśuddhadharmo gatadoṣamohaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ kāruṇiko jitātmā /
tgt_original: 初無欲染修淨業，　　悲心愛語真佛子，

src_original: adūṣakaḥ sarvajanaikabandhuḥ kasmāddhato me varapuṣpacandraḥ // SRS_35.105 //
tgt_original: 獨為世親離諸過，　　我善花月何處去？ 嗚呼！

src_original: hā suvratā kṣāntitapodhanāḍhyā hā rūpadākṣiṇyaguṇairupetā /
tgt_original: 聖者具忍財。 　　嗚呼！ 妙色德相應。

src_original: hā niṣkuhā śrīghana niṣprapañcā kuha prayāto 'si vihāya mā tvam // SRS_35.106 //
tgt_original: 無諂戲論功德聚，　　汝今捨我何處去？

src_original: adyāvagacchāmi maharṣivākyaṃ kāmā hyanityā vadhakāḥ prajānām /
tgt_original: 我今始知大仙言，　　世間為欲之所壞，

src_original: puṣpairmālyavilepanena ruciraistailena prajvālayī // SRS_35.110 //
tgt_original: 塗末、香鬘、百種讚，　　懸諸妙鈴及幡蓋， 妃后、宮人并子孫，　　從此出城而往彼。

src_original: droṇyāṃ tasya kṛtaṃ śarīramabhavad yā māpitā bhikṣubhis  teṣāṃ stūpu karitva rāja avacī pūjāsya kāmāmyaham /
tgt_original: 王於一日三供養，　　然後乃從塔所還，

src_original: puṣpaṃ mālya vilepanaṃ ca grahiya cchatrān patākāṃ dhvajāṃs
tgt_original: 勝妙花鬘以供養，　　寶幢幡蓋而莊嚴。

src_original: na cāsau mārakoṭībhirbhūyaḥ śakya parājitum // SRS_24.14 //  prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām /  ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim // SRS_24.15 //
tgt_original: 不為億魔嬈，　　退動彼菩提。

src_original: tasmiṃstūryasahasrakoṭinayutāṃ vādāpayī pārthivaḥ // SRS_35.111 //  traikālyaṃ divase vrajī mahipati bhikṣusya stūpaṃ tadā  triṣvapyadhvasu deśayī purīmakaṃ yatkiṃci pāpaṃ kṛtam /
tgt_original: 正以癡故造眾罪，　　於彼塔所悉懺悔，

src_original: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ taṃ kṣepayī duṣkṛtaṃ
tgt_original: 乃經九十五億歲，　　恒常懺悔不疲倦。

src_original: śīlaṃ paści akhaṇḍa rakṣitu varaṃ śuddhaṃ śucī nirmalam // SRS_35.112 //
tgt_original: 智慧所攝勝清淨，　　堅持禁戒無缺漏，

src_original: bhinne co tada ātmabhāvi patito ghorāmavīciṃ punaḥ /  kṛtvā nirghṛṇa karma vedayi dukhaṃ kāmaṃnidānaṃ bahu
tgt_original: 王為愛欲所纏蔽，　　自身造作不善業， 身壞命終墮地獄，　　在於極苦阿鼻中。

src_original: buddhā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ vīrāgitā ye mayā // SRS_35.113 //
tgt_original: 從昔以來不值遇，　　九十五億諸如來， 於其九十五億劫，　　爾所世中常生盲； 六十二億那由劫，　　雖得眼根還復壞； 又於一億那由生，　　設令得眼還復失，

src_original: hastā cchinna anantakalpanayutān pādāśca karṇāḥ śirāḥ // SRS_35.114 //  mānuṣye sati kalpakoṭinayutānanyāsu vā jātiṣu
tgt_original: 亦復恒被截手、足。 　　及以耳、鼻、脣、舌等，人中經億那由劫，　　諸餘生處亦如是。

src_original: duḥkhā vedana vedayāmi ca ciraṃ saṃsāraduḥkhārditaḥ /  kṛtvā pāpaku karma duḥkhanubhavī saṃsāramāṇaściraṃ
tgt_original: 其王造作無量惡，　　於諸世間恒受苦，

src_original: tasmāt pāpu na kuryu adhvi tribhave yo bodhimicchecchivām // SRS_35.115 //  (Vaidya 252)
tgt_original: 若有欲得安樂者，　　念已莫作少惡業。

src_original: deśetva karmaṃ purimaku rājaśreṣṭho nāsau vimucyī purimaku duṣkṛtātaḥ /
tgt_original: 其王雖復懺先罪，　　而不得免昔所作，

src_original: kṛtvā ca karmaṃ purimaku ghorarupaṃ sa ca cyavitva gacchennirayamavīci ghoram // SRS_35.116 //
tgt_original: 造斯如是惡業已，　　死後當墮阿鼻獄，

src_original: hastā vicchinnāstathapi ca pāda karṇa nāsā vicchinnā bahuvidha nantakalpān /  netrā ca mahyaṃ balaśo hṛtā kṣipitvā utkṣipta daṇḍairvicaratu cārikāyām // SRS_35.117 //
tgt_original: 斬截身、首、及四支，　　亦復割耳而劓鼻， 挑其兩目不可算，　　無量億劫為欲故。

src_original: tyaktvā svakāye śira kara bodhihetoḥ putrāśca dārānnayana tathātmamāṃsam /  hastāṃśca pādān parityaji hṛṣṭacitto no ca kṣapemī purimaku pāpakarma // SRS_35.118 //
tgt_original: 廣造惡業酬盡已，　　後自剜身施他人， 所謂斬頭、并手、足、　　捨王及子為菩提。

src_original: śreṣṭhī tathaiva naigama kodṛrājā sarve 'pyabhūṣī daśabala niṣkileśāḥ // SRS_35.120 //
tgt_original: 魁膾即是寂王佛； 宮人、妃后及城民、　　親戚、知友并僕使、 勝妙剎利與城主，　　爾許眾人我眷屬。 若有於彼持禁戒、　　以信敬心供養者， 一切悉皆般涅槃，　　以好心故證菩提。

src_original: kumāra evācaritamanantakalpaṃ dṛṣṭvān buddhān dhutaguṇa niṣkileśāḥ /  te te mi duḥkhā tada anubhūtapūrvā carantu śreṣṭhāṃ ima bodhicaryām // SRS_35.121 //
tgt_original: 童子！ 我昔無量劫，　　得見離垢無惱佛，修於勝上菩提行，　　往昔尚受如是苦。

src_original: yo bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhita dhāraṇīye maitrāvihārī acalitu aprakampī /  (Vaidya 253)
tgt_original: 若有菩薩住總持，　　善修慈行安不動，

src_original: nāsau kadācid vrajati apāyabhūmiṃ pūjetva buddhān dhutaguṇa niṣkileśān // SRS_35.122 //
tgt_original: 彼終不墮諸惡處，　　供養離垢無惱佛。

src_original: yo icchi buddho kathamiha dharmasvāmī dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacitu lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 若欲得佛為法王，　　三十二相而莊嚴，

src_original: so śīlarakṣī aśabala apravedhā deśeti dharmaṃ pratiṣṭhitu dhāraṇīye // SRS_35.123 //
tgt_original: 應當護戒無穢動，　　說法不斷住總持。

src_original: yaḥ śīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhitu bodhisattvo hitaiṣicitto vicarati cārikāyām /
tgt_original: 「若有菩薩住戒聚，　　以利益心行菩提，

src_original: kṣipraṃ sa gatvā abhiratibuddhakṣetraṃ kṣāntiṃṃ labhitvā bhaviṣyati dharmarājaḥ // SRS_36.1 //
tgt_original: 彼人速往可樂剎，　　能獲上忍為法王。

src_original: tasmāt samagrā bhavatha aduṣṭacittāḥ sarve ca bhogā satata manāpakārī /
tgt_original: 是以心和安不動，　　恒常造作可愛業，

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca buddhān śirighana aprameyān bodhiṃ spṛśitvā bhaviṣyatha dharmasvāmī // SRS_36.2 //
tgt_original: 然後得見多佛日，　　速得菩提離疑網。

src_original: tasmācchruṇitvā ima vara ānuśaṃsān dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn parama suśīlavantā /
tgt_original: 聞我如是最勝教，　　見諸比丘持淨戒，

src_original: niḥśāṭhiyeno vidu sada sevitavyāḥ samādhiptāptā bhaviṣyatha nocireṇa // SRS_36.3 //
tgt_original: 無諂曲心而奉事，　　然後不久得是定。

src_original: sacennidhānāparimitāpramāṇa pūrṇā bhaveyu maṇiratanebhi saptaiḥ /  tathaiva bhūyo ratanavarāṇa pūrṇāḥ kṣetrā bhaveyurvālikagaṅgatulyāḥ // SRS_36.4 //
tgt_original: 若以恒沙諸伏藏，　　悉以七寶滿其中， 彼藏如是極廣大，　　猶如無量恒沙剎。

src_original: dānādhimukto bhaviya sa bodhisattva ekaika rātriṃdivamiha dānu dadyāt /
tgt_original: 若有菩薩樂惠施，　　於其日夜常無間，

src_original: evaṃ dadan so bahuvidha kalpakoṭīḥ no viṣṭhitaḥ syād vālika gaṅgatulyāḥ // SRS_36.5 //
tgt_original: 勇猛布施不暫停，　　經於無量恒沙劫；

src_original: yaśco samādhiṃ imumiha bodhisattvo śrutvāna dhāreta sugatavarāṇa gañjam /
tgt_original: 若有聞此三昧者，　　便持一切牟尼藏，

src_original: śrāddho naro yo imu ānulomikaṃ dhāreyya agraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_36.7 //  dhāreyya eta viraja samādhi śānta mahādhano bhavati sa bodhisattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有持是三昧者，　　名具大財勝菩薩。

src_original: mahāsamudro bahuvidharatanasya ākaro na tasya puṇyasya pramāṇamasti // SRS_36.8 //
tgt_original: 是為佛法多聞海，　　彼人福德難盡邊，

src_original: varehi dharmehi acintiyehi saṃbṛhito vuccati bodhisattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 於此勝妙難思法，　　便名菩薩真護持。

src_original: na tasya bodhāya kadāci saṃśayo ya uddiśeyāti imaḥ samādhim // SRS_36.9 //
tgt_original: 若有能說寂滅定，　　彼人菩提便增長，

src_original: saṃsthāpya lokācariyaṃ vināyakaṃ buddhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ svayaṃbhuvam /
tgt_original: 惟除世師調御士，　　具足大悲自然智，

src_original: na uttaro tasya ca sattva kaścit mahāsahasrāya kadāci vidyate /
tgt_original: 於其三千大千界，　　無有能與其比者；

src_original: anyatra yaḥ śrutva samādhimetaṃ dhāreyya vāceyya paryāpuṇeyyā /
tgt_original: 若人聞是三昧者，　　有能受持而讀誦，

src_original: paryeṣamāṇo 'tula budhabodhiṃ na tasya jñānena samo bhaveta // SRS_36.12 //
tgt_original: 為求諸佛勝菩提，　　如是輩人乃與等。

src_original: sacet kumārā siya ayu dharmarūpa yaḥ puṇyaskandho upacitu tena bhoti /  dhāratu vācetu imaṃ samādhiṃ na so viceyyā iha pṛthulokadhātuṣu // SRS_36.13 //
tgt_original: 出生多聞猶如海，　　彼人福德不可量， 受持、讀誦此三昧，　　如是之人所攝福。 若福是色者，　　一切世界莫能容。

src_original: eṣā hi sā bodhi tathāgatānāṃ śraddhehi mahyaṃ vacanaṃ kumārāḥ /  na bhāṣate vācamṛṣāṃ tathāgato na hīdṛśāḥ sattva mṛṣāṃ vadanti // SRS_36.15 //
tgt_original: 此是諸佛勝菩提，　　童子！ 汝當信我言，如來所說無有異，　　我等諸佛言不虛。

src_original: yasmin mayā śodhitu ātmagrāho itaḥ pure kalpaśatānacintiyān /
tgt_original: 昔於難思百劫中，　　我為是故消竭身，

src_original: śreṣṭhā carantena pi bodhicārikāṃ paryeṣamāṇena imāṃ samādhim // SRS_36.16 //
tgt_original: 常修最妙菩提行，　　為求如是勝定故。

src_original: tasmādimaṃ śrutva atha dharmagañjaṃ yaḥ sūtrakoṭīnayutāna āgamaḥ /
tgt_original: 是故汝應受法藏，　　那由他經從斯出，

src_original: yaḥ puṇyaskandho vipulo acintiyo yeno laghuṃ budhyati buddhajñānam // SRS_36.17 //
tgt_original: 此福聚廣不思議，　　以能獲得諸佛智。

src_original: sarveṣa sūtrāṇidamagrasūtramacintiyasyo kuśalasya ākaram /  paryantu dharmāṇa na teṣa labhyate yāṃ so sadā nirdiśate viśāradaḥ // SRS_36.18 //
tgt_original: 一切眾經此為首，　　出生無量諸善業， 恒常無畏說是經，　　彼法邊際不可得。

src_original: chinditva bhinditva mahāsahasraṃ śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ /
tgt_original: 碎壞三千以為末，　　或可能知諸塵數；

src_original: na tveva te sūtraśatā acintiyān pramātu yaṃ bhāṣati so aviṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_36.19 //
tgt_original: 常說難思百千經，　　無有能得測量者。

src_original: āśvāsa praśvāsa gaṇetu śakyaṃ sarveṣa sattvāniha buddhakṣetre /
tgt_original: 此佛剎中諸眾生，　　出入氣息猶可知；

src_original: gaṇetu te śakyamathāpi cintituṃ na teṣa sūtrāṇa ya nityu bhāṣate // SRS_36.21 //  (Vaidya 257)
tgt_original: 有能測量其心數，　　無有知彼所說經；

src_original: gaṇetu śakyamita kalpakoṭibhiḥ mahāsamudreṣviha yātti vālikāḥ /  nadīṣu kuṇḍeṣu hradeṣu tadvad ananta sūtrānta sa yat prabhāṣate // SRS_36.22 //  śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ bahukalpakoṭiṣu ya āpaskandhaḥ sada tatra tiṣṭhati /  śatāya bhinnāya vālāgrakoṭiyo svarāṅga teṣāṃ na tu śakyu sarvaśaḥ // SRS_36.23 //
tgt_original: 無量諸億世界剎，　　彼界大海、河、池沙， 此諸沙數可算知，　　無能知彼所說法； 析一毛端為百分，　　可以渧數多億剎， 所有一切諸水聚，　　彼諸言音不可知；

src_original: ya ātmabhāve vinibaddhasārā na teṣa sūtrāntanirhāra jānitum // SRS_36.24 //
tgt_original: 其身塵數猶可算，　　不能知彼所說經；

src_original: gaṇetu śakyaṃ ruta sarvaprāṇināṃ ye santi sattvā daśasu diśāsu /
tgt_original: 十方一切諸眾生，　　彼之音聲可算知，

src_original: na śakyu sūtrānta gaṇetu tasya yad bhāṣate 'sau satatamaviṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_36.25 //
tgt_original: 其所演說不斷絕，　　不能知彼修多羅。

src_original: sarveṣa dharmāṇa nideśu jānati niruktinirdeśapadārthakovidaḥ /  viniścaye bhūtanayeṣu śikṣito viśālabuddhiḥ sada harṣaprajñaḥ // SRS_36.26 //
tgt_original: 言詞句義已善學，　　復能演說一切法， 廣大捷利之智慧，　　了知實法并問答。

src_original: abhinnabuddhirvipulārthacintī acintya cinteti sadā prajānati /
tgt_original: 智慧通達深廣義，　　應常知心不思議，

src_original: ghoṣasvabhāvaṃ pṛthu sarva jānatī śabdāṃśca tān nirdiśato na sajjati // SRS_36.27 //
tgt_original: 悉知音聲自體性，　　是故言說無罣礙。

src_original: asakta so vuccati dharmabhāṇako na sajjate sarvajagasya bhāṣataḥ /
tgt_original: 名為無礙大法師，　　為世說法無所著，

src_original: praśnāna nirdeśapadehi kovidaḥ tathāhi teno paramārthu jñātaḥ // SRS_36.28 //
tgt_original: 問答解釋已善習，　　了達第一義諦故。 於一句中億論釋，　　不思議說無滯著，

src_original: ekasya sūtrasyupadeśakoṭiyo acintiyāṃ niordiśato na sajjati /
tgt_original: 學於無礙之句義，　　處眾演說無擁滯。

src_original: yaḥ susthito bhoti iho samādhiye sa bodhisattvo bhavatī akampiyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有常住此三昧，　　成就無畏不動轉，

src_original: dharme balādhānaviśeṣaprāptaḥ karoti so 'rthaṃ bahuprāṇakoṭinām // SRS_36.30 //
tgt_original: 已得法力行勝行，　　能利無量億眾生。

src_original: yathaiva meruracalo akampiyaḥ sarvehi vātehi na śakya kampitum /
tgt_original: 猶如須彌安不動，　　諸有猛風莫能壞；

src_original: tathaiva bhikṣurvidu dharmabhāṇakaṃ kampetu śakyaṃ na parapravādibhiḥ // SRS_36.31 //
tgt_original: 法師比丘亦如是，　　一切諸論無能異。

src_original: mahāsahasreṣviha lokadhātuṣu ye parvatā ukta akampanīyāḥ /
tgt_original: 三千大千世界剎，　　其中所有諸山等，

src_original: te śakya vātena prakampanāya na tveva dharme sthitu śūnyi bhikṣuḥ // SRS_36.32 //
tgt_original: 一切風吹或動搖，　　比丘住空莫能動。

src_original: ya śūnyatāyāṃ satataṃ prayukto buddhāna eṣo niyataṃ vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 若能與空恒相應，　　是佛決定所住處，

src_original: prajānatī niścitu dharma śūnyāṃ sa sarvavādībhi na śakyu kṣobhitum // SRS_36.33 //
tgt_original: 若人定知諸法空，　　一切異論無能勝。

src_original: akampiyo bhoti parapravādibhiḥ savapravādehi anābhibhūtaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸餘邪說不傾動、　　一切外論無能壞， 無有侵陵、毀蔑者，　　由說如是寂定故；

src_original: anābhibhūtaśca aninditaśca imumuddiśitvāna samādhi śāntam // SRS_36.34 //  gatiṃ gato bhoti sa śunyatāyāṃ sarveṣu dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣate 'sau /  anantajñāne sada supratiṣṭhito imumuddiśitvāna samādhi śāntam // SRS_36.35 //
tgt_original: 彼人窮盡於空法，　　恒常安住無量智， 於一切法無有疑，　　持是最勝三昧故；

src_original: balāni bodhyaṅga na tasya durlabhā pratisaṃvido ṛddhividhī acintiyā /  abhijña no tasya bhavanti durlabhā dhāretva vācetva ima samādhim // SRS_36.36 //
tgt_original: 諸力、道品得不難，　　神足、無礙辯才等， 及獲勝通亦復然，　　受持讀誦是經故；

src_original: bhavābhivṛttasya na tasya durlabhaṃ anantajñānena jināna darśanam /
tgt_original: 死此生彼不為難，　　能見最勝無量智，

src_original: sarveṣa co teṣa jināna antike sa śroṣyate etu samādhi śāntam /
tgt_original: 於斯一切諸佛所，　　得聞如是離垢定，

src_original: vareṇa jñānena upetu bheṣyatī pratisaṃvidāsu vaśa pāramiṃ gataḥ // SRS_36.38 //
tgt_original: 成就最勝相應智，　　能到四種辯才岸。

src_original: saced bhavenmaṇiratanāna pūrṇā mahāsahasrā iya lokadhātuḥ /  ye divya śreṣṭhā maṇiratanāḥ pradhānā heṣṭaṃ upādāya bhavāgru yāvat // SRS_36.39 //
tgt_original: 於諸三千大千界，　　從其下際至有頂， 諸天可愛光摩尼，　　及以七寶悉充滿，

src_original: yāvanta kṣetrā bahuvidha te anantā jāmbūnadāsaṃstṛta pūrṇa sarve /  dānaṃ dade jinavareṣu sarvaṃ bhūmītalādupari bhavāgra yāvat // SRS_36.40 //
tgt_original: 十方無量諸佛剎，　　下從大地至有頂， 閻浮提金皆充滿，　　悉以此寶奉牟尼。

src_original: yāvanti santi bahu vividhā hi sattvā dānaṃ dadeyurvividhamanantakalpān /
tgt_original: 一切世間所有寶，　　經無量劫用布施，

src_original: buddhāna dadyuḥ satatamaviṣṭhihanto bodhyarthiko co daditu dānaskandham // SRS_36.41 //
tgt_original: 奉施如來恒不絕，　　深信為求菩提故；

src_original: yaścaiva bhikṣurabhiratu śūnyatāyāṃ buddhānnamasye daśanakhaprāñjalīyo /
tgt_original: 若有比丘愛樂空，　　一念合掌而禮佛，

src_original: na sa dānaskandhaḥ purimaku yāti saṃkhyāṃ yaḥ śūnyatāyāmabhiratu bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_36.42 //
tgt_original: 比前廣施福德聚，　　施福不及迦羅分。

src_original: taṃ co labhitvā sa hi naru puṇyavanto dānaṃ dadeti vipulu janetva śraddhām /
tgt_original: 若人得彼廣多物，　　信心為福故行施，

src_original: te te supta prasupta sattva satataṃ dharmasvanairbodhayī
tgt_original: 於常放逸睡眾生，　　便能令彼得覺悟。

src_original: te te matsariyairna saṃvasi mahātyāge ramante sadā /
tgt_original: 不與一切妬嫉俱，　　好行惠施無愛悋，

src_original: te te sattva daridra dṛṣṭva dukhitān bhogehi saṃtarpayī
tgt_original: 見彼逼切貧眾生，　　常令充足資生具，

src_original: te te sattvahite sukhāya satataṃ sarvajñatāṃ prasthitāḥ // SRS_36.53 //  te te āhani dharmabheri vipulāṃ jñāne sadā śikṣitāḥ
tgt_original: 是滿功德第一道，　　智者一切恒修習。 彼彼勝妙大法鼓，　　以歡喜心而擊之，

src_original: chindantī jana sarva saṃśayalatāṃ jñāne sadā prasthitāḥ /
tgt_original: 斷除疑網解妙法，　　智慧堅固如金剛，

src_original: te te suśruta dharmadhāri virajā sūtrāntakoṭīśatān  parṣāyāṃ sthita āsane matidharāḥ pravyāharī paṇḍitāḥ // SRS_36.54 //  te te bhonti bahuśrutāḥ śrutidharāḥ saṃbuddhadharmaṃdharāḥ  kośān dharmamayān dharanti munināṃ dharmānnidhāne ratāḥ /
tgt_original: 住勝聖法處眾中，　　能知眾生心樂欲， 演說最上甘露法，　　所謂勝要修多羅。 彼彼自住勝神通，　　能施世間最勝眼，

src_original: deśentā varadharma śānta nipuṇaṃ nairyāṇikaṃ durdṛśam // SRS_36.55 //
tgt_original: 彼說最妙微細法，　　是名寂滅勝出離。

src_original: dharmarājyi praśāsi apratisamā varadharmacārī sadā /  te te bhonti viśiṣṭadharmagurukā gurugaurave ca sthitāḥ  dharme nagavare sthitā matidharā dharmadhvajocchrāyikāḥ // SRS_36.56 //
tgt_original: 以法教化諸世間，　　得為最勝大法王， 能為無上之法尊，　　住於第一上恭敬， 恒常護持妙正覺，　　隨順轉於勝法輪。

src_original: te te matta pramatta sattva satataṃ dṛṣṭvā pramāde sthitān
tgt_original: 彼彼愚癡自縱者，　　覩見如是惡眾生，

src_original: dṛṣṭvā caiva pranaṣṭa utpathagatān saṃsāramārge sthitān /
tgt_original: 見心惑亂趣嶮道，　　臨惡趣門難越度，

src_original: teṣāṃ mārgavaraṃ pradarśayi śivamaṣṭāṅgikaṃ durdṛśam // SRS_36.57 //
tgt_original: 演說最勝微妙道，　　謂彼八正之勝路。

src_original: te tu nāva karitva dharma sudṛḍhāṃ dhārenti sattvān bahūn
tgt_original: 是為彼法廣堅固，　　造作無上勝法船，

src_original: udyantān mahārṇaveṣu patitān saṃsārasrotogatān /
tgt_original: 能於生死煩惱海，　　濟渡怖畏諸世間，

src_original: tīre pārami kṣema nityamabhaye sthāpenti sattvān sadā // SRS_36.58 //
tgt_original: 彼岸離怖常安樂，　　安置眾生彼勝處。

src_original: vidyājñānavimuktipāragamitā saddharmabhaiṣajyadāḥ /
tgt_original: 到於明術智彼岸，　　智者能知眾生欲，

src_original: dṛṣṭvā sattva gilāna nekavividhai rogaiḥ samabhyāhatān
tgt_original: 覩煩惱病無所歸，　　諸惡過患惱世間，

src_original: teṣāṃ dharmavirecanaṃ dadati taddharmaiścikitsanti tān // SRS_36.59 //
tgt_original: 以其法藥令轉瀉，　　如法為彼而療治。

src_original: te te vādi apavādimathanā lokendra vāgīśvarāḥ
tgt_original: 彼彼勝說摧異論，　　言辭上妙而自在，

src_original: sarvajñeyaprabhaṃkarā matidharā varajñānabhūmisthitāḥ /
tgt_original: 知諸言音達法義，　　勇健住於勝智地，

src_original: śūra jñānabalā balapramathanāḥ saṃvarṇitā jñānibhiḥ
tgt_original: 忍辱之力智戰具，　　而被慈愍堅鎧甲，

src_original: jñāneno bahusattvakoṭiniyutāṃstoṣyanti dharme sthitāḥ // SRS_36.60 //
tgt_original: 聖者以慧悅智人，　　安住法中無諂曲。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā sattva pramūḍha mārgaratane sada mārapāśe sthitāḥ /
tgt_original: 見諸群生依魔道，　　遊行迷於正真路，

src_original: yena jñānapathena nenti kuśalān bahusattvakoṭīśatān // SRS_36.61 //
tgt_original: 無量百千那由眾，　　往詣此道無憂處。

src_original: bhītānāmabhayapradāśca satataṃ trastāna cāśvāsakāḥ /
tgt_original: 彼彼為世作燈明，　　為救為歸為洲宅， 怖畏眾生施無畏，　　安慰一切諸群生，

src_original: dharmāloku karonti dharmaratane bhūtanaye śikṣitāḥ // SRS_36.62 //
tgt_original: 然於最勝大法炬，　　演說顯示真實義。

src_original: ye ye śilpavarā jage bahukarāḥ sattvāna arthāvahā  yebhiḥ sattva sadā bhavanti sukhitāḥ śilpeṣu saṃśikṣitāḥ /
tgt_original: 彼學工巧利眾生，　　能獲名聞功德樂， 住於如法之技藝，　　令諸眾生得安樂，

src_original: ye bodhīnabhiprasthitā matidharā lokasya cakṣurdadāḥ // SRS_36.63 //
tgt_original: 為愍世間趣菩提，　　令其安住無畏處。

src_original: śīlakṣāntisamādhipāragamitā gambhīradharmaśrutāḥ /
tgt_original: 已到戒、忍、禪定岸，　　安住甚深微妙法。

src_original: no tṛptāśca pareṣu dharmaratanaṃ te deśayantaḥ śivaṃ
tgt_original: 於其他所無有厭，　　演說最勝寂滅法，

src_original: yāvanto bahu sattva teṣupagatā dharmārthikāḥ paṇḍitāḥ
tgt_original: 若有眾生往其所，　　求解深法及名義，

src_original: teṣāṃ chindiṣu saṃśayān matiadharā dharmeṇa saṃtoṣayī
tgt_original: 彼之廣大諸疑惑，　　速以法刀而斷截，

src_original: śīlakṣāntisamādhipāramigatā jānanta sattvaśayān // SRS_36.65 //
tgt_original: 到於戒忍三昧岸，　　能知眾生多信樂。

src_original: jñānī jñānavarāgra pāramigatāḥ sattvāśaye kovidāḥ
tgt_original: 大士至彼究竟智，　　已善了知群生欲，

src_original: jānantaḥ parasattvacittacaritaṃ yeṣāṃ kathā yādṛśī /
tgt_original: 觀察眾生心所行，　　如心所行決定知。

src_original: ye ye jñānakathāya sattvanayutā varadharmacakṣurlabhāḥ
tgt_original: 其有聞彼智慧言，　　令那由眾得淨眼，

src_original: hanta śṛṇotha mametu kumārā kalpasahasra yathā caritā me /  pūjita buddhasahasraśatāni eṣatu eti samādhi praṇītam // SRS_37.1 //
tgt_original: 「童子！ 汝今當善聽： 　　我於百千劫所行，供養百千諸如來，　　為求如是勝寂定。

src_original: kalpa acintiya evamatītāḥ kṣetraśateṣu ye vālika asti /
tgt_original: 過去不可思議劫，　　所有百剎塵沙數，

src_original: eṣa nidarśanu kīrtitu bhotī yaṃ jinu āsi gaṇeśvaranāmā // SRS_37.2 //
tgt_original: 汝當知是所說事，　　有佛號曰眾自在。

src_original: ṣaṣṭiranūnaka koṭisahasrāṇyāsi gaṇottamu tasya jinastha /
tgt_original: 彼佛如來有眷屬，　　滿足六十億千數，

src_original: sarvi anāsravi kṣīṇakileśā aṣṭavimokṣapratiṣṭhita dhyāyī // SRS_37.3 //
tgt_original: 一切漏盡無煩惱，　　於八解脫善決定。

src_original: tatra ca kāli iyamapi sarvā kṣema subhikṣa anākula āsīt /
tgt_original: 是時一切諸大地，　　安隱豐樂無濁亂，

src_original: saukhyasamarpita sarvamanuṣyāḥ prīṇita mānuṣakebhi sukhebhiḥ // SRS_37.4 //  puṇyabalena ca sarva upetā darśaniyāstatha premaṇiyāśca /
tgt_original: 一切眾人悉安樂，　　遊行往來適悅滿，

src_original: āḍhya mahādhana sarva samṛddhā divyasukhena samarpitagātrāḥ // SRS_37.5 //
tgt_original: 大富饒財悉充滿，　　備受一切諸天樂。

src_original: sūratu suvrata mandakileśāḥ kṣāntibalābhiratā abhirūpāḥ /
tgt_original: 持戒調伏少煩惱，　　色貌端正樂忍力，

src_original: devapureṣu yathā maruputrāḥ śīlaguṇopagatā matimantaḥ // SRS_37.6 //
tgt_original: 猶如天宮諸天子，　　智者戒行、功德具。

src_original: tatra ca kāli mahīpatirāsīd rājasuto varapuṣpasunāmā /
tgt_original: 於彼時世有一王，　　名聞廣大號善化，

src_original: tasya ca putra anūnakamāsan pañcaśatā smṛtimanmatimantaḥ // SRS_37.7 //
tgt_original: 是時彼王有諸子，　　滿足五百具念慧。

src_original: tena ca rājasutena jinasyo ṣaṣṭi udyānasahasraśatāni /  puṣpaphalapratimaṇḍita sarve tasya niryātita kāruṇikasya // SRS_37.8 //
tgt_original: 爾時勝王於佛所，　　捨彼六百萬園林， 妙花果樹而莊嚴，　　奉佛具足大悲者；

src_original: vicitra udyāna sahasraśatā caṃkramaśayyaniṣadyasahasraiḥ /  cīvarakoṭisahasraśatebhiḥ saṃstṛta caṃkramaṇāśca niṣadyāḥ // SRS_37.9 //
tgt_original: 造寺備滿六百萬，　　經行床座亦復然； 袈裟、衣服億百千，　　敷置經行止息處，

src_original: evamanekaprakārasahasrā yāttaka śrāmaṇakāḥ paribhogāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是無量百千種，　　沙門一切所須具。

src_original: rājasutena prasannamanenā tasya upasthāpitāḥ sugatasya // SRS_37.10 //
tgt_original: 彼時勝王信敬心，　　悉皆奉施於善逝，

src_original: so daśasu śubhakarmapatheṣu rāja pratiṣṭhita sādhūjanenā /
tgt_original: 彼王常以十善道，　　自己及他悉安住，

src_original: prāṇasahasraśatānayutebhirgacchi puraskṛtu nāyaku draṣṭam // SRS_37.11 //
tgt_original: 眾人百千那由他，　　隨從於王詣佛所。

src_original: puṣpavilepanadhūpa gṛhītvā chatrapatākadhvajāṃstatha vādyān /  (Vaidya 266)
tgt_original: 手執妙花及塗香、　　勝蓋、幢幡并音樂，

src_original: pūja karitva sa tasya jinasya prāñjalikaḥ purata sthita āsīt // SRS_37.12 //
tgt_original: 供養最勝佛、世尊，　　合掌在頂而住立。

src_original: tuṣṭa abhūttada bhikṣusahasrā devamanuṣyatha yakṣasurāśca /
tgt_original: 千比丘眾默然住，　　人、天、修羅、龍、夜叉，

src_original: vyākaru kiṃ nu jino imu pūjāṃ sādhu kiṃ vakṣyati dharmu narendraḥ // SRS_37.13 //
tgt_original: 一切恭敬而觀佛： 　　『善哉！ 自然說何法？

src_original: tasya ca āśaya jñātva svayaṃbhū rājasutasya niruttaru cittam /
tgt_original: 牟尼世尊知彼欲，　　亦知勝王最上心，

src_original: pāragato abhimuktipadeṣu tasyima deśayi śānta samādhim // SRS_37.14 //
tgt_original: 佛能了達彼信樂，　　而為宣說此三昧。

src_original: yāva pramukta girā sugatenā kampita medini savanaṣaṇḍā /
tgt_original: 善逝演說是語時，　　大地、諸山皆震動，

src_original: puṣpa pravarṣi tadā gaganātaḥ padmaśatāpi ca udgata bhūmau // SRS_37.15 //
tgt_original: 念頃虛空雨眾花，　　百千蓮花從地出。

src_original: vyākari nāyaku āśayu jñātvā arthapadeṣu suśikṣita śāstā /  deśayi śānta samādhi narendrastatrimi arthapadāni śṛṇotha // SRS_37.16 //
tgt_original: 已善了知妙義句，　　佛知彼欲為記說： 為王說是寂滅定： 　　『汝聽往昔所分別：

src_original: sarvi bhavā abhavāḥ parikalpāstuccha marīcisamā yatha māyāḥ /
tgt_original: 一切有、無妄想起，　　空如野馬亦如沫、

src_original: vidyatameghasamāścala śūnyāḥ sarvi nirātma nisattva nijīvāḥ // SRS_37.17 //  āditu śūnya anāgata dharmā nāgata asthita sthānavimuktāḥ /
tgt_original: 如雲、電動皆空無，　　一切無我、無眾生。 過去、未來法亦空，　　無去、無住、離處所，

src_original: nityamasāraka māyasvabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarve // SRS_37.18 //
tgt_original: 常無堅實如幻性，　　一切勝淨如虛空。

src_original: naiva ca nīla na pita na śvetā nāmatu riktaku ghoṣasvabhāvāḥ /
tgt_original: 非青、非黃、非赤、白，　　名字空無但聲性，

src_original: cittavivikta acittasvabhāvāḥ sarvarūtāpagatāḥ kṣaṇikatvāt // SRS_37.19 //
tgt_original: 其心離心無心性，　　離諸音聲而空無。

src_original: bhāṣatu akṣaru saṃkramu nāsti no pi abhāṣatu saṃkaru bhoti /
tgt_original: 演說句味而不住，　　雖不說時字不空，

src_original: nāpi ca akṣara deśa vrajantī no punarakṣaru krānti kutaścit // SRS_37.20 //
tgt_original: 文字亦不往諸方，　　亦復不從餘處來。

src_original: akṣara akṣaya kṣīṇa niruddhā bhāṣatato va abhāṣatato vā /
tgt_original: 其字無盡斯盡藏，　　若說、不說恒無盡，

src_original: nityamimakṣara akṣaya uktā yaḥ parijānati so 'kṣayu bhoti // SRS_37.21 //
tgt_original: 常說句味而不盡，　　如是知者得無盡。 若知此法無盡者，　　彼常能說無盡法， 雖說千種修多羅，　　恒知諸法離文字。

src_original: buddhasahasraśatā ya atītā dharmasahasraśatāni bhaṇitvā /
tgt_original: 諸佛百千已過去，　　亦曾說於百千法，

src_original: naiva ca dharmu na cākṣara kṣīṇā /  nāsti samutpatti tena akṣīṇā // SRS_37.22 //
tgt_original: 於一切法而無盡，　　法無所得故無盡。

src_original: ādi nirātmani ye tvimi dharmā tāṃśca prabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti // SRS_37.24 //
tgt_original: 法本無我、無眾生，　　彼能演說而無盡。

src_original: sarvagiraḥ sa prabhāṣati vijño no ca girāya harīyati cittam /
tgt_original: 智者演說一切言，　　不以語言易彼心，

src_original: sarvagiro girighoṣanikāśo tena na sajjati jātu girāye // SRS_37.25 //
tgt_original: 知諸言音如谷響，　　是故於言無取著。

src_original: yāya girāya sa kīrtitu dharmaḥ sā gira tatkṣaṇi sarva niruddhā /
tgt_original: 以諸言音說是法，　　是言念頃即壞滅，

src_original: yādṛśu lakṣaṇu tasya girāye sarvimi dharma tallakṣaṇaprāptāḥ // SRS_37.26 //
tgt_original: 斯諸言音如是相，　　一切諸法相亦然。

src_original: sarvimi dharma alakṣa vilakṣā sarvi alakṣaṇa lakṣaṇaśuddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 諸法無相亦離相，　　恒常無相相空寂，

src_original: nitya vivikta viśuddha nabho vā saṃkhya samāsatu te na upenti // SRS_37.27 //
tgt_original: 空寂無欲、無取捨，　　是以寂定不可得。

src_original: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛta sarvi viviktā nāsti vikalpana teṣamṛṣīṇām /
tgt_original: 有為、無為悉遠離，　　如是大仙無分別，

src_original: sarvagatīṣu asaṃskṛta prāptā dṛṣṭigatehi sadaiva viviktāḥ // SRS_37.28 //
tgt_original: 遠離一切惡見道，　　了達諸趣悉無為。

src_original: nityamarakta aduṣṭa amūḍhāstasya svabhāva samāhitacittāḥ /
tgt_original: 恒常無染、無瞋、癡，　　是以心體恒寂滅，

src_original: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati īdṛśa dharmān // SRS_37.29 //
tgt_original: 以此三昧力最上，　　是故能知斯法空。

src_original: śailaguhāgiridurganadīṣu yadva pratiśrutka jāyi pratītya /
tgt_original: 如空山河及溪谷，　　聞於勝妙響音聲，

src_original: evimu saṃskṛti sarvi vijāne māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam // SRS_37.30 //
tgt_original: 有為流轉因緣起，　　一切世空猶如幻。

src_original: prajñabalaṃ guṇa dharmagatānāṃ jñānabalena abhijña ṛṣīṇām /
tgt_original: 智力愛樂功德法，　　安住智慧神通仙，

src_original: vāca upāyakuśalya niruktā yatra prakāśitu śānta samādhiḥ // SRS_37.31 //
tgt_original: 發於語言能善巧，　　能說如是寂滅定。

src_original: kalpitu vuccati kalpanamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe /
tgt_original: 所言覺觀但妄想，　　世間不可得其邊，

src_original: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdapi anāgati pratyayatāye // SRS_37.32 //
tgt_original: 本際從來無有相，　　而為未來因緣道。

src_original: karma kriyāya ca vartati evaṃ hīna utkṛṣṭatayā samudenti /
tgt_original: 造業所為有所起，　　隨上、中、下有所生，

src_original: vivikta dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān // SRS_37.33 //
tgt_original: 此法自性無知覺，　　法空無我應當知。

src_original: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā etaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya // SRS_37.34 //
tgt_original: 無有真實及我、人，　　一切世間相如是。

src_original: kṛṣṇāśubha ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /  no puna saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhonti // SRS_37.35 //  (Vaidya 269)  sarvi bhavā alikā vaśikāśco riktaku tuccha phenasamāśca /  māyamarīcisamāḥ sada śunyā deśitu śabditu te ca viviktāḥ // SRS_37.36 //
tgt_original: 一切諸有皆虛妄，　　猶如幻化水中月， 空無亦如水聚沫，　　以聲顯說恒寂滅。

src_original: evaṃ vijānatu manyana nāstī śīlavu bhotī aniśritacittaḥ /
tgt_original: 一切悉捨無所取，　　持戒、威儀亦無依，

src_original: kṣāntibalena na kalpayi kiṃci eva carantu samāhitu bhoti // SRS_37.37 //
tgt_original: 不著忍力諸眾生，　　如是行者得寂定。

src_original: yāttaka dharma vijāni sa rājā tāttaka deśita tena jinena /  śrutva nṛpo imu dharma jinasyo saparivāru samādadi śikṣām // SRS_37.38 //
tgt_original: 隨其王意所樂欲，　　如來稱機而演說， 王聞世尊所說法，　　王及眷屬悉受戒。

src_original: bhūtu ayaṃ paramārtha nirdeśo te anutpattika kṣānti labhiṃsu // SRS_37.40 //
tgt_original: 勝王聞斯三昧已，　　歡喜踊躍作是言： 『善哉！ 能說此三昧，　　是故歸依佛、世尊。 彼時人眾具八萬，　　聞是最勝法體性， 演說真實第一義，　　悉皆獲得無生忍。

src_original: nāsti upādu nirodhu narasyo evimi dharma sadā viviktāḥ /
tgt_original: 眾生無有其生滅、　　諸法無生恒空寂；

src_original: eva prajānatu no parihāṇi rāja labhī anutpattika kṣāntim // SRS_37.41 //
tgt_original: 王及眷屬如是知，　　咸各獲於無生忍。

src_original: rāja tadā vijahitvana rājyaṃ pravraji śāsani tasya jinasya /
tgt_original: 爾時善花棄王位，　　投彼佛法而出家；

src_original: te 'pyanu pravrajitāḥ suta rājñaḥ pañcaśatāni anūnaka sarve // SRS_37.42 //
tgt_original: 其王所有五百子，　　悉皆從王而出家；

src_original: pravrajito yada rāja saputro anya tadā bahuprāṇisahasrāḥ /  pravrajitāḥ sugatasya samīpe dharma gaveṣiyu tasya jinasya // SRS_37.43 //
tgt_original: 王及諸子出家時，　　餘人乃有無量數， 一切為求佛法故，　　亦於彼法皆出家。

src_original: viṃśativarṣaśatān paripūrṇān dharma prakāśitu tena jinenā /
tgt_original: 自在如來為說法，　　具足滿於二千歲，

src_original: rāja saputraku tena janenā viṃśativarṣaśatā cari dharmam // SRS_37.44 //
tgt_original: 王及其子并眷屬，　　二千年中修法行。

src_original: atha apareṇa punaḥ samayena so 'pi jinaḥ parinirvṛtu āsīt /
tgt_original: 過於如是年數已，　　彼佛、世尊入涅槃，

src_original: ye jinaśrāvaka te 'pi atītāḥ so 'pi ca dharmu parittaku āsīt // SRS_37.45 //
tgt_original: 時諸聲聞悉滅度，　　正法於後甚衰微。

src_original: tasya ca rājina putra abhūṣī puṇyamatī sada śrāddhu prasannaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼王善花有勝子，　　號曰福慧具正信，

src_original: tasya ca bhikṣu kulopagu āsīt /  so imu deśayi śānta samādhim // SRS_37.46 //
tgt_original: 王有法師為師導，　　受持如是勝寂定。

src_original: so akhilo madhuro ca abhūṣī satkṛtu prāṇisahasraśatebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 聰明黠慧有念力，　　無量百千人供養，

src_original: devata koṭiśatānyanubaddhā varṇa bhaṇanti kulān praviśitvā // SRS_37.47 //
tgt_original: 諸天百億俱侍從，　　往詣處處而讚歎。

src_original: sa smṛtimān matimān gatimāṃśco suvratu sūratu śīlarataśca /  susvaru aparuṣa so madhuraśco dhātuṣu jñānavaśī varaprāptaḥ // SRS_37.48 //
tgt_original: 言語柔軟不麁獷，　　調伏樂戒善防護， 其音和雅語可愛，　　智力、總持悉具足。

src_original: cīvarakoṭiśatāna ca lābhī āsi sa bhikṣu yaśaḥprabhu nāmnā /  tasya ca puṇyabalaṃ asahantā bhikṣusahasra tadā jani īrṣām // SRS_37.49 //
tgt_original: 得勝袈裟百億數，　　比丘號曰名稱光， 彼人福力無敵對，　　無量比丘起妬嫉。

src_original: puṇyabalena ca rūpabalena jñānabalena ca ṛddhibalena /
tgt_original: 具足福德及色力，　　亦具智慧與神通，

src_original: śīlabalena samādhibaleno dharmabalena samudgata bhikṣuḥ // SRS_37.50 //
tgt_original: 護持淨戒、禪定力，　　比丘法力之所起。

src_original: hṛṣṭamanaśca priyaśca janasyo bhikṣu upāsakabhikṣuṇikānām /
tgt_original: 在家、出家四眾等，　　眾人戀仰而愛樂，

src_original: ye jinaśāsani sattva prasannāsteṣamabhīpsita pūjaniyāśca // SRS_37.51 //
tgt_original: 若於佛法得信者，　　愛重敬心而供養。

src_original: yaśca sa rājinu putru abhūṣī puṇyamatī sada śrāddhu prasannaḥ /
tgt_original: 其昔善花王勝子，　　號曰福慧淨信者，

src_original: jñātva praduṣṭamanān bahubhikṣūṃ rakṣa sa kārayi ācariyasya // SRS_37.52 //
tgt_original: 知彼比丘起惡心，　　於己師所便守護。

src_original: pañcahi prāṇisahasraśatehī varmita khaḍgagadāyudhakehi /
tgt_original: 時有五十萬軍眾，　　悉被鎧甲手持刀，

src_original: tehi sadā parivārita bhikṣu bhāṣati bhūtacarīmaparyantām // SRS_37.53 //
tgt_original: 常令擁護是法師，　　演說菩提寂滅行。

src_original: so pariṣāya prabhāṣati dharmaṃ śūnya nirātma nirjīvimi dharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 於大眾中說是法，　　謂空無我、無壽命，

src_original: ye upalambhika ātmaniviṣṭāsteṣa na rocati yaṃ bhaṇi bhikṣuḥ // SRS_37.54 //
tgt_original: 其有計我執著者，　　彼不喜樂法師說。

src_original: utthitu bhikṣava śastra gṛhītvā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā /
tgt_original: 不信空法比丘眾，　　尋時即起手持刀， 言：

src_original: eṣa adharma prabhāṣati bhikṣuḥ etu hanitva bhaviṣyati puṇyam // SRS_37.55 //
tgt_original: 『此妄說於非法，　　殺之便獲大福德。

src_original: dṛṣṭva ca śastra na bhāyati bhikṣuḥ śūnyaka dharmamanusmaramāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 法師見刀不怖畏，　　以其思念空法故，

src_original: nāstiha sattva naro vāpahatyai kuḍyasamā imi riktaka dharmāḥ // SRS_37.56 //
tgt_original: 無有眾生而可殺，　　空無我、人如石壁。

src_original: bhikṣu karoti sa añjali mūrdhnā bhāṣati vāca namo 'stu jinānām /
tgt_original: 法師比丘即合掌，　　發言稱於南無佛，

src_original: yena satyenimi śūnyaka dharmā bhontimi śastra māndāravapuṣpāḥ // SRS_37.57 //
tgt_original: 若其空法審不虛，　　令刀願為曼陀花。

src_original: kampita medini savanaṣaṇḍā śastra te jāta māndāravapuṣpāḥ // SRS_37.58 //
tgt_original: 大地、諸山皆震動，　　刀即變為妙香花。

src_original: bhikṣu abhūttada maṃkuśarīrā ye upalambhika śastragṛhītāḥ /
tgt_original: 爾時取見持刀者，　　彼眾比丘咸恥悔，

src_original: bhūyu ya śakyupasaṃkramaṇāye trasya abhūt sumahādbhutajātāḥ // SRS_37.59 //
tgt_original: 令手執刀不能動，　　驚懼恐怕大怖畏。

src_original: ye puna śrāddha prasanna munīndre yeṣiha rocati śunyata śāntā /
tgt_original: 其有於佛得信者，　　所有愛樂空法眾，

src_original: tehi huṃkārasahasra karitvā dūṣyaśatairabhichādita bhikṣuḥ // SRS_37.60 //
tgt_original: 發大音聲而號泣，　　一切衣服悉奉散。

src_original: bhikṣu janitvana maitra sa teṣu sarvajanasya purasta bhaṇāti /
tgt_original: 法師比丘起慈心，　　於大眾前作是言：

src_original: ye mayi sattva pradoṣa karontī teṣa kṛte na hu bodhi carāmi // SRS_37.61 //
tgt_original: 『若人於我起瞋者，　　我為彼故行菩提。

src_original: tena ca varṣa aśītiranūnā bhāṣita śūnyata koṣu jinānām /  bhikṣusahasra pratyarthika āsan ye ca nivārita rājasutena // SRS_37.62 //  so 'pi tadā paribhūt abhūṣī tasya ca bhikṣu parīttaku āsan /
tgt_original: 其法朋黨甚微少，　　法師恒為彼侵陵， 聞於一切不喜言，　　忍辱之力轉增上。 時彼法師八十年，　　演說如來空法藏，

src_original: so 'pareṇa ca punaḥ samayena prāṇiśatāna karī mahadartham /
tgt_original: 是彼法師於餘時，　　利益無量百千眾，

src_original: śīlamakhilamanusmaramāṇaḥ puṇyamatisya tadā bhaṇi vācam // SRS_37.64 //  tatra sa gauravu kṛtva udāraṃ puṇyamatī avacī tada bhikṣum /
tgt_original: 思量戒行無缺漏，　　即便往詣福慧所。 王見法師甚恭敬，　　便即問彼比丘言：

src_original: mā mama kinacidācariyasyo cetasi kiṃci kṛtaṃ amanāpam // SRS_37.65 //
tgt_original: 『不令於我大師所，　　惱亂其心不喜悅。

src_original: so avacī śṛṇu rājakumārā kṣāntibalena samudgata buddhāḥ /  (Vaidya 273)  yena mi bhāṣita vācamaniṣṭāstasyimi antiki maitra udārā // SRS_37.66 //
tgt_original: 』彼便答： 『王！ 願賜聽，　　諸佛忍力之所起，若於我所興惡言，　　便起增上勝忍辱。

src_original: yena sa kalpasahasraśatāni kṣānti niṣevita pūrvabhaveṣu /
tgt_original: 已於無量百千劫，　　過去世中修忍辱，

src_original: so ahu bhikṣu yaśaḥprabhu āsaṃ śākyamunirbhagavān bhaṇi vācam // SRS_37.67 //
tgt_original: 稱光比丘我身是，　　釋迦如來作是說；

src_original: jātisahasra mamāsi sahāyaḥ so maya vyākṛtu maitraku buddhaḥ // SRS_37.68 //
tgt_original: 其於千生為我友，　　我已記彼為慈尊；

src_original: yena gaṇeśvara pūjitu śāstā yena tu kārita śreṣṭha vihārāḥ /
tgt_original: 其昔供養自在佛、　　為造勝妙塔寺者，

src_original: eva mayā bahukalpa anantā dhārayitāmimu dharma jinānām /
tgt_original: 我亦無量百千劫，　　受持如來最勝法，

src_original: kṣāntibalaṃ samudānita pūrve śratva kumāra mamā anuśikṣāḥ // SRS_37.70 //
tgt_original: 我已積集於忍力，　　童子！ 汝應隨順學。

src_original: nirvṛtimapyatha bheṣyati evaṃ paścimi kāli saddharmavilope /
tgt_original: 吾般涅槃去世已，　　於後正法滅盡時，

src_original: bhikṣu va tīrthamateṣvabhiyuktā te mama dharma pratikṣipi śāntam // SRS_37.71 //
tgt_original: 比丘樂於外典籍，　　彼便毀謗我勝法，

src_original: unnata uddhata duṣṭa pragalbhā pāpasahāyaka bhojanalubdhāḥ /
tgt_original: 輕躁調戲無慚恥、　　貪嗜飲食不護罪，

src_original: cīvarapātraratāḥ paṭalubdhāḥ lābhasaṃniśrita te kṣipi dharmam // SRS_37.72 //
tgt_original: 乃於衣鉢而戀著，　　彼人謗我最勝法；

src_original: duṣtapraduṣṭamanā akṛtajñā hīnakuleṣu daridrakuleṣu /
tgt_original: 常樂鬪諍無反復，　　於其貧窮下劣姓，

src_original: pravrajitā iha śāsani mahyaṃ te 'pi pratikṣipi śāntamu dharmam // SRS_37.73 //
tgt_original: 在我法中而出家，　　彼不樂於空寂滅；

src_original: māramatena ca mohita sattvā rāgavaśānugatābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
tgt_original: 順其魔意癡眾生，　　隨魔自在而執著，

src_original: mohavaśena tu mohita bālā yeṣa na rocati śūnyata śāntā // SRS_37.74 //
tgt_original: 貪欲自縱凡愚者，　　彼不樂於空寂滅；

src_original: bhikṣu ca bhikṣuṇikā gṛhiṇaśco grāhita mohita pāpamatībhiḥ /
tgt_original: 在家、出家四眾等，　　讒侫愚癡起惡心，

src_original: teṣa vaśānugatā sada bhūtvā paścimi kāli pratikṣipi bodhim // SRS_37.75 //
tgt_original: 隨順如是惡黨者，　　彼人末世謗空法。

src_original: śrutva kumāra imā mama vācaṃ bhikṣu araṇyakule vasi nityam /  yeṣiya rocati śūnyata śāntā tairayu dhāritu dharmu jinānām // SRS_37.76 //
tgt_original: 汝聞我教已，　　應常奉給蘭若僧，所謂樂於空寂者，　　如是輩人持佛法。

src_original: pravraji te mama śāsani caritva bhikṣu upasaṃpadapoṣadhakarmam /
tgt_original: 我佛法中容彼人，　　出家受戒及布薩，

src_original: bhuñjimu piṇḍamasaktā aduṣṭā ye imu dhārayiṣyanti samādhim // SRS_37.77 //
tgt_original: 離諸過染消信施，　　如是人能持菩提。 乃至棄捨於身命，　　修習空法樂寂滅， 於其空法心相應，　　樂住蘭若如野鹿。

src_original: yuktaprayuktamanā ca bhavitvā seva araṇya sadā mṛgabhūtāḥ // SRS_37.78 //  nitya karotha ca pūja jinānāṃ chatradhvajarddhiyamālyavihāraiḥ /
tgt_original: 以幢幡蓋及花香，　　於諸佛所設供養，

src_original: cetiya pūjayathā pratimānāṃ kṣipra labhiṣyatha etu samādhim // SRS_37.79 //
tgt_original: 供養無等勝支提，　　速能獲得是三昧。

src_original: stūpa karāpayathā sugatānāṃ hemavibhūṣita rūpiyaliptān /
tgt_original: 建立無比勝塔廟，　　以諸金、銀而塗飾，

src_original: pratima suniṣṭhita ratnavicitrā bodhinidhānu janitvana cittam // SRS_37.80 //
tgt_original: 造諸形像無量種，　　為於菩提起慈心。

src_original: yāvati pūja jagesmi praṇītā divyatha mānuṣikā ramaṇīyā /
tgt_original: 所有一切供養具，　　天上人中淨妙者，

src_original: dharmata paśyatha sarvi narendrān yāvata santi daśa diśi loke /
tgt_original: 應當如法觀諸佛，　　謂住十方諸如來，

src_original: dṛśyati nirvṛti sarvajinānāṃ dharmatayā sthita saṃmukha buddhāḥ // SRS_37.82 //
tgt_original: 現前無量住法者，　　一切佛子能證知。

src_original: bhotha ca sarviṣu tyāgādhimuktāḥ śīlaviśuddhagatā sthiracittāḥ /
tgt_original: 心常利益憙布施、　　持戒清淨、住忍力、

src_original: kṣāntiratāḥ sada maitraratāśco sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān // SRS_37.83 //
tgt_original: 樂行忍辱及遠離，　　能知一切諸法空；

src_original: vīryu janetha alīna adīnāḥ dhyānaratāḥ pravivekaratāśca /
tgt_original: 精進勇猛無懈退、　　務修禪定戒多聞、

src_original: prajña prajānatha prajñaviśuddhiṃ bheṣyatha kāruṇikā nacireṇa // SRS_37.84 //
tgt_original: 智慧了達常清淨，　　不久成於大悲者。

src_original: rāgu śametha sadā aśubhā ye doṣu nigṛhṇatha kṣāntibalena /
tgt_original: 以不淨觀除貪染，　　慈力能治於瞋恚，

src_original: mohu nigṛhṇatha prajñabalenā prāpsyatha bodhi jinānu praśastām // SRS_37.85 //
tgt_original: 因緣之法破愚癡，　　便得最上無上道。

src_original: kāyu vibhāvayathā yathā phenaṃ duḥkhamasāraku pūtidurgandham /
tgt_original: 觀身猶如水聚沫，　　一切皆空無堅實；

src_original: skandha prajānatha riktaka sarvāṃllapsyatha jñānamanuttaru kṣipram // SRS_37.86 //
tgt_original: 觀察五陰悉空無，　　速得成於最勝智；

src_original: dṛṣṭi ma gṛhṇatha pāpika jātu ātma ayaṃ puruṣo atha jīvaḥ /
tgt_original: 離取一切諸惡見，　　不依壽命及我、人，

src_original: sarvi prajānatha śūnyaka dharmān kṣipra spṛśiṣyatha uttamabodhim // SRS_37.87 //
tgt_original: 了知一切諸法空，　　速得成彼牟尼王。 於諸利養不貪著、　　不得利養勿生憂、

src_original: lābha ma kurvatha gṛddho kadācit mā paritapyatha piṇḍalamabdhvā /  nindita śaṃsita mā khu calethā merusamāśca akampiya bhothā // SRS_37.88 //
tgt_original: 聞他讚毀心莫異，　　猶如須彌山不動。

src_original: (Vaidya 276)  dharma gaveṣatha gauravajātāḥ śratva tadāpi ca tatpara bhotha /
tgt_original: 為求法故起恭敬，　　勿得聞已而執著，

src_original: tiṣṭhata gocari sarvajinānāṃ yāsyatha kṣipra sukhāvatikṣetram // SRS_37.89 //
tgt_original: 安住一切佛行處，　　速能遊於百世界；

src_original: sarvajage samacitta bhavitvā apriya mā priya citta karotha /
tgt_original: 於諸世間悉平等，　　莫起憎愛差別心，

src_original: mā na gaveṣatha lābhu yaśo vā kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha munīndrāḥ // SRS_37.90 //
tgt_original: 慎勿求利及名聞，　　速得成於天人師。

src_original: buddhaguṇāṃśca prabhāṣatha nityaṃ bhūtaguṇehi niruktipadehi /
tgt_original: 恒常讚說佛功德，　　以言辭句如實歎，

src_original: yān guṇa śrutviha sattva prasannāḥ buddhaguṇeṣu spṛhāṃ janayeyuḥ // SRS_37.91 //
tgt_original: 眾生聞是讚歎者，　　於佛功德生愛樂。

src_original: nitya sagaurava cācariyeṣu mātu pitustatha sarvajagasmin /
tgt_original: 父母、師長及眾生，　　如是一切悉恭敬，

src_original: mā puna mānavaśānuga bhothā lapsyatha lakṣaṇa triṃśa duve ca // SRS_37.92 //
tgt_original: 而不隨順於魔力，　　便獲三十二種相。

src_original: saṃgaṇikāṃ vijahitva aśeṣāṃ nityu vivekaratāpi ca bhotha /
tgt_original: 常離一切諸憒閙，　　住於寂靜空閑林，

src_original: sūrata nityupaśobhana śāntā ātmahitāḥ parasattvahitāśca // SRS_37.93 //
tgt_original: 既能自利亦利他，　　為求解脫速施作。

src_original: maitri niṣevi tathā karuṇāṃ co muditapekṣaratāḥ sada bhotha /
tgt_original: 常樂修習慈、悲心，　　及以喜、捨亦復然，

src_original: śāstuḥ praśāsanu paśyatha nityaṃ bheṣyatha kṣipra hitaṃkaru loke // SRS_37.94 //
tgt_original: 調伏寂滅應讚歎，　　速得成於利世間。

src_original: pāpaka mitra ma jātu bhajetha sevatha mitra ye bhonti udārāḥ /  yeṣiha rocati śūnyata śāntā ye abhiprasthitā uttamabodhim // SRS_37.95 //
tgt_original: 若有欲得寂滅定，　　趣向無上菩提者， 慎勿習近惡知識，　　恒常親近於善人。

src_original: śrāvakabhūmi ma śikṣatha jātu mā ca spṛheṣyatha tatra carīye /  (Vaidya 277)
tgt_original: 又莫願欲聲聞地，　　亦勿愛彼所修行，

src_original: cittu ma riñcatha buddhaguṇeṣu kṣipra bhaviṣyatha buddha jinendrāḥ // SRS_37.96 //
tgt_original: 勇猛志樂佛功德，　　速得成佛當如我。

src_original: satya giraṃ sada bhāṣatha śuddhāṃ mā mṛṣa bhāṣatha mā paruṣāṃ ca /
tgt_original: 恒說真實清淨語，　　慎勿妄言及惡口，

src_original: nitya priyaṃ madhuraṃ ca bhaṇethā lapsyatha vāca lokācariyāṇām // SRS_37.97 //
tgt_original: 常說可愛美妙言，　　能得最勝佛菩提。

src_original: kāyi anarthika jīvita bhothā mātma utkarṣaka mā parapaṃsī /
tgt_original: 於其身命莫顧戀，　　慎勿自譽輕毀他，

src_original: ātmaguṇān samudānayamānāḥ paracariyāsu upekṣaka bhotha // SRS_37.98 //
tgt_original: 但自思念己功德，　　莫觀他人之所行。

src_original: śūnyavimokṣaratāḥ sada bhothā mā praṇidhāna karotha gatīṣu /
tgt_original: 常樂觀空及解脫，　　於諸趣中勿願樂，

src_original: sarvanimitta vivarjya aśeṣāṃ bhotha sadā animittavihārī // SRS_37.99 //
tgt_original: 捨一切相悉無餘，　　心恒安住於無相。

src_original: anta vivarjayathā sadakālaṃ śāśvatucchedasthitā ma bhavātha /
tgt_original: 常能遠離於二邊，　　於有、於無莫分別，

src_original: pratyayatā sada budhyata sarvaṃ eva bhaviṣyatha yādṛśa śāstā // SRS_37.100 //
tgt_original: 觀諸眾生但因緣，　　若能知此為大師。

src_original: kāmaratīṣu ratiṃ vijahitvā doṣakhilāṃśca malān vijahitvā /
tgt_original: 棄捨一切愛欲行、　　悉皆斷離穢濁心、

src_original: mohatamo vijahitvase sarvaṃ śāntaratā narasiṃha bhavātha // SRS_37.101 //
tgt_original: 剪除一切愚癡闇，　　得為寂滅人師子。

src_original: nityamanitya ca paśyatha nityaṃ sarvabhavā sukhaduḥkha vimucya /
tgt_original: 恒樂觀察於無常，　　離諸有中苦、樂等，

src_original: lokapradīpakarebhi jinebhiryeṣiha yoniśo dharma sunīta /
tgt_original: 佛於世間作燈明，　　而能說此勝正法，

src_original: yaduta yairupāyakauśalyaistairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā,  teṣāmupāyakauśalyānāṃ pratilambhāyedaṃ dānakuśalamūlamavaropayāmi /  ayaṃ prathamaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者、過去諸佛善巧方便得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，願我亦得是善方便，以此善根迴向菩提，是名第一迴向。

src_original: yebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitrebhyo 'ntikāttānyupāyakauśalyāni śṛṇuyāmudgṛhṇīyāṃ paryavāpnuyāṃ dhārayeyam,  tairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbudhyate /  tairyaiḥ kalyāṇamitraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ bhavet,  evametaddānakuśalamūlamavaropayāmi /  ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 二者、於善知識所聞說如是善巧方便，受持、讀誦而修學之，以此方便令我得成無上菩提，願我長夜恒得值遇，以斯善根而迴向之，是名第二迴向。

src_original: ye bhogapratilābhāḥ sarvalokopajīvyā bhaveyustairme bhogapratilābhaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhavet,  evamidaṃ kuśalamūlavaropayāmi /  ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /  ya ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ dvābhyāmanugrahābhyāṃ sattvānanugṛhṇīyādāmiṣānugraheṇa ca dharmānugraheṇa ca,  evamidaṃ kuśalamūlavaropayāmi /
tgt_original: 三者、願我所得資財共一切眾生受用，以此善根而迴向之，是名第三迴向。 四者、願我己身一切生處得財、得法，攝護利益一切眾生，願我常得如是之身，以此善根而迴向之，是名第四迴向。

src_original: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /  ābhiḥ kumāra catasṛbhiḥ pariṇāmanābhirbodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni //
tgt_original: 童子！ 以此四種迴向，應以一切善根而迴向之。

src_original: punaraparaṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā gṛhīṇā vā pravrajitena  vā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ prajñāvanto  bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sevitavyā bhajitavyāḥ paryupāsitavyā aśāṭhyena /
tgt_original: 「復次，童子！ 菩薩摩訶薩求是三昧故，若在家、若出家，以不諂曲心奉事持戒人。

src_original: yo 'sya samādherdhārako bhikṣurbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavet,  sa ca syādābādhiko bāḍhaglānaḥ,  tena svamāṃsaśoṇiatenāpi sa bhikṣustasmādābādhād vyutthāpayitumutsoḍhavyaḥ /  adhyāśayasaṃpannena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣata kṣipraṃ  cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāvikampamānena viśāradena svakaṃ māṃsaśoṇitamapi  parityajya dharmabhāṇako bhikṣurābādhād vyutthāpayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有能持是三昧者——若出家、若在家——是人若遇病苦垂困，若能以己身分肉血除彼患者，若有成就增上信心，菩薩以不動心及清淨心應當給施。

src_original: bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule apramāṇe yadāsīt  tena kālena tena samayenācintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'han  samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ  śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
tgt_original: 乃往過去過阿僧祇阿僧祇無量無邊不可稱不可量廣大不可思議劫，爾時有佛號曰不可思議願勝起王佛、如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。

src_original: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra acintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho  yasminneva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhastatraiva divase parihate  aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhanirmitān nirmāya aparimāṇānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ vinayaṃ kṛtvā
tgt_original: 「彼佛、如來、應、正遍知即於是日得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，變作無量無邊應化諸佛而為說法，善能調伏無量眾生，安置無漏阿羅漢道；

src_original: (Vaidya 224) āsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya aparimāṇāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya tatraiva divase parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
tgt_original: 亦復建立無量眾生阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，得不退轉。

src_original: tasya khalu punarbhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya caturaśītiḥ varṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi saddharmo 'tiṣṭhat /  tasya ca bhagavato 'cintyapraṇidhānaviśeṣasamudgatarājasya tathāgatasya śāsanāntardhānakālasamaye
tgt_original: 是不思議願勝起王如來即於此日壽盡入無餘涅槃，正法住世八萬四千億那由他百千歲。

src_original: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ bahavo bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūtā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ /  teṣāmevaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā na rocante na cādhimucyante pratibādhante pratikṣipanti /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 是不可思議願勝起王佛正法滅後，於末世時乃有無量執見比丘，彼諸比丘於如是等修多羅中不愛、不樂、不生信心、誹謗毀訾。

src_original: īdṛśānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pīḍāṃ kurvanto yāvajjīvitād vyavaropaṇamakārṣuḥ /  tairabhisatkārādhyavasitairīdṛśasutrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ sahasraṃ jīvitād vyavaropitamabhūt /
tgt_original: 若有能持此等經者，為彼惡侶逼惱其身、口言呵毀乃至奪命。 彼惡比丘為貪利養及恭敬故，殺於二萬受持此經諸比丘等。

src_original: tena ca punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūd jñānabalo nāma jambudvīpeśvaraḥ saddharmaparigrāhakaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasaṃpannaḥ /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 彼時於斯閻浮提中有一國王名曰智力，受持正法、護持正法、本願成就，曾於先佛殖眾善根。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ kumāra kālena tena samayena iha jambudvīpe eko bhikṣurdharmabhāṇako  'bhūt tasya samādherdhārako bhūtamatirnāmnā tasya rājñaḥ kulapraveśakaḥ kalyāṇamitro  hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ arthakāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 「童子！ 昔時於此閻浮提內有一法師名曰實意，受持如是三昧經典，入於王宮為善知識，有大悲故能為救濟利益憐愍。

src_original: sa cāsya rājā atṛpto darśanenābhīkṣṇapratikāṅkṣī cābhūddarśanena dharmasaṃkathanopasaṃkramaṇaparyupāsanaparipṛcchāgrahaṇadhāraṇavācanavijñāpanasamarthaḥ
tgt_original: 彼王憙樂見此比丘無有厭足，聽法語論、往詣奉事、親近供養、諮請問難，聞說能持、善能酬答。

src_original: sa khalu punardharmabhāṇako bhikṣuḥ sattvānāmīryācaryādhimuktidhātuvāsanākuśalo 'bhūt /
tgt_original: 「時彼比丘善解廣略相收之義，威儀、諸行悉皆具足，善能通達陰界諸入；

src_original: sattvānāmindriyabalavīryavimātratājñānadhātuvāsanākuśalaḥ satyasaṃdhikuśalaḥ visaṃdhiprativacanakuśalaḥ
tgt_original: 善知一切眾生和會分離、離已復合，亦知眾生威儀、諸行樂欲性習，善知眾生根、力、精進，善知差別智慧性習、善知諦相應及不相應；

src_original: arthaviniścayakuśalaḥ gambhīrapratibhānaḥ sattvānāṃ vinayavidhijñaḥ pūrvābhilāpī
tgt_original: 酬答語言於義決定辯才深妙，亦能善知調伏眾生；

src_original: smitamukhaḥ apagatabhrūkuṭimukho mahadgatacittavihārī mahākarūṇābhiyuktaḥ anabhibhūtaḥ  sarvaparapravādibhiḥ /
tgt_original: 含笑先語，見者愛樂，遠離嚬蹙，其心廣大，安住如是四無量心大悲相應，一切異論所不能壞。

src_original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rājño jñānabalasya duhitā dārikābhūt ṣoḍaśavarṣā  jātyā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā jñānāvatī nāma /  tasyāḥ sa bhūtamatirbhikṣurācāryo 'bhūt kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ /  tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya dharmabhāṇakasya
tgt_original: 「童子！ 爾時智力王有女名曰智意，年始十六，顏貌端正、形色姝妙，姿容充滿無不備具，彼實意比丘以為師導。

src_original: bhikṣormahākṛṣṇavaisarpaḥ ūrau prādurabhūt duścikitsyo durlabhabhaiṣajyaḥ /  sa vaidyeḥ glānaḥ pratikṣipto 'bhūt //
tgt_original: 「時彼比丘四大不調，於右髀上生惡黑瘡難可療治，一切醫師捨之而去。

src_original: atha khalu rājā sāntapuraḥ saputraḥ saduhitṛparivāraḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā  prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayati sma sārdhamaśītyā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ paurairnāgaraiḥ  sārdhaṃ rāṣṭreṇa naigamajānapadairgaṇakamahāmātraiḥ sārdhamamātyadauvārikapāriṣadyaiḥ /  te sarve taṃ bhikṣuṃ glānaṃ viditvā prarodantaḥ aśraṇi pravartayāmāsuḥ - mā khalvayaṃ bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryāditi /
tgt_original: 時彼智力王見是比丘病篤困苦，恐其死沒，號泣墮淚，及諸妃后、八萬婇女，并及國土城邑人民、太子、諸官軍、眾將帥、守門防邏，及以奴婢、親從左右并餘大眾，見此比丘悉皆啼泣。

src_original: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājño jñānabalasyānyatarā devatā purāṇasālohitābhūdanubaddhā /  sā tasya rājñaḥ svapnāntargatasyāpadarśayati sma - sacet mahārāja etasya bhikṣornavakenāsaṃkliṣṭena mānuṣyeṇa rudhireṇaiṣa kṛṣṇavaisarpa ālipyeta,
tgt_original: 「童子！ 時智力王先有親屬命終生天，於王夢中現面勸化而作是言：

src_original: navakaṃ cāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ mānuṣaṃ māsaṃ nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyeta,
tgt_original: 『此比丘病要須未交童女新血洗之、亦用塗瘡，復取其肉煮之為羹，以種種味而調和之，與飯共食乃可除差；

src_original: evameṣa bhikṣurasmādābādhād vyuttiṣṭheta /

src_original: atha khalu rājā jñānabalastasyā rātryā atyayena tataḥ svapnāntarāt prativibuddho 'ntaḥpuramadhyagataḥ imāṃ svapnaprakṛtimantaḥpurāyārocayāmāsa - evaṃrūpaḥ svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: 』「爾時，智力王見如是夢，覺已至明，即從臥起入於後宮，集諸宮人具說斯夢： 『我見是事。

src_original: iti hi kumāra tataḥ stryāgārāttataśca rājakulānna kācit strī utsahate tasya (Vaidya 225)  bhikṣostadbhaiṣajyaṃ dātum /

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prativibuddhā antaḥpuramadhye imāmeva svapnaprakṛtiṃ mātṝṇāṃ parivārasya cārocayati sma /  na ca kācidutsahate strī tasya bhikṣoretad bhaiṣajyaṃ dātum //
tgt_original: 爾時一切內外宮人、婇女都無堪者。 童子！

src_original: atha khalu jñānavatī rājaduhitā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā
tgt_original: 爾時智意於父王所聞是語已，知病比丘須如是藥，聞已歡喜，身心踊悅，作是思惟：

src_original: evaṃ vyavasāyamakārṣīt - yannvahametad bhaiṣajyaṃ svakāccharīrād yathopadiṣṭaṃ navaṃ  rudhiraṃ navaṃ ca māṃsaṃ dadyām /
tgt_original: 『如父所言，我今此身未曾交合，施其尊者新血、肉等。

src_original: ahameveha rājakule sarvadaharā ca sarvataruṇī ca asaṃkliṣṭakāyavāṅbhanaskarmā ca /  asaṃkliṣṭaṃ jñānameṣāmi asaṃkliṣṭasya dharmabhāṇakasya svaśarīrāda rudhiraṃ ca māṃsaṃ copanāmayiṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 我於宮內最為幼年，於此法師阿闍梨所深生敬重，身、口、意淨，求無染智，以身肉、血施無著法師，持己身肉以種種味而調和之。

src_original: apyeva nāmaiṣa bhikṣurasmādābādhād vyuttiṣṭheta /

src_original: atha khalu sā jñānavatī rājaduhitā svakamāvāsaṃ gatvā tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dharmāntargatena  mānasena svakamūrumāṃsaṃ chittvā nānārasasaṃprayuktaṃ praṇītamabhisaṃskṛtya lohitaṃ  ca pragṛhya taṃ cācāryaṃ praveśya rājño jñānabalasya purato niṣadya lohitena taṃ  visarpamālepayitvā tena ca svabhisaṃskṛtena bhojanena saṃtarpayati /
tgt_original: 』「爾時，智意即持利刀——深心住法——割身股肉，其瘡血流，持此新肉調種種味而作羹臛，以金椀盛取身上流血，即奉王勅喚病比丘來入宮內，於父王前置席令坐，血洗瘡已又用塗之，復持此肉調以種種其餘勝味而作美食，為獲福故奉施法師。

src_original: atha khalu sa bhikṣurajānannaparibudhyamānaḥ apariśaṅkamānastadbhaktaṃ paribhuktavān /
tgt_original: 「時彼比丘不知不覺、不疑有過，即便食之。

src_original: samanantaraparibhukte ca tasminnāhāre tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvāstā vedanā pratiprasrabdhāḥ,  sarvaśca vyādhirapagataḥ /
tgt_original: 是病比丘食此食時患苦即除。

src_original: tena vigataparidāhena sarvasukhasamarpitena tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato 'ntaḥpurāttataśca  nagarajanapadarāṣṭrasaṃnipātād dvādaśānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni //
tgt_original: 「爾時，法師病苦除已身安快樂，而為智力王說勝妙法——為求是三昧故——令此宮內一萬三千諸婇女等發於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。

src_original: atha khalu rājā jñānabalaḥ svakāṃ duhitaraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
tgt_original: 「爾時，智力王即便說偈問其女曰：

src_original: hato hyayaṃ vātha mṛto 'tha labdho yat sādhitaṃ nānarasehi vyañjanam /  kutaśca te śoṇitu labdhu dārike yeno ayaṃ mocitu vyādhi pāpakaḥ // SRS_34.2 //
tgt_original: 遣誰何處殺何人，　　乃獲得斯勝好肉， 以諸異味共和合，　　復得淨血而洗塗？

src_original: dṛṣṭastāta mayā svapno devatāyā nidarśitaḥ /

src_original: mayā cotthāya śayyātaḥ praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ nṛpa /  svapnastadāyamākhyāto jyeṣṭhikānāṃ hi mātṛṇām // SRS_34.6 //
tgt_original: 我覺寤已從臥起，　　即入後宮說是言，

src_original: ceṭikānāṃ mayākhyātaṃ kā śaktā kartumīdṛśam /

tgt_original: 捨己身分新血肉，　　和以種種餘美味，

src_original: yathaiva jāmbūnada niṣku bhāsate paśyanta sattvā na vitṛptimenti /
tgt_original: 猶如閻浮金聚光，　　若有觀者無厭足；

src_original: emeva etādṛśa dharmabhāṇakān dṛṣṭvā na tṛpyantiha devamānuṣāḥ // SRS_34.26 //
tgt_original: 法師實意亦如是，　　天人瞻仰無有厭。

src_original: pītvā yathācchaṃ salilaṃ janasya tṛṣābhibhūtasya tṛṣā vigacchati /
tgt_original: 喻若飲於清冷水，　　熱時能去燋渴患；

src_original: emeva ete vidu dharmabhāṇakā dharmāmṛtaistṛṣṇa vinenti prāṇinām // SRS_34.27 //
tgt_original: 比丘法師亦如是，　　能除眾生諸渴愛。

src_original: sutyaktametanmaya māṃsaśoṇitaṃ yaddattu bhikṣusya gilānakasya /
tgt_original: 我捨股肉奉法師，　　并施己身新淨血，

src_original: visarpu śāntaśca sa dharmabhāṇake kṛtaṃ mayā gauravu buddhavarṇitam // SRS_34.28 //
tgt_original: 除彼法師四大苦，　　佛所歎者我已作。

src_original: cāritravantasya bahuśrutasya imaṃ samādhīvaradhārakasya /  yanme tu tyaktaṃ svakamātmamāṃsameteṣa dharmāṇa bhaveyya lābhinī // SRS_34.29 //
tgt_original: 聖者成就相應德，　　及持如此勝實定， 我已供養彼比丘，　　願斯福善得成佛。

src_original: yathaiva gandhaḥ surabhī manoramaḥ kālānusārī śubha candanasya /
tgt_original: 如香芬馥甚可樂，　　隨順時香勝栴檀，

src_original: pravāti gandho daśasu diśāsu emeva gandhopama dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.30 //
tgt_original: 妙香普熏無不遍，　　持戒定者亦如是；

src_original: yathaiva merurdiśatāsu dṛśyate samantaprāsādiku darśanīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 猶如須彌最端嚴，　　遍照十方殊可愛，

src_original: avabhāsayanto diśatāsu rocate tathaiva merūpama dharmabhāṇakāḥ // SRS_34.31 //
tgt_original: 光耀地上及虛空，　　持戒法師亦如是。 若人清淨深信樂，　　建立最勝妙寶塔， 復有餘人來敬養，　　轉增造者最勝福； 法師說者亦如是，　　我以淨心令安隱， 割捨自身新肉血，　　我今已造正法塔。

src_original: yathaiva stūpaṃ patamānu kaścid vyutthāpayet saṃskari paṇḍito naraḥ /
tgt_original: 若有塔廟垂欲倒，　　智者扶令不傾動，

src_original: yastatra stūpe 'pi prasādu kuryād vyutthāpito yena sa tasya hetuḥ // SRS_34.32 //
tgt_original: 復有人來供養塔，　　能令扶者獲勝福；

src_original: (Vaidya 229)  emevayaṃ dharmastūpo gilānako vimocito lohitalepanena /
tgt_original: 比丘知法塔亦然，　　我以良藥除彼患，

src_original: eṣo 'kariṣyad yadi bhikṣu kālaṃ samādhiśabdo 'piha jambudvīpe /
tgt_original: 父王當知比丘喪，　　即便失是三摩提。

src_original: niruddhu sattvāna sadābhaviṣyat cikitsite 'smin sa samādhi labdhaḥ // SRS_34.34 //  sarvasya lokasya paritrāṇu bhikṣurandhasya lokasya ca cakṣudāyakaḥ /  rāgasya doṣasya mohasya caiva cikitsako 'yaṃ mama vaidyarājaḥ // SRS_34.35 //
tgt_original: 法師亦如淨妙燈，　　療治眾生煩惱闇， 安住廣大三摩提，　　救濟惡道諸群生。

src_original: mahadgate citti sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇu caryāya na tasya labhyate /  suviniścitārtheṣu padeṣu śikṣito anābhibhūtaśca parapravādibhiḥ // SRS_34.36 //
tgt_original: 比丘所行不可測，　　恒常安住於大心， 決定句義已善學，　　諸惡異論不能壞。

src_original: na mahya bhūyo vinipātato bhayaṃ strītvaṃ punarme na ca bhūyu bheṣyati /  sahasrakalpāna ca koṭiyo bhuyo kṛtvā paraṃ gauravu dharmabhāṇake // SRS_34.37 //
tgt_original: 於其無量億劫中，　　永不復受女人身， 如佛所說上敬法，　　我於法師已恭敬。

src_original: yo buddhakṣetrān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ ratanāna pūrṇān dadi nāyakānām /
tgt_original: 其佛世界如恒沙，　　滿中寶物奉如來，

src_original: yaścaiva pādāṅgulimeka dadyādidaṃ tataḥ puṇyu viśiṣyate param // SRS_34.38 //
tgt_original: 餘有淨心施足、指，　　此福於彼最為勝。

src_original: sā dārikā kālamitaśca kṛtvā adrākṣi buddhāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是女人死滅後，　　便得見於千億佛，

src_original: sarveṣa co śāsani pravrajitvā imaṃ varaṃ śāntu samādhi deśayī // SRS_34.39 //
tgt_original: 悉於彼佛得出家，　　受持如是勝三昧。

src_original: sarveṣa teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ caramismi kāle /  (Vaidya 230)
tgt_original: 於諸兩足尊佛所，　　及般涅槃最後時，

src_original: pravrajyalābhinyabhu nityakālamasaṃkiliṣṭāḥ sugatāna putrakāḥ // SRS_34.40 //
tgt_original: 如是一切常出家，　　佛子清淨無穢染。

src_original: dīpaprabhasyātha tathāgatasya caritva sā śāsani brahmacaryam /
tgt_original: 亦於燈明如來所，　　彼佛法中修梵行，

src_original: strībhāvu tasmin vinivartayitvā abhūṣi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_34.41 //
tgt_original: 我時得轉於女身，　　為大法師說勝法。

src_original: maitreya jñānaṃbalu so narendraḥ saddharmaparigrāhaku nityakālam /  dīpaṃkaro 'sau abhūddharmabhāṇako ahaṃ ca āsaṃ tada rājadhītā // SRS_34.42 //
tgt_original: 智力王者彌勒是，　　恒常勇猛護持法； 法師即是然燈佛；

src_original: svakena māṃsena ca śoṇitena co upasthito me tada dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
tgt_original: 能捨身肉無顧悋，　　供養功德自在者，

src_original: śāṭhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ parivarjayitvā imaṃ samādhiṃ pratikāṅkṣatā tadā // SRS_34.43 //
tgt_original: 恒常遠離諂曲心，　　為求如是三昧故。

src_original: yebhī tadā roditu bhikṣu dṛṣṭvā gilānakaṃ pīḍitu vedanābhiḥ /
tgt_original: 見彼比丘病苦逼，　　爾時所有啼泣者，

src_original: avivartikāste sada sarvi bhūvan na jātu yātā vinipātabhūmim // SRS_34.44 //
tgt_original: 一切皆獲不退地，　　畢竟永離諸惡趣。

src_original: nābhūṣi teṣāṃ sada akṣirogo na śīrṣarogo na ca karṇarogaḥ /  na ghrāṇarogo na ca jihvarogo na ca dantaśūlaṃ na kadācidāsīt // SRS_34.45 //
tgt_original: 彼人無復眾惱逼，　　亦離謗法及病苦， 五根具足不殘缺，　　心亦無有諸憂刺，

src_original: samantaprāsādiku bhonti nityaṃ śirīya tejena jvalantakāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 一切端嚴皆殊妙，　　功德威神常熾盛，

src_original: dvātriṃśaketuśatapuṇyalakṣaṇā upasthito yaistada bhikṣu glānakaḥ // SRS_34.46 //
tgt_original: 百福莊嚴三十二，　　皆由供養病者故。

src_original: (Vaidya 231)  mahyaṃ ca te śāsani pravrajitvā pralujyamānānimu buddhabodhim /
tgt_original: 彼於我法悉出家，　　於其後代末世時，

src_original: dhāritva te gañju tathāgatānāṃ drakṣyanti buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyo // SRS_34.47 //
tgt_original: 若能持我正法藏，　　彼當得見千億佛。

src_original: susaṃgṛhītvānima buddhabodhiṃ dhāretva nityaṃ ca hi gauraveṇa /
tgt_original: 受持恭敬我法者，　　是為攝持菩提種，

src_original: te arthu kṛtvā vipulaṃ prajānāṃ drakṣyanti akṣobhya narāṇamuttamam // SRS_34.48 //
tgt_original: 廣能利益諸眾生，　　當得見於阿閦佛。

src_original: śrutvā ca te carya niruttarāmimāṃ lapsyanti prītiṃ cariyāṃ nirāmiṣām /
tgt_original: 聞我行勝菩提行，　　便得獲於聖所愛，

src_original: śrutvā ca te ātmana pūrvacaryāṃ kāhinti buddhāna udārapūjām // SRS_34.49 //
tgt_original: 一切本生莊嚴事，　　奉勝供養諸如來。

src_original: dṛṣṭā ca bhikṣūn vidu śīlavanto niḥśāṭhiyeno sada sevitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 比丘多聞、持禁戒，　　見已淨心而奉事，

src_original: āghātu krodhaṃ ca vivarjayitvā pūjetha putrān mama dharmaśāsane /
tgt_original: 速離一切瞋慢已，　　供養我子護法者，

src_original: mā andhabhūtā bahukalpakoṭiyo vinipātaprāptāśca bhaveta duḥkhitāḥ // SRS_34.51 //
tgt_original: 無量億劫離闇冥，　　終不墜於惡道苦。

src_original: na śīlu trāyeta śrataṃ ca tasya na dhyānu trāyenna araṇyavāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 諍心畢定墮惡趣，　　雖持禁戒及多聞、

src_original: tadā nu trāyenna ca buddhapūjā vyāpādu kṛtvāna paraspareṇa // SRS_34.52 //
tgt_original: 供養諸佛廣行施，　　蘭若禪等莫能救。

src_original: iti śrīsamādhirāje jñānāvatīparivartaścatustriṃśatitamaḥ // 34 //  35 Supuṣpacandraparivartaḥ /  atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
tgt_original: 」爾時，長老阿難從座而起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，合掌向佛而作是言：

src_original: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -  pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ  sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt praṣṭavyapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 我於如來、應、正遍知所少有諮問，願佛聽許，隨問為說。

src_original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - tena hyānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi,  ahaṃ te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye /
tgt_original: 」爾時，佛告阿難： 「汝歸本坐，如來、應、正遍知恣汝所問，我為汝說，令汝心喜。

src_original: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtāvakāśo 'smi bhagavan,
tgt_original: 」爾時，長老阿難白佛言： 「世尊！

src_original: kṛtāvakāśo 'smi sugata praśnavyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 唯然受教，修伽多！ 唯然受教，婆伽婆！

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ purataḥ āsane niṣadya bhagavantametadavocat -
tgt_original: 」已蒙聽許，於是阿難即便謦欬而作是言： 「世尊！

src_original: ko nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadiha ekatyā bodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā  hastacchedān pādacchedān karṇacchedānakṣyutpāṭanāni aṅgottamāṅgacchedān nigacchanti  vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?  no ca hīyante?  na ca parikṣīyante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
tgt_original: 何因緣故，餘一一菩薩行菩薩行，遇截手、足及以耳、鼻，或挑兩目、割其身分，於種種苦悉皆忍受，而不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提？

src_original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - sacet tvamānanda jānīyā yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samudānayitum,  etadapi te ca pratibhāyāt /  kiṃ punaryattathāgataṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyathāḥ /
tgt_original: 」作是問已，佛言： 「阿難！ 汝若知我為阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故備受苦者，汝尚不堪興意欲言，況能發問？

src_original: tad yathāpi nāma ānanda iha kāścideva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pādatalamupādāya yāvanmūrdhakādādīpto bhavet prajvalitaḥ ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
tgt_original: 阿難！ 假使有人從足至頂烔然熾焰，復有餘人往詣其所而作是言：

src_original: taṃ kaścideva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet - ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
tgt_original: 『丈夫可來，於此熾然不滅之身與五欲合，隨意所受歌舞戲樂。 』」佛言：

src_original: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta?
tgt_original: 「阿難！ 於汝意云何？ 是人不滅熾然身火，隨意所受歌舞戲笑五欲樂不？

src_original: ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
tgt_original: 」阿難白佛言： 「不也。 世尊！

src_original: bhagavānāha - krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo rameta paricārayeta parikalpamupādāyānirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「阿難！ 是人未滅身火，或可能受五欲之樂、歌舞喜戲；

src_original: na tveva tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇasya sattvāṃstribhirupāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrānnābhūt sukhaṃ  vā saumanasyaṃ vā cittapraharṣo vā /
tgt_original: 如來不爾，往昔行於菩薩行時，見三惡道受苦眾生及諸貧苦，終無悅樂。 「阿難！

src_original: ye ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā akhaṇḍaśīlā bhavanti achidraśīlāḥ akalmāṣaśīlā aśabalaśīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlāḥ  alulitaśīlā akopyaśīlāḥ,  nottānaśīlāḥ,  na paradarśanaśīlāḥ na visaṃvādaśīlāḥ,  ṛjuśīlāḥ yathāpratijñāśīlāḥ sattvānugrahaśīlāḥ /
tgt_original: 若過去菩薩修菩薩行時，成就不缺戒、不穿戒、不尤戒、不雜戒、不取戒、不動戒、不濁戒、不壞戒、不淺戒、不現相戒、不相違戒、正直戒、如要誓戒、攝眾生戒。

src_original: na karṇanāsācchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /  (Vaidya 233) na netrotpāṭanaśīrṣacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /  nāṅgapratyaṅgacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti /  na ca vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /  kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
tgt_original: 如是成就諸戒菩薩摩訶薩行菩薩行，終不逢遇截手、刖足、割耳、劓鼻、斬首、挑目，及餘身分亦不受於種種諸苦，速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyakalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairapramāṇairacintyairatulyairamāpyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt /  tena kālena tena samayena ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan  samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
tgt_original: 「阿難！ 乃往過去阿僧祇阿僧祇劫廣大無量不可思議不可稱不可量無有分齊，彼時有佛號曰寶蓮花月淨起王佛、如來、應供正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。

src_original: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt  sarvatra ca divase navatikalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi sattvānāmavaivartikatāyāṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
tgt_original: 彼時寶蓮花月淨起王佛壽命九十九億那由他百千劫，彼於一切日月時中令九十億百千眾生安住佛法而不退轉。

src_original: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ  samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya caramikāyāṃ pañcāśati saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye  saddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā bahujanajugupsitā bahujanavivarjitā  bahujanaviruddhā mahājanotsṛṣṭāścābhūvan /
tgt_original: 「阿難！ 彼時寶蓮花月淨起王如來、應、正遍知般涅槃已，正法滅後、末法之中，於此修多羅無量眾生而厭惡之、無量眾生而遠離之、無量眾生而違背之、無量眾生而棄捨之。

src_original: mahābhayabhairavakāle vartamāne mahopadrave ativṛṣṭikālasamaye anāvṛṣṭikālasamaye  vartamāne vyālakālasamaye vartamāne vidyutkāntārakalpasamaye durbhikṣakālasamaye  mithyādṛṣṭikālasamaye asamyagdṛṣṭikālasamaye tīrthikamantraparyeṣṭikālasamaye buddhabodheḥ  pralujyamānakālasamaye vartamāne sapta bodhisattvasahasrāṇi grāmanagaranigamarā rājadhānījanapadebhyo  nirvāsitāni samantabhadraṃ nāma vanakhaṇḍaṃ tadupaniśritya viharanti sma sārdhaṃ  supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena,

src_original: evaṃ pṛthagjanāḥ sarve ajānanta imaṃ nayam /
tgt_original: 是諸凡夫等，　　不能知此義，

src_original: kṣipanti īdṛśān dharmān yatra duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // SRS_11.25 //  alabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate /
tgt_original: 便起誹謗心。 　　如是滅苦法，諸法不可得，　　非無諸法想；

src_original: sā evaṃjātikā saṃjñā saṃjñāmeva vijānatha // SRS_11.26 //  vijānanā ca saṃjñā ca bālairetadvikalpitam /
tgt_original: 若能如是知，　　彼想亦不見。 我知如是想，　　凡夫妄分別，

src_original: prakalpiteṣu dharmeṣu nātra muhyanti paṇḍitāḥ // SRS_11.27 //
tgt_original: 於離分別法，　　知者不迷惑。

src_original: paṇḍitānāmiyaṃ bhūmirbālānāṃ nātra gocaraḥ /
tgt_original: 此為智者地，　　非是愚境界，

src_original: bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ bhūmirbuddhaputracarī iyam /
tgt_original: 此是菩薩地，　　佛子之所行，

src_original: buddhadharmāṇalaṃkāro deśitā śānta śūnyatā // SRS_11.29 //
tgt_original: 佛法妙莊嚴，　　謂說寂滅空。

src_original: na te hriyanti rūpehi buddhagotrasmi te sthitāḥ // SRS_11.30 //
tgt_original: 不為色所壞，　　安住於佛性。

src_original: asthāna sarvadharmāṇāṃ sthānameṣāṃ na vidyate /
tgt_original: 一切法無住，　　以無住處故，

src_original: ya evaṃ sthāna jānāti bodhistasya na durlabhā // SRS_11.31 //
tgt_original: 若能如是知，　　得菩提不難。

src_original: imāṃ kriyāṃ vijānantaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ sa budhyate // SRS_11.32 //
tgt_original: 若能知是業，　　速證菩提道。

src_original: devātha nāgāḥ sada satkaronti gandharva yakṣā asurā mahoragāḥ /
tgt_original: 是人常為諸天敬，　　乾闥、夜叉、摩睺等，

src_original: sarve ca rājāna suparṇi kinnarā niśācarāścāsya karonti pūjām // SRS_11.33 //
tgt_original: 龍、鬼、羅剎、緊那羅，　　是等常來供菩薩。

src_original: yaśo 'sya bhāṣanti ca buddhakoṭiyo bahukalpakoṭyo 'pi adhiṣṭhihantaḥ /
tgt_original: 恒為諸佛所稱歎，　　與諸世間興利益，

src_original: yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati bodhisattvaḥ karoti so 'rthaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭinām /
tgt_original: 若有菩薩能知空，　　利益無量億眾生，

src_original: deśeti dharmaṃ paryāyasūtrato śrutvāsya prema janayanti gauravam // SRS_11.35 //
tgt_original: 柔和處眾演說法，　　聞者欣樂而愛敬。

src_original: jñānaṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulaṃ pravartate yeneti paśyanti narottamān jinān /
tgt_original: 廣大智慧轉增明，　　以是智慧能見佛，

src_original: kṣetre ca paśyanti viyūha śobhanaṃ dharmaṃ ca deśenti te lokanāthāḥ // SRS_11.36 //
tgt_original: 亦覩莊嚴淨妙剎，　　聽受諸佛所說法。

src_original: māyopamān jānatha sarvadharmān yathāntarīkṣaṃ prakṛtīya śūnyam /  prakṛtiṃ pi so jānati teṣa tādṛśīmevaṃ caranto na kahiṃci sajjati // SRS_11.37 //
tgt_original: 知一切法如幻化，　　猶如虛空自性空， 能知體性是空無，　　能如是行無所染。

src_original: jñānena te vīkṣiya sarvadharmān preṣenti te nirmita anyakṣetrān // SRS_11.38 //
tgt_original: 知一切法如變化，　　而於諸剎示變化。

src_original: te buddhakṛtyaṃ kariyāṇa nirmitā prakṛtīya gacchanti yathaiva dharmatām /
tgt_original: 能為諸佛所作事，　　幻法體性無去來，

src_original: yathābhiprāyaṃ ca labhanti te 'rthaṃ ye bodhicittasmi narāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_11.39 //
tgt_original: 隨前所求得利益，　　謂能安住菩提者。

src_original: sa bhoti buddhān sadā kṛtajño yo buddhavaṃśasya sthitīya yujyate /
tgt_original: 恒念一切如來恩，　　願紹佛種不斷絕，

src_original: virocamānena samucchrayeṇa dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇāḥ // SRS_11.40 //
tgt_original: 能得光耀精妙身，　　成就三十二種相。

src_original: anyānanantān bahu ānuśaṃsān śreṣṭhaṃ samādhau caramāṇu lapsyate /
tgt_original: 其餘無量種利益，　　行勝菩提當能得，

src_original: mahābalo bhoti sadā akampiyo rājān tasyo na sahanti tejaḥ // SRS_11.41 //  (Vaidya 73)
tgt_original: 成就大力不可動，　　威德諸王無堪抗。 具足福德甚端嚴，　　福與功德威光耀，

src_original: devāpi no tasya sahanti tejo yo buddhadharmeṣu careya paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_11.42 //
tgt_original: 諸天覩威不面對，　　謂行佛法智慧者。

src_original: mitraṃ sa bhoti sada sarvaprāṇināṃ yo bodhicittasmi dṛḍhaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
tgt_original: 住於堅固菩提心，　　與諸眾生為善友，

src_original: na cāndhakāro 'sya kadāci bhoti prakāśayantasmi sa buddhabodhim // SRS_11.43 //
tgt_original: 是人無復諸闇冥，　　顯示勝妙菩提道。

src_original: apagatagiravākpathā anabhilapyā yatha gaganaṃ tatha tāḥ svabhāvadharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 離語言道無所欲，　　諸法寂滅如虛空，

src_original: ima gati paramāṃ vijānamāno tatha tu bhavati pratibhānu akṣayaṃ se // SRS_11.44 //
tgt_original: 其有能知如是業，　　成就無量勝辯才。

src_original: sūtraśatasahasra bhāṣamāṇaḥ sūkṣma prajānati pūrvikāṃ sa koṭim /
tgt_original: 演說百千修多羅，　　能示彼法微細義，

src_original: sada vidu bhavatī asaṅgavākyaḥ susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.45 //
tgt_original: 智者恒成無礙慧，　　能知微細法體性。

src_original: nayaśatakuśalaśca nityu bhoti bahuvidhaghoṣaniruktikovidaśca /
tgt_original: 常善知彼眾生信，　　學習一切語言音，

src_original: sada sbhṛti pariśuddha tasya bhoti susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.47 //
tgt_original: 恒憶念持不忘失，　　善能悟解法性故。

src_original: na śruṇati amanojña śabda jātu śruṇati praṇīta manāpu nitya śabdān /
tgt_original: 耳初不聞非愛語，　　恒常聽覽可樂音，

src_original: sada bhavati manojña tasya vācā susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.48 //
tgt_original: 口常宣說悅意言，　　是人善知法性故。

src_original: smṛtimatigatiprajñavantu bhoti tathapi ca cittamanāvilaṃ prasannam /  (Vaidya 74)
tgt_original: 念慧法智悉成就，　　其心清淨無穢濁，

src_original: sūtraśatasahasru bhāṣate anekān susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.49 //
tgt_original: 說百千經無滯著，　　若有所演不虛設。

src_original: arthakuśala bhoti vyañjano ca ima guṇa dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.50 //
tgt_original: 字句差別已修學，　　善解千億諸語言，

src_original: devamanujanāgarākṣasānām asuramahoragakinnarāṇa nityam /
tgt_original: 名味、義趣皆善解，　　由悟法性有斯德。 夜叉、羅剎、天、修羅、　　迦樓、緊那、摩睺、茶，

src_original: teṣa sada priya manāpa bhoti susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.51 //
tgt_original: 為彼八部常愛敬，　　斯由悟解法性故。

src_original: bhūtagaṇapiśācarākṣasāśco paramasudāruṇa ye ca māṃsabhakṣāḥ /
tgt_original: 惡心神眾、毘舍闍，　　飲血食肉極毒害，

src_original: te 'sya bhayu na jātu saṃjanenti susukhuma dharmasvabhāvu jānamānaḥ // SRS_11.52 //  vipula kathaṃ śruṇitva paṇḍitānāṃ vipula prajāyati romaharṣa teṣām /
tgt_original: 其有持是寂定者，　　是等常能作衛護。 聞於智者廣大言，　　心喜踊悅身毛竪，

src_original: vipula tada janenti buddhapremaṃ vipula acintiyu teṣu bhoti arthaḥ // SRS_11.53 //
tgt_original: 於彼菩提深愛樂，　　能獲廣大難思福。

src_original: puṇyabala na śakyu teṣa vaktuṃ bahumapi kalpasahasra bhāṣamāṇaiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是福報難可知，　　於百千劫說不盡，

src_original: aparimita ananta aprameya imu sugatāna dharetva dharmagañjam // SRS_11.54 //
tgt_original: 護持善逝法寶藏，　　無量無邊無限數。

src_original: sarva jina atīta pūjitāste aparimitā ya anāgatāśca buddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 便為已供一切佛，　　過去、未來諸世尊，

src_original: daśasu diśāsu ye sthitāśca buddhā ima vara śānta samādhi dhārayitvā // SRS_11.55 //
tgt_original: 及住現在十方者，　　以能宣說寂定故。

src_original: yatha naru iha kaści puṇyakāmo daśabala kāruṇikānupasthiheyyā /
tgt_original: 若人為樂福德故，　　供養十力大悲者，

src_original: aparimita ananta kalpakoṭīraparimitaṃ ca janetu prema teṣu // SRS_11.56 //
tgt_original: 無量無數億諸佛，　　時逕大海諸沙數；

src_original: (Vaidya 75)  dvitīya naru bhaveta puṇyakāmo itu paramārthanayāttu gāthamekām /
tgt_original: 更有餘人樂福者，　　於此勝義持一偈，

src_original: dhariya carimakāli vartamāne parimaku puṇyakalā na bhoti tasya // SRS_11.57 //
tgt_original: 於彼劫盡惡世時，　　如是福德最為勝。

src_original: parama iyaṃ viśiṣṭa buddhapūjā carimaki dāruṇi kāli vartamāne /  catupadamita gāthameku śrutvā dhārayi pūjita tena sarvabuddhāḥ // SRS_11.58 //
tgt_original: 若有能聽一偈者，　　是人便供一切佛，

src_original: parama sada sulabdha tehi lābhā parama subhuktu sadā va rāṣṭrapiṇḍam /
tgt_original: 於此末代惡世時，　　斯為最勝上供養； 是人便得最大利，　　堪受世間所奉敬，

src_original: parama daśabalasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bahu jina pūjita tehi dīrgharātram // SRS_11.59 //
tgt_original: 諸十力生最上子，　　於其長夜已供養。

src_original: ahamapi iha dṛṣṭa gṛghrakūṭe tatha maya vyākṛta te 'pi buddhajñāne /
tgt_original: 彼見我在耆闍山，　　我即為授菩提記；

src_original: api ca maya parītu maitraka syāṃ punarapi vyākaraṇāya tasmi kāle // SRS_11.60 //
tgt_original: 我已付囑彌勒尊，　　彼佛亦為授記莂。

src_original: tatha punaramitāyu teṣa tatro bhāṣate buddha aneka ānuśaṃsām /
tgt_original: 是人復為彌陀佛，　　為說無量勝利益；

src_original: sarvi imi sukhāvatīṃ praviṣṭo abhirati gatva akṣobhya paśyi buddham // SRS_11.61 //
tgt_original: 或復往詣安樂國，　　又欲樂見阿閦佛；

src_original: kalpaśatasahasra aprameyā na ca vinipātabhayaṃ kadāci bhoti /
tgt_original: 無量無邊百千劫，　　是人不墮諸惡道，

src_original: imu varu caramāṇu bodhicaryāmanubhavati sa hi nitya saumanasyam // SRS_11.62 //
tgt_original: 於此菩提行勝行，　　成就無量諸快樂。

src_original: tasya imu viśiṣṭa evarūpā ya imu prakāśita śreṣṭha ānuśaṃsām /
tgt_original: 無量功德勝利益，　　如是我今已宣說，

src_original: pratipadamanuśikṣamāṇa mahyaṃ paścimi kāli dhareyu eta sūtram // SRS_11.63 //
tgt_original: 若欲如我功德者，　　應末世中正持經。

src_original: tatra kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhamāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ prajānāti,  tasyeme evaṃrūpā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti - sa tathāgatānāṃ bhūtaṃ guṇavarṇaṃ bhāṣate /  na ca tathāgatān vyākhyāti asatā abhūtena /
tgt_original: 以是義故，菩薩摩訶薩能如是知不可思議諸法體性者，得如是功德之利，讚說如來真實功德，不謗如來言非真實。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tāṃ dharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  anantāt buddhaguṇān prajānāti /
tgt_original: 如來已得諸法為世所知，是人如實知於彼法，亦知無量如來功德能知如實不可思議佛法。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: anantā hi kumāra buddhaguṇā acintyāścintāpagatāḥ /
tgt_original: 童子！ 佛有無量無邊功德不可思議，遠離於心。

src_original: acintyabuddhadharmaparipṛcchākuśalaśca,  acintyabuddhadharmādhimuktaśca?  acintyabuddhadharmaparyeṣaṇākuśalaśca bhavati,  acintyāṃśca buddhadharmān śratvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate?
tgt_original: 云何聞不思議佛法不生驚怖、不增怖畏、不恒怖畏？

src_original: tenāśakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā pramātuṃ vā /
tgt_original: 以是義故，餘不能思、不能稱量。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: cittaṃ hi kumāra niḥsvabhāvamarūpyanidarśanam /
tgt_original: 童子！ 其心無性、又無形色，不可覩見。

src_original: iti hi kumāra yatsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ tatsvabhāvā buddhaguṇāḥ,  yatsvabhāvā buddhaguṇāstatsvabhāvāstathāgatāḥ,
tgt_original: 「童子！ 如是心體性即是佛功德體性，如是佛功德體性即是一切諸法體性。 以是義故，童子！

src_original: tatsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /  yaḥ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvaguṇasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  ayaṃ kumāra ucyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nidhyāptimānasaḥ /  niḥsaraṇakuśalaḥ /  traidhātukaniḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  yathāvadarśī avitathavādī ananyathābhāṣī,
tgt_original: 若菩薩說一切法體性一義如實知者，名為菩薩寂滅於心善解三界出離善根。

src_original: yathāvādī tathākārī,  anabhiniviṣṭastraidhātuke traidhātukasamatikrāntaḥ /  samatikrāntaḥ kāmabhūmiṃ rūpabhūmiṃ ārūpyabhūmiṃ kleśabhūmiṃ nāmabhūmiṃ ghoṣabhūmim /  akṣarapadanayakuśalaḥ /  akṣaravibhāvitajñānaḥ /
tgt_original: 如實了知、如實知見、如實說無有異說，隨說而行無所執著，出過一切諸煩惱地、過於欲界色界、解脫無色界、過於名地、過於聲地。

src_original: sarvadharmavyavasthānajñānakuśalaḥ /  niścitayā buddhyā samanvāgato 'nabhibhūtaḥ sarvamāraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhiśca devatābhiḥ //  pūrvaparikarmakṛtāyāḥ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyā anāvaraṇāyāśca dharmavipaśyanāyāḥ  kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
tgt_original: 善解離文字法、善解分別字智、善解離語言法，知於文字、善於文字、善於字差別智、廣知字智、善解一切法差別智、善於一切法廣差別智、善分別一切處法智，與不可思議佛法相應，魔王波旬及諸魔民所不能壞。

src_original: te ca sarve bhagavatā vyākṛutā aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā kalpairasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /  sarve ca anyānyanāmāna ekāyuṣpramāṇā anyānyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
tgt_original: 」說是法門時，有八億那由他諸天人等得修無障法忍，一切皆為諸佛授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記，過四百八十萬阿僧祇劫得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，種種名號、國土差別、壽命齊等。

src_original: yo bodhisattva matimān prāpnoti anuttarāṃ varāṃ bodhim /
tgt_original: 「若有智慧諸菩薩，　　趣向勝妙菩提道，

src_original: arthe ca dharmi kuśalo carati sa dharmasvabhāvasmi // SRS_12.1 //
tgt_original: 善於法義諸言說，　　能行一切法體性。

src_original: nābhūt bhaṇati vācaṃ buddhānāṃ yādṛśā guṇaviśeṣāḥ /
tgt_original: 口常宣說真實語，　　稱佛實德而演說，

src_original: sa hi dharmu taṃ jinānāṃ jānati śūro vigatakaṅkṣāḥ // SRS_12.2 //
tgt_original: 能知一切諸佛法，　　於三界尊無有疑。

src_original: ekārtha sarvadharmān prajānati ca śūnyatāṃ sa ekāṃśam /
tgt_original: 一切諸法同一義，　　以修空故如實知，

src_original: nānārthu nāsti teṣāṃ ekārthe śikṣito bhavati // SRS_12.3 //  (Vaidya 77)
tgt_original: 彼無種種別異相，　　於此一義已修學。

src_original: niṣkalpānavikalpān anopalambhāṃśca jānāti matimān /
tgt_original: 無分別想分別想，　　眾生、壽命，我、人想，

src_original: kṣati akṣaye 'sya saṃjñā prahīṇa sarvā niravaśeṣā // SRS_12.4 //
tgt_original: 盡與無盡如是想，　　斷此諸想悉無餘。

src_original: na hi rūpato daśabalān paśyati so dharmakāya narasiṃhān /
tgt_original: 不見如來有其色，　　以知諸法自性無，

src_original: nāpi lakṣaṇehi tasya prahīṇa sarve viparyāsāḥ // SRS_12.5 //

src_original: vibodhitāste prakṛtinirātmadharme vimuktijātā na ca kvaci sā vimuktiḥ // SRS_14.7 //
tgt_original: 悟道契會性無我，　　知彼解脫無所脫。

src_original: pratyādiśaṃ jahiya sadā pramattaṃ jitvā ca māraṃ sabalamanantasainyam /
tgt_original: 遠離煩惱及放逸，　　降伏魔力及軍眾，

src_original: buddhitva bodhi vipulāmanantajñānaṃ diśehi dharmaṃ parama viśuddhaśāntam // SRS_14.8 //
tgt_original: 知道無垢無礙智，　　說寂無礙清淨法。

src_original: gaganaṃ pateyyā saha śaśitārakehi pṛthivī vinaśyet sanagaraśailasaṃsthā /
tgt_original: 假使虛空星宿落，　　地、海、城邑悉壞滅，

src_original: ākāśadhāturapi ca siyānyathātvaṃ no caiva tubhyaṃ vitatha bhaṇeyya vācā // SRS_14.9 //
tgt_original: 虛空無為性變異，　　如來終無不實語。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā tvaṃ duḥkhitān sattvānupalambharatāḥ prajāḥ /
tgt_original: 見於苦惱諸眾生，　　安住取著分別中，

tgt_original: 善能安住而不動，　　不動猶如須彌山。

tgt_original: 降伏一切諸外道，　　猶如師子摧野干。

src_original: aśikṣitānāṃ bālānāṃ kumārgapathacāriṇām /  mārgaṃ tvaṃ saṃprakāśesi yena gacchanti nāyakāḥ // SRS_14.23 //
tgt_original: 不學愚癡凡夫人，　　依止嶮難不善徑， 為彼顯示真實道，　　所謂趣向涅槃路。

src_original: ye sthitā ātmasaṃjñāyāṃ duḥkhe te supratiṣṭhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 若有取著我想者，　　彼即住於極苦惱，

tgt_original: 以其不解無我法，　　謂能滅除苦惱處。 不可思議劫數中，　　大智久已曾修學； 修學遠離取著已，　　是故無有諸過惡。

src_original: akhilitapadadharmadeśako 'si skhalitu na labhyati lokanātha /  avitatha gira saṃprabhāṣase tvaṃ duḥkhamokṣakarā namaste nātha // SRS_14.25 //
tgt_original: 演說離過諸法句，　　世尊遠離於諸過， 善說真實微妙語，　　口能解脫百種畏。

src_original: bahuniyutaśatā sahasrakoṭyo gaganasthitāḥ pṛthu devanāgayakṣāḥ /
tgt_original: 無量那由百千億，　　天、龍、夜叉住虛空，

tgt_original: 愛樂無上最聖法，　　聞者靡不合真義。

tgt_original: 如來善美歡喜語，　　溫潤合時稱悅意，

tgt_original: 和合無量微妙音，　　憐愍解脫無數人。

tgt_original: 伎樂音聲百千種，　　一時奏擊相和合，

tgt_original: 悉是天中悅樂聲，　　如來一音能映蔽；

tgt_original: 迦陵頻伽諸鳥眾，　　同時共發微妙聲， 能令他人生欣樂，　　於佛音聲非少分； 擊發歡喜之音樂，　　善合一切諸管弦， 吹貝、鼓、笛、琴、箜篌，　　於佛音聲悉不現； 緊那羅王歌舞音，　　已曾善學百千樂，

src_original: parabhṛtaśukaśārikāṇa śabdāstatha punaḥ krauñcamayūrakinnarāṇām /
tgt_original: 若得聞者咸歡喜，　　於佛音聲悉不現； 拘翅、鸚鵡、舍利聲，　　孔雀、哀鸞、鴛鴦等，

tgt_original: 所有一切美音鳥，　　於佛音聲悉不現；

tgt_original: 可愛悅樂美妙音，　　世間所有善歌詠，

src_original: sarvi gira prayukta ekakāle giravara harṣaṇiyāstathāgatasya // SRS_14.31 //
tgt_original: 悉來集聚同時發，　　佛聲最勝殊過彼。

src_original: yā prabhā abhavat prabhākarāṇāṃ abhibhavati sugatasya ekaraśmiḥ // SRS_14.32 //  kusumitu sugatasya ātmabhāvaḥ parivṛtu vicitru sarvalakṣaṇaiḥ /

tgt_original: 出生福果甚清淨，　　光明顯照於十方。

tgt_original: 乾闥、修羅、摩睺等，　　夜叉所有美妙聲，

src_original: ye te saśabdāḥ sumadhura ekakāle buddhasya śabde śatima kalāṃ na bhonti // SRS_14.36 //

src_original: nāgāna yakṣāṇa asuramahoragāṇāṃ devendrabrahmamarupatīnāṃ ca śabdāḥ /  yā brahmaṇo vā marupatinaśca ābhā prabhāsvarāṇāṃ maṇiratanāna ābhāḥ /
tgt_original: 梵天所有諸光明，　　及諸有頂天身光，
